[[File:Christus Ravenna Mosaic.jpg|thumb|175px|right|Yesu Kristo]] '''Yesu''', amesi woga yɔna be '''Yesu Nazaret-tɔ''' la, enye ame si enye ame vevietɔwu na Kristotɔwo katã le xexeame godoo. Woga yɔnae be '''Yesu Kristo''' hã. Wotsɔ Yesu ŋkɔa tso [[Helagbe]] me Ίησους (''Iēsous''). [[Yudatɔ]]wo, si gbɔ ŋkɔ sia tso gbã la, yɔnae be יהושע (''Yehoshua'') alo ישוע (''Yeshua''). Kristo tso Helagbe Χριστός (''christós'') me. Esia tso [[Yudagbe]] משיח - (''machiakh'') alo [[Mesaya]], si gɔme enye "amesi wosi ami ɖe ta na".
Amesiwo dze Yesu [[Kristo]] Yome, xɔse ɖe eƒe nufiafiawo dzi kple nusiwo kata͂ woŋlɔ͂ɖi le [[Biblia]] me kuɖe eŋu kpakple amesiwo subɔa le habɔbɔ siwo ɖo xɔse siawo la ŋkɔe nye [[Krisotɔ]]wo.
[[Kristotɔ]]wo xɔe se be : Yesu Kristo nye Mawu ŋusekatatɔ ƒevi. Èɖi tsò dziƒo va nɔ amegbetɔwo dome. Ènɔ anyigba dzi wɔ ƒe bla etɔ vɔetɔ. Ema yomela, eku eye wòɖii. Le ŋkeke etɔ megbe la, efɔ tso amekukuwo dome. Etrɔ yi dziƒo bɔbɔ nɔ anyi ɖe efofoa [[Yehowa]] ƒe ɖusi me. Àtrɔ ava àdrɔnʋɔnu amegbetɔwo katã ne fofoa ɖemɔ ne be woawɔ esia.
[[File:Gerard van Honthorst 002.jpg|thumb|left|Alẽkplɔlawo va Yesu gbɔ]]
[[Kristotɔwo]] xɔ edzi se be ne ame aɖe xɔ edzi se be Yesu Kristo ye nye Mawu ƒe tenuvi la, amema àxɔ agbemavɔ eye ne wogaku eye wòɖii hã la, ne Yesu [[Kristo]] trɔ va ko la, amema ànɔ agbemavɔ le anyigba dzi. Nusi wole be amegbetɔ nanya ye nye be Yesu Kristo ɖeka ye nye mɔla, nyaateƒe la kple agbela.
Nusiwo míenya tso Yesu ŋuti la tso [[Biblia]] la ƒe [[Nyanyuigbalẽ]] eneawo, si wo le [[Nubabla yeye]] la me. Ame geɖe siwo nyaa nu le Biblia la ŋuti, xɔ edzi se bena Yesu enye Yudatɔ, si tso [[Galelia]] la. Wo ga xɔe se hã bena eyae enye [[nufiala]], [[atikewɔla]] kple [[dɔyɔla]], amesi [[Yohannes Tsitadela]] la de tsi ta na, eye wo hee ɖe ati ŋu le [[Yerusalem]], le nunɔla [[Pontio Pilaté]] te.
Nusrɔla ʋea ɖewo hã gblɔna bena Yesu ɖeke menɔ anyi le xexeame akpɔ o.
[[Kristotɔ]]wo ƒe xɔse enye be Yesu enye Mesaya alo Xɔla si ƒe vava wogblɔ daɖi le [[Nubabla xoxo]] la me, eye bena éfɔ tso ku me le eƒe hehe ɖe ati ŋu megbe. Eƒe subɔlawo xɔe se be Yesu enye [[Mawu]], vi la ŋutɔ, si va be yea na ɖeɖe amegbetɔwo, eye yea he wo va ye gbɔe. Kristotɔwo ga xɔe se bena ɖetugbui leaƒe ye dzii, eye eƒe agbe kple dɔwɔwɔwo katã na nyagblɔɖi siwo wogblɔ daɖi tso blema ke la, va eme. Wo ga xɔ edzi se bena Yesu ga trɔ yi dziƒo, eye wo gale tɔtrɔ ge ava anyigbaa dzi zi eveliae.
Mɔsilemtɔwo kpɔa Yesu abe [[nyagblɔɖila]]wo dometɔ ɖeka ene. Wo me xɔe abe [[Mawu]] ŋutɔ alo via ene o. Wo me xɔ edzi se bena wo he Yesu ɖe ati ŋu eye wo ku o. Wo lɔ̃ bena Yesu yi [[dziƒo]] eye wo le mɔkpɔm be aga trɔ ava ne xexeame yɔ fũ kple eƒe [[nuvɔ̃]]wo.
[[Category:Biblia]]

[[File:Buberel green parrot.jpg|thumb|Ako si Eŋglisiawo yɔna be ''Buberel Green parrot'']] '''Akowo''' ([[:en:International Phonetic Alphabet|IPA:]]/ 'ɑːkəʊˌwəʊ /) nye [[xe]] ƒomevi ɖeka si wole hame abe 350 sɔŋ. Womana xe siawo ɖe akpa gã eve me. Woyɔna wo le [[Eŋglisigbe]] me be ''cockatoo'' kpakple ''parrot''. Akowo bɔ ɖe xexeame dukɔ siwo me dzoxɔxɔ sɔgbɔ le la me.
== Nuɖuɖu == Akowo ɖua nukuwo, [[seƒoƒo]]wo kple nutsetsewo. Woƒe nuɖuɖu vevetɔ enye nukuwo. Wo dometɔa ɖewo dea ade hã. Le kpɔɖeŋu me, ako aɖewo fɔna [[abɔbɔ]].
== Nunyanya == Xe siawo srɔ̃a [[amegbetɔ]]wo ƒe [[nuƒoƒo]] alebe ne egblɔ nya aɖe le wogbɔ la, woagbugbɔe agblɔ nya ma na wò ha͂. Nusrɔ̃la aɖewo fia be ako aɖewo sena egbegbɔgblɔ aɖewo gɔme. Ako eve siwo ŋkɔwo enye [[Alex (ako)|Alex]] kpaple [[Nk'isi (ako)|N'kisi]] la, wonye ako tɔxewo. Alex srɔ̃ nuwo ƒe ŋkɔwo eye eteaŋu xlẽa nuwo ƒe gbɔsɔsɔ eye wòƒoa nu le nuwo ŋuti. N'kisi hã srɔ̃ nyawo abe akpe ɖeka sɔŋ, eye wòteaŋu zãa nya siawo pɛpɛpɛ hã.[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/sci/tech/3430481.stm]
== Akowo kple amegbetɔwo == === Wo ƒe gbɔsɔsɔ === Akowo le vɔvɔm le xexeame. Wo xɔe se bena amewo le wo dzram zã akpa. Evelia la, xɔ tutu kpakple amewo ƒe agbenɔnɔ na wo ƒe atɔwo wɔƒewo le vɔvɔm. Le esiawo ta la, dukɔ aɖewo wɔ se fifia bena amewo megakpɔ mɔ ale akowo le gbe me adzra o.
=== Aƒemelãwo === Tso blema ŋɔli ke la, amewo nyi akowo abe aƒemelãwo ene. Togbɔ be wodzi menya kpɔna o hã, wo ƒe nuƒoƒo kpakple tugbedzedze na be amewo lɔ̃a wonyinyi ɖaa. Ako aɖewo nɔa agbe gbɔ ƒe blaenyi sɔŋ dzi. Eɖewo hã nɔa agbe ƒe ʋe aɖewo ko. Le ƒe 1992 me la, "USA Today" gbalẽa ŋlɔ be akowo siwo nyim wo le le Amerika ƒe xexleme ɖo 11 miliɔn. [http://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/USAToday/access/4150521.html?dids=4150521&FMT=ABS&FMTS=ABS&date=Dec+21%2C+1992&author=Ward%2C+Sam&pub=USA+TODAY&edition=&startpage=D1&desc=USA+Snapshots%3A++Most+Popular+Pets ].
=== Akowo dzadzra === Ako dzadzra nye ta ɖu na dukɔwo geɖe elabena ako lelawo mewɔna se dzi zi geɖe o. Esia tso woƒe asixɔxɔ gbɔ. Amea aɖewo awɔ nusianu be yewoa le ako adzra awɔ kɔba vie. Wo mega buna akoa wo ƒe nyɔna ŋu o. Dukɔwo wɔ se siwo xe mɔ na akowo lele yakatsɔe le teƒewo zã, gake sedzidalawo ga sɔgbɔ ko.
== Nuŋɔŋlɔwo tso teƒe bubuwo == * [[:en:wiktionary:parrot|Eŋglisi ''Wiktionary'']] * [[:en:wiktionary:ako#Ewe|Gɔmeɖeɖe ɖe Eʋegbe me le Eŋglisi ''Wiktionary'']] * [http://www.1911encyclopedia.org/Parrot 1911 "British Encyclopaedia"]
* Metsɔ nya siawo ƒe akpa gã tɔ tso [[:en:Parrot|Eŋglisi ''Wikipedia'']] me.
[[Category:Akowo| ]] [[Category:Xewo]]
#REDIRECT [[Afadzato]]

[[Image:MountAfadjato.jpg|thumb|right|Afadzato ƒe dzedzeme tso Liati Wote lɔƒo.]] '''Afadzato''' enye to kɔkɔtɔ wu le [[Ghana]] dukɔa katã me, togbɔ be eƒe kɔkɔme nye 880m (alo 2900 ft) ko. To sia le [[Agumatsa to|Agumatsa toawo]], siwo te ɖe Liati Wote kple Gbledi woŋuti la dome le Ghana ƒe Vɔlta nutome. To siawo woyi vaseɖe Ghana kple [[Togo]] dukɔa ƒe axadoƒe. [[Aduadu]] , si nye toa wodometɔ ɖeka la ƒe tame kɔ wu Afadzato, gake womebunae abe to kɔkɔtɔwo o elabena enye to kpui le to kɔkɔ bubuwo ta me.
Wogblɔe be Afadzato ƒe ŋkɔ tso ''Avadzeto'' me. Gbe alo nutsetsewo siwo le toa dzi fiena ŋui na amewo ŋutɔ, eyata agbledelawo kpakple adela siwo dena toa dzi la yɔnae be "aʋa dze to".
[[Tagbo tsidzadza]] si medidi tso Afadzato gbɔ o la, enye nukpɔkpɔ tɔxe, si amedzrowo zɔa mɔ yina kpɔna.

[[File:Cut Ruby.jpg|thumb|Rubi enye kpe xɔasi tɔxe.]] '''Siamlɔm''' (alo '''Yuli''') enye ɣleti adrelia le ƒea me. Vovototowo le alesi wobuna ƒeawo dome. Ƒe si ŋu míele bubum fifia enye [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]] tɔ. Ŋkeke 31 ye le ɣletia me.
Eʋeawo tsɔ ŋkɔ na ɣleti sia be Siamlɔm elabena enye tsidzaɣi eyata wonɔna nuwo wosiam ɖe xexe ga gbugbɔwo nɔ lɔlɔm enu enu ne tsi ga dze dzadzam ko. Le blema ŋɔli la, Romatɔwo wotsɔ ŋkɔ na ɣleti sia be Yuli elabena eya me wodzi [[Yulio Kaisaro]] le. Ŋkɔ xoxo si Romatɔwo yɔna na ɣleti sia enye ''[[Quintilis]]'', elabena eyae enye ɣleti atɔ̃lia le Romatɔwo woƒe ƒe me hafi wotrɔe eye [[Dzove]] (alo [[Yanuar]]) va zu ɣleti gbãtɔ.
== Nudzɔdzɔ tɔxewo le Siamlɔm me == * [[Repɔblik Ŋkeke]] le [[Ghana]] ([[Siamlɔm 1]])
== Nu bubuwo == [[File:Seerosen weiß.jpg|thumb|''"Water lilly"'' seƒoƒo le Eŋglisigbe me]] * Siamlɔm kple [[Afɔfiɛ]] (April) dzea egɔme le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi le kɔsiɖa me le ƒe desiaɖe me. * Ameaɖewo tsɔ seƒoƒo si Eŋglisiawo yɔna be ''water lilly'' abe seƒoƒo tɔxe na Siamlɔm ene. * Siamlɔm kple [[Kele]] (Oktober) wonye ɣletiwo sime amewo dzia vi ŋutɔ. * Kpe xɔasi si woyɔna be ''Rubi'' le Eŋlisi me la, enye kpe tɔxe na amesiwo wodzi le Siamlɔm me.
== Xlẽ esiawo hã == * [[Siamlɔm 2007]]
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Siamlɔm]]

revision.text:
[[File:John Kufuor 29112006.jpg|thumb|John Kufuor]] '''John Agyekum Kufuor''' (si wodzi Dzome 18, 1938) enye [[Ghana]] dukplɔla si le zia dzi tso Dzove 7, 2001 vaseɖe Dzove 7, 2009. Kufuor ga nye zimenɔla na [[African Union]], si nye Afrika dukɔwo ƒe habɔbɔ.
Kufuor enye [[Asanteawo]]. Wodzii le [[Kumasi]]. Srɔ̃a ŋkɔ enye Theresa Kufuor (tɔgbuiyɔŋkɔ Mensah), eye vi atɔ̃ le wosi. Kufuor de Osei Tutu Boarding School (1951-53), [[Prempeh College]] (1954-58), [[Lincoln's Inn]], [[London]] (1959-1961) kple Exeter College le University of Oxford (1961-1964).
== Dɔwɔwɔ == Kufuor dze dɔ gɔme le Kumasi abe ''Town Clerk'' ene. Wotia Kufuor abe MP le 1969 do ɖe Parliament. Le ƒe 1969 me la, wotiae be woa nye Member of Parliament. Le ɣemaɣi la, enɔ gɔvment me.
{{Ghana dukplɔlawo}}
[[Category:1938 vidzidziwo|Kufuor, John]] [[Category:Asanteawo|Kufuor, John]] [[Category:Ghanatɔwo|Kufuor, John]] [[Category:Ghana dukplɔlawo|Kufuor, John]] [[Category:Amegbagbewo|Kufuor, John]]

<noinclude>Nuŋɔŋlɔsiawo le dzedzegbe le ŋkeke si wotia nawo la abe tanyawo le axa gbãtɔ dzi.
<big>{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}</big></noinclude> [[Image:MountAfadjato.jpg|thumb|right|Afadzato tso Liati Wote lɔƒo.]] '''Afadzato''' enye to kɔkɔtɔ wu le [[Ghana]] dukɔa katã me, togbɔ be eƒe kɔkɔme nye 880m (alo 2900 ft) ko. To sia le [[Agumatsa to|Agumatsa toawo]], siwo te ɖe Liati Wote kple Gbledi woŋuti la dome le Ghana ƒe Vɔlta nutome. To siawo woyi vaseɖe Ghana kple [[Togo]] dukɔa ƒe axadoƒe. [[Aduadu]] , si nye toa wodemtɔ ɖeka la ƒe tame kɔ wu Afadzato, gake womebunae abe to kɔkɔtɔwo o elabena enye to kpui le to kɔkɔ bubuwo ta me.
Wogblɔe be Afadzato ƒe ŋkɔ tso ''Avadzeto'' me. Gbe alo nutsetsewo siwo le toa dzi fiena ŋui na amewo ŋutɔ, eyata agbledelawo kpakple adelawo si dena toa dzi la yɔnae be "aʋa dze to".
[[Tagbo tsidzadza]] si medidi tso Afadzato gbɔ o la, enye nukpɔkpɔ tɔxe, si amedzrowo zɔa mɔ vayi kpɔna.

Nuŋɔŋlɔsiawo le dzedzegbe le ŋkeke si wotia nawo la abe tanyawo le axa gbãtɔ dzi. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} ---- {| style="text-align:{{#ifexpr:{{{rowsize|{{{size|250}}}}}} >= 400|center|left}}; background-color:transparent; {{#ifexpr:{{{rowsize|{{{size|250}}}}}} >= 400|padding:0.9em|}}" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |{{#ifexpr:{{{rowsize|{{{size|250}}}}}} < 400|style="padding-right:0.9em;"|}}|[[Image:{{{thumb|Buberel green parrot.jpg}}}|{{{rowsize|{{{size|250x250}}}}}}px|Ako]] {{#ifexpr:{{{rowsize|{{{size|250}}}}}} >= 400| - style="padding:0 0.9em 0.9em 0.9em;"| }} '''Akowo''' ([[:en:International Phonetic Alphabet|IPA:]]/ 'ɑːkəʊˌwəʊ /) nye [[xe]] ƒomevi ɖeka si wole hame abe 350 sɔŋ. Womanaa xe siawo ɖe akpa gã eve me. Woyɔna wo le [[Eŋglisigbe]] me be ''cockatoo'' kpakple ''parrot''. Akowo bɔ ɖe xexeame dukɔwo si me dzoxɔxɔ sɔgbɔ le la me. Fotoa ɖela: Jason L. Buberal |}
[[wikinews:Portal:Ghana|Nyadzɔdzɔwo]] le [[wikinews:|Wikinews]]

*...'''[[Siamlɔm]]''' kple [[Afɔfiɛ]] (April) dzea egɔme le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi le kɔsiɖa me le ƒe desiaɖe mea? *...Aduadu, si nye [[Agumatsa toawo]] wodemtɔ ɖeka la kɔ wu '''[[Afadzato]]''', si wobunaa abe to kɔkɔtɔwu le Ghana? *...'''[[Ako]]wo''' fɔna abɔbɔa? *...'''[[Yesu]]''' ƒe gɔmeɖeɖe enye "[[YHWH enye ɖeɖe]]" eye Kristo gɔme enye "amesi wosi ami ɖe ta na"? *...nuɖuɖu siwo me koko le, sabalawo, weintsetsewo kple weintsetse ƒuƒuwo menyo na '''[[avu]]wo''' o mahã?
'''[[Help:Axa yeye gɔmedzedze|Dze axa yeye gɔme]]'''

revision.text: Nuŋlɔla sia ƒe ɖɔɖɔɖo $1 mamleawo le ŋkeke $2 susueawo me.

*1979 — [[Edward Akufo-Addo]] si nye [[Ghana]] dukplɔla tso ƒe 1970 vaseɖe 1972 me la trɔ megbe le Siamlɔm 17. *1978 — [[Ignatius Kutu Acheampong]] ƒe dziɖuɖu le Ghana ge le Siamlɔm 5 eye [[Fred Akuffo]] xɔ eƒe teƒe. *1960 — Ghana zu Republik le Siamlɔm 1 eye [[Kwame Nkrumah]] zu dukplɔla. *1960 — [[Somalia]] dukɔa xɔ ablɔɖeɖe le Siamlɔm 1. *1913 — Wodzi [[Kofi Busia]], Ghana dukplɔla le Siamlɔm 11. *1776 — [[Amerika]] dukɔa xɔ ablɔɖeɖe le Siamlɔm 4.

Eva ɖo axa si gɔme womedze haɖeke o. Ne wòadi be yeadze egɔme la, dze nuŋlɔm ɖe go sia me le afi sia ɖome (kpɔ [[{{MediaWiki:helppage}}|kpekpeɖeŋu nyawo]] na kpekpeɖeŋu bubuwo). Ne wòme ɖoe be yeava afii hafi o la, ekema tia '''megbe''' eye na gbugbɔ ayi afisi netso va.

revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Fordox11|Fordox11]] ([[User talk:Fordox11|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:Fibonacci1917|Fibonacci1917]]
revision.text:
[[File:Jerry Rawlings 2.jpg|thumb]] '''Jerry John Rawlings''' si wodzi [[Masa 22]], [[1947]] me, enye [[Ghana dukplɔla]] zi eve sɔŋ. Etrɔ megbe le Adeɛmekpɔxe 12, 2020 me. Woyɔe be '''Jeremiah Rawlings John''' le eƒe ɖevi me. Eƒe dziɖuƔi gbãtɔ nɔ ƒe 1979 me eye evelia dze egɔme tso [[Dzome 31]], [[1981]] vaseɖe [[Dzove 7]], [[2001]].
==Eƒe ƒometɔwo== Rawlings tɔ ŋkɔ enye James Ramsay John, amesi tso ''[[Scotland]]'' le ''[[United Kingdom]]''. Eya kple srɔ̃a Maria tso Scotland va wɔ dɔ le [[United Africa Company]] (UAC) le Gɛ̃. Nɔa enye Aƒenɔ Victoria Agbotui tso [[Dzelukoƒe]], si te ɖe [[Keta]] ŋuti le [[Vɔlta nutome]]. Rawlings ɖe [[Nana Konadu Agyeman]] si nye [[Asanteawo]]. Wodzi vi ene, nyɔnuvi etɔ̃ kple ŋutsuvi ɖeka.
==Eƒe suku dede kple dɔ sɔsrɔ̃== Rawlings tɔ mekpɔ edzi le eƒe ɖevi me o eyata ezu nɔa ƒe agbe to eƒe suku dede katã me. Ede [[Achimota School]], si nye Ghana ƒe suku deŋgɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Esi wodo le Achimota School la, eyi dɔsrɔ̃ƒe le [[Ghana yamesrafowo]] gbɔ. Wofiae yameʋukuku. Rawlings va nya yameʋuawo kuku alegbegbe be wonae ''Speed Bird'' dzesigbalẽ le nusɔsrɔ̃a ƒe nuwuwu.
==Asrafo dɔ wɔwɔ== Le [[Tedoxe]] 1968 me la, wo ɖo Rawlings ɖe [[Takoraɖi]] le [[Ɣetoɖoƒe nutome]]. Ewu eƒe nusɔsrɔ̃ nu le Dzove 1969 me. Wo de bubu eŋu kpakple dzesi si woyɔna be "''Speed Bird Trophy''" le alesi wò bi ɖe ayameʋu kuku me ta. Edze dɔ gɔme abe ''Pilot Officer'' ene. Le [[Afɔfiɛ]] 1978 me la, woɖoe "''Flight Lieutenant''" le ayamesrafowo me. Le [[Damɛ]] 1979 me la, Rawlings kple xɔ̃a asrafoaɖewo dze aglã ɖe dukɔkplɔlawo ŋuti. Woƒe nya enye be yewo ƒe asrafomegãwo va le gaɖum akpa. Wolé wo katã eye wodze ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ gɔme le Gɛ̃ le Damɛ 28, 1979. Esi ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃a nɔ edzi yim la, asrafowo kple ame bubuwo va dze lɔ̃lɔ̃m na Rawlings.
==Dukplɔla== Le [[Masa 4]], [[1979]] fɔŋli me la, asrafoaɖewo vayi ɖe Rawlings kple xɔ̃awo tso game. Hoʋiʋli do le Gɛ̃ gbɔme ŋkekea katã gake le ɣetrɔ me la, [[Kodzo Boakye-Gyan]] ɖe gbeƒã le nuƒomɔawo dzi le dukɔame godo bena [[Supreme Military Council]] dziɖuɖua ge. Asrafoawo ɖo Rawlings woƒe zimenɔla, eye wotsɔ ŋkɔ na dziɖuɖua be [[Armed Forces Revolutionary Council]] (AFRC).
Le [[Masa 16]], [[1979]] dzi la, wowu [[Ignatius Kutu Acheampong]] si nye Ghana dukplɔla tso 1972 va ɖo 1978, kple [[E. K. Utuka]] si nye Ghana liƒoŋudzɔsrafowo ƒe amegã. Wotso afia nawo be woɖu dukɔa ƒe ga zã eye womenye nuteƒewɔlawo o. Le [[Masa 26]], [[1979]] dzi la, woga wu asrafomegãwo woame ade kpe ɖe eve siawo ŋu. Eva dze le [[National Reconciliation Commission]] ƒe nyawometoto me be ʋɔnudɔdrɔ siawo me de tutuwo eye wome drɔ ʋɔnu na wodometɔ aɖewo kroa o.
Wole asrafomegãwo geɖe kpe ɖe enyi siawo ŋu eye wode wodemtɔ geɖe ga me. Rawlings kple eƒe amewo tso ɖe asitsalawo hã ŋu.
Hafi Rawlings ava zia dzi la, woɖo be woawɔ akametatia na dziɖuɖu yeye si me asrafowo ma nɔ o. Esia yi dzi abe alesi woɖo ene eye Ghana dukɔa tia [[Hilla Limann]] be wòa nye dukplɔla yeyea. Rawlings ɖe asi le dziɖuɖua ŋu na Limann le [[Anyɔnyɔ 24]], 1979 me.
==Dziɖuɖu evelia== Le [[Dzome 31]], [[1981]] dzi la, Rawlings tso ɖe Limann ƒe dziɖuɖua ŋu. Hoʋiʋli ga nɔ anyi gake enu me sẽ abe 1979 tɔ o. Ghana ƒe kplɔla tatiawo katã ge eye woɖo [[Provisional National Defence Council]] (PNDC) abe dziɖuɖu yeyea. Rawlings ga nye zimenɔla na PNDC hã.
==Dziɖula tatia== Esime Rawlings ƒe dziɖuɖu nɔ dididi la, amewo dze babia be ehiã be Ghana aga ɖo dziɖuɖu tatia alebe dua kɔkpɔkplɔ na nɔ ɖoɖo kple sewo si dukɔa katã aɖo nu. Le ƒea ɖewo megbe la, Rawlings va lɔ̃ be dziɖuɖua natrɔ. Eɖe asi le asrafo dɔ ŋu eye wo ɖo be yea nɔ akametatiaa me. Woɖo [[National Democratic Congress]] (NDC), eye Rawlings nye woƒe ŋgɔnɔla. Ghanatɔwo tia Rawlings abe dukplɔla yeyea gake le seawo nu la, elebe woa gbugbɔ dukplɔla atia ƒe ene sia ene megbe. Rawlings ƒe dziɖuɖu dze egɔme le [[Dzove 7]], [[1993]] dzi eye ewunu [[Dzove 7]], [[1997]]. Wo ga tia Rawlings le Dzome 2000 eyata eyi dzi tso 1997 vaseɖe [[Dzove 7]], [[2001]]. Eseawo me ɖe mɔ be woatia dukplɔla ɖeke wu zi eve o alebe le ƒe enyi megbe la, Rawlings do le zia dzi.
==Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe== *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerry_Rawlings Jerry Rawlings le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la dzi]
{{Ghana dukplɔlawo}}
[[Category:1947 vidzidziwo|Rawlings, Jerry]] [[Category:Ghana dukplɔlawo|Rawlings, Jerry]] [[Category:Eʋeawo|Rawlings, Jerry]] [[Category:Ghanatɔwo|Rawlings, Jerry]] [[Category:Amegbagbewo|Rawlings, Jerry]]
Xe mɔ na ezãla

*1776 - [[United States]] (Amerika) dukɔa ƒe [[Ɖokuisinɔnɔxɔgbe]] le [[Siamlɔm 4]]. *1960 - [[Republik Ŋkeke]] le [[Ghana]] le [[Siamlɔm 1]]. *1973 - [[Bahamas]] dukɔa ƒe [[Ablɔɖexɔgbe]] le [[Siamlɔm 10]]. *1978 - [[Fred Akuffo]] zu [[Ghana]] ƒe kplɔla ɖe [[Ignatius Kutu Acheampong]] teƒe.

revision.text:
{{DasiamimeƔletigbalẽ}} [[File:Aug11 01.jpg|thumb|Augustus, Roma fiagã ƒe meme]] '''Dasiamime''' (alo '''August''') enye ɣleti enyilia le ƒea me. Ɣleti sia le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 31 ye le ɣletia me.
Le blema ŋɔli la, woyɔna ɣleti sia be [[Sextilis]] le [[Latingbe]] me elabena enye ɣleti adelia le [[Roma ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Le ƒe 8 BC me la, wotrɔ ŋkɔa tsɔ de bubu Roma fiagã [[Augustus]] ŋu.
== Nu bubuwo == [[File:Corn Poppy (Papaver rhoeas).jpg|thumb|''Poppy'' seƒoƒo]] * Ameaɖewo tsɔ seƒoƒo si Eŋglisiawo yɔna be [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gladiolus ''gladiolus''] kple [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GPoppy ''poppy''] abe seƒoƒo tɔxe na Dasiamime ene. * Kpe xɔasiwo si woyɔna be [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peridot ''peridot''], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sardonyx ''sardonyx''], kple [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sapphire ''sapphire''] le Eŋlisigbe me la, wonye kpe tɔxewo na amesiwo wodzi le Dasiamime me.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Dasiamime me == * [[Dasiamime 4]], 1974 - [[Ghana]] dukɔa dze ʋu kum to nuɖusi me. * [[Dasiamime 6]], 1945 - [[United States|Amerika]] da "bomb" ɖe [[Hiroshima]] dzi le [[Japan]]. * [[Dasiamime 9]], 1945 - Amerika da "bomb" ɖe [[Nagasaki]] dzi le Japan. * [[Dasiamime 9]], 1965 - [[Singapore]] dukɔ fe tso [[Malaysia]] me eye wò zu dukɔ le eɖokui si. * [[Dasiamime 10]], 1822 - [[Ecuador]] zu dukɔ si le eɖokuisi. * [[Dasiamime 14]], 1947 - [[Pakistan]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ. * [[Dasiamime 15]], 1945 - [[Korea]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ. * [[Dasiamime 15]], 1947 - [[India]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ. * [[Dasiamime 25]], 1825 - [[Uruguay]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ tso Brazil si me. * [[Dasiamime 31]], 1957 - [[Malaysia]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ eye wòzu dukɔ le eɖokui si.
== Kpɔ esiawo hã == * [[Dasiamime 2007]]
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/August August le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me]
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Dasiamime]]

revision.text:
{{Dzinu-sia}} {{ɣleti le ƒea me}} '''[[Siamlɔm]] 2007''' enye ɣleti adrelia le ƒea me. Edze egɔme le [[Kɔsiɖagbe]] dzi eye awu enu le ŋkeke 31 megbe le [[Brãɖagbe]] dzi. ==Ŋkeke tɔxewo le ɣleti sia me== * [[Siamlɔm 1]] - Canada Ŋkeke ([[Canada]]) * [[Siamlɔm 1]] - Siamlɔm Ŋde ([[Bulgaria]]) * [[Siamlɔm 1]] - Republik Ŋkeke ([[Ghana]]) * [[Siamlɔm 4]] - Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[United States]]) * [[Siamlɔm 5]] - Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[Venezuela]]) * [[Siamlɔm 6]] - Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[Malawi]]) * [[Siamlɔm 7]] - Saba Saba Ŋkeke, [[Tanzania]] * [[Siamlɔm 7]] - San Fermin ([[Pamplona]] kple [[Spain]]) * [[Siamlɔm 7]] - Tanabata ([[Japan]]) * [[Siamlɔm 9]] - Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[Argentina]]) * [[Siamlɔm 14]] - Bastille Ŋkeke ([[France]]) * [[Siamlɔm 20]] - Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[Colombia]]) * [[Siamlɔm 21]] - Racial Harmony Day ([[Singapore]]) * [[Siamlɔm 24]] - Tisha B'Av ([[Jewish]]) * [[Siamlɔm 25]] - Commonwealth Day ([[Puerto Rico]]) * [[Siamlɔm 28]] - Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[Peru]]) ==Nusiwo yi dzi le ɣleti sia me== *TAM Linhas Aéreas ƒe ayameʋu A320 ɖeka do le mɔ dzi le Brazil eye wòle dzo enumake. Emenɔlawo katã ku. *[[w:en:Giorgio Napolitano|'''Giorgio Napolitano''']] si nye [[Italia]] dukplɔla la va sra [[Ghana]] ŋkeke etɔ̃. *[[Switzerland]] dukplɔla, [[w:en:Micheline Calmy-Rey|'''Aƒenɔ Micheline Calmy-Rey''']] va sra [[Ghana]] ŋkeke eve. *[[Roger Federer]] ɖu [[Rafael Nadal]] dzi 7–6, 4–6, 7–6, 2–6, 6–2. Esiae enye ƒe atɔ̃lia tri ɖe enu si me Federer ɖu dzi le [[Wimbledon]]. *'''[[Georgina Theodora Wood]]''', si nye Ghana ƒe nyɔnu gbãtɔ si zu Ʋɔnudrɔ̃la Gãtɔ la xɔ dzesi si woyɔna be Order of the Star of Ghana, le Gɛ̃ le Siamlɔm 6, 2007. Esiae nye Ghana dukɔa ƒe bubu kɔkɔtɔwu si wonaa dukɔamenɔlawo. *'''[[African Union]]''' ƒe takpekpe asiekelia wu nu le Gɛ̃ Siamlɔm 4, 2007. * Wodze ga yeyea ŋdɔ wɔwɔm le [[Ghana]]. Woawɔ '''[[Ghanaian cedi]]''' yeyea kple ga xoxoa katã ŋudɔ vaseɖe Dzome 2007 hafi woaɖe asi le xoxoa ŋu susue. Wogbaa GH¢ 1 yeyea na 10,000 cedi xoxoawo.
[[wikinews:Main Page|Nyadzɔdzɔwo le Wikinews]]

{{ŋkeke le ƒea me}}
'''Siamlɔm 1''' enye [[ŋkeke]] 182lia le ƒea me (183lia le ƒe ene sia ene me) le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 183 ye susɔ le na ƒea ƒe nuwuwu.
== Le ŋkeke sia dzi ==
== Dzigbewo ==
== Kugbewo ==
== Azãgbewo == * [[Canada]] Ŋkeke * [[Ghana]] - Republik Ŋkeke. * [[Hong Kong]] ''Special Administrative Region'' ƒe ɖoɖo Ŋkeke. * [[Surinam]] ''Keti Koti'' (Gawo tsotso) Ablɔɖe Ŋkeke; Le Siamlɔm 1, le ƒe 1863 me la, wo da se ɖe kluviwo lele dzi. * [[Bulgaria]], Siamlɔm ŋde kɔnu

[[File:Great coat of arms of Sweden.svg|right|150px]] [[File:Flag of Sweden.svg|right|200px]]
'''Sweden''' (''Sverige'') nye [[Europa]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele Europa ƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo. Sweden do liƒo kple [[Denmark]], [[Finland]] kpakple [[Norway]]. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 9,000,000 lɔƒo. Sweden ƒe dugã enye [[Stockholm]].
{{Europa dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Europa dukɔwo]]

[[File:Flag of Norway.svg|right|thumb]] [[File:Europe-Norway.svg|right|thumb]] '''Norway''' (''Norge'') nye [[Europa]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele Europa ƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo. Norway do liƒo kple [[Finland]], [[Russia]] kpakple [[Sweden]]. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 5,391,369<ref name="ssbf">{{Cite web|url=https://www.ssb.no/en/befolkning/statistikker/folkemengde/aar-per-1-januar|title=Population, 2021-01-01|publisher=Statistics Norway|date=2021-01-01|accessdate=2021-02-23|language=no}}</ref> lɔƒo (2021). Norway ƒe dugã enye [[Oslo]].
<center><gallery > Geiranger2.JPG|Geiranger Sognefjord, Norway.jpg|Sognefjord Vippetangen2.jpg|Oslo Vegaoyan.jpg|West Norway coast Mixed_Picea_(Spruce)_forest_from_Vestfold_county_in_Norway.jpg|Forest Norway National House.JPG|Norway National House Troll_A_Platform.jpg|Oil platform </gallery></center>
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == <references> </references>

'''United States of Amerika''' nye Amerika dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. United States ƒe dugã enye [[Washington D.C.]]. Gbe si wogblɔna le woƒe dɔwɔƒewo le dua me enye [[Eŋlisigbe]]
United States ƒe dukplɔla enye [[Joe Biden]]. Ele dziɖum tso Dzove 20, 2021.

revision.text:
{{Dzinu-sia}} {{ɣleti le ƒea me}} '''[[Dasiamime]] 2007''' enye ɣleti enyilia le ƒea me. Me vaɖo haɖe o. Ele egɔme dze ge le [[Kuɖagbe]] dzi eye awu enu le ŋkeke 31 megbe le [[Fiɖagbe]] dzi. ==Nusiwo woɖo daɖi== * [[Dasiamime 24]]-[[Anyɔnyɔ 2]] - Woawɔ 2007 xexeame katã ƒe Athletics ɖikeke le [[Osaka]], [[Japan]]. * [[Dasiamime 28]] - Ɣleti atsyɔ le ŋkeke sia dzi. ==Mɔkekewo le ɣleti sia me== * [[Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke]] ** [[Dasiamime 1]] - [[Benin]] kple [[Switzerland]] ** [[Dasiamime 5]] - [[Burkina Faso]] ** [[Dasiamime 6]] - [[Jamaica]] ** [[Dasiamime 7]] - [[Colombia]] ** [[Dasiamime 9]] - [[Singapore]] ** [[Dasiamime 10]] - [[Ecuador]] ** [[Dasiamime 11]] - [[Chad]] ** [[Dasiamime 14]] - [[Pakistan]] ** [[Dasiamime 15]] - [[Bahrain]], [[India]], [[North Korea]], kple [[South Korea]] ** [[Dasiamime 16]] - [[Cyprus]] ** [[Dasiamime 17]] - [[Indonesia]] ** [[Dasiamime 19]] - [[Afghanistan]] ** [[Dasiamime 24]] - [[Ukraine]] ** [[Dasiamime 25]] - [[Uruguay]] ** [[Dasiamime 27]] - [[Moldova]] ** [[Dasiamime 31]] - [[Kyrgyzstan]], [[Trinidad and Tobago]], kple [[Malaysia]] ==Nusiwo le dzɔdzɔm le ɣleti sia me==
[[wikinews:Main Page|Nyadzɔdzɔwo le Wikinews]]

{{ŋkeke le ƒea me}}
'''Siamlɔm 20''' enye [[ŋkeke]] 201lia le ƒea me (202lia le ƒe ene sia ene me) le [[Gregoria ɣletigalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 164 ye susɔ le ƒe sia me.
== Le ŋkeke sia dzi == * [[2005]] — [[Canada]] zu dukɔ enelia le xexeame si ɖemɔ bena ŋutsu na ɖe ŋutsu eye nyɔnu na ɖe nyɔnu.
== Dzigbewo == * [[356 BC]] — Alexander the Great, Helatɔwo ƒe fia kple aʋafiagã. (Eku le [[323 BC]].)
== Kugbewo == * [[985]] — [[Pope Boniface VII]]
== Azãgbewo == * International Chess Day * [[Argentina]] — Día del Amigo (Xɔ̃lɔ Ŋkeke) * [[Brazil]] — Xɔ̃lɔ Ŋkeke * [[Colombia]] — Ablɔɖeɖe Ŋkeke * [[Japan]] — Atsiaƒu Ŋkeke * Northern [[Cyprus]] — Tomefafa kple Ablɔɖeɖe Ŋkeke

revision.text:
[[File:LocationTogo.svg|right|180px]] [[File:Flag of Togo.svg|right|180px]] '''Togo''' nye dukɔ si le [[Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe]] kpadzi lɔƒo. Edo liƒo kple [[Ghana]] le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe kpadzi, [[Benin]] (si woyɔ be ''Dahomey'' vayi) le eƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo kple [[Burkina Faso]] le eƒe dzigbe. Aƒu si woyɔna be ''[[Gulf of Guinea]]'' la le eƒe anyigbe lɔƒo. Togo ƒe dugã ye nye [[Lome]]. Egbe si wogblɔna le dɔwɔƒewo le dua me enye [[Fransegbe]]. Togo ƒe dukplɔlanye nye bubutor [[Faure Gnassingbé]].
File:Children in Togo (21786295071).jpg File:Quartier des administrations (Lomé, Togo).jpg File:Street scene, Lomé, Togo.JPG File:L'atlantique à Lomé - Togo.jpg {{Afrika dukɔwo}} [[Category:Togo|*]] [[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]] [[Category:Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe dukɔwo]]

[[File:Coat of arms of Benin.svg|right|150px]] [[File:Flag of Benin.svg|right|200px]] [[File:Benin in its region.svg|right|180px]] '''Benɛ̃''' (''si woyɔ be [[Dahomey]] vayi'') enye dukɔ si le [[Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe]] kpadzi lɔƒo. Edo liƒo kple [[Togo]] le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe kpadzi, [[Naidzeria]] le eƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo, [[Mali|Niger]] kple [[Burkina Faso]] le eƒe dzigbe. Aƒu si woyɔna be ''[[Gulf of Guinea]]'' la le eƒe anyigbe lɔƒo. Benin ƒe dugã enye [[Kotonu|Koutonu]]. Benin ƒe fiadzue nye Porto Novo. Benɛ̃ dukɔa xɔ dokuisinɔnɔ tso Franseawo gbɔ le Dasiamime 1 dzi, le ƒe 1960 me. Gbe si wogblɔna le dɔwɔƒewo le dua me enye [[Fransegbe]]. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 12 864 634 lɔƒo (2020)
Benin ƒe dukplɔlanye nye bubutor [[Patrice Talon]]
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]] [[Category:Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe dukɔwo]]

[[File:LocationBurkinaFaso.svg|right|180px]] [[File:Flag of Burkina Faso.svg|right|180px]] '''Burkina Faso''' enye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele [[Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe]] lɔƒo. Edo liƒo kple [[Côte d'Ivoire]], [[Ghana]], [[Togo]] kpakple [[Benin]] le eƒe anyigbe lɔƒo, [[Niger]] le eƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo, kple [[Mali]] le eƒe dzigbe. Dukɔ sia ƒe ŋkɔ xoxoa enye [[Dahomey]]. Burkina Faso ƒe dugã enye [[Ouagadougou]]. Gbe si wogblɔna le dɔwɔƒewo enye [[Fransegbe]].
{{Afrika dukɔwo}} [[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]] [[Category:Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe dukɔwo]]

revision.text:
'''Afɔfiɛ''' (alo '''April''') enye ɣleti enelia le ƒea me. Ɣleti sia le [[Gregoria ɣletigbãle]]a me. Ŋkeke 30 ye le ɣleti sia kpakple etɔ̃ bubuwo me.
Ɣleti sia ƒe ŋkɔ ɖeka tso ''Aprilis'' le [[Latingbe]] me. Egɔme enye ''aperire'' alo ʋuʋum elabena ɣeyiɣi sia me seƒoƒowo tsena le wo de. [[Helatɔ]]wo hã yɔna ɣeyiɣi sia be ἁνοιξις (ʋuʋum). Esime Romatɔwo tsɔ woƒe mawuwo ƒe ŋkɔwo na ɣletiawo ta la, wobui be woyɔne be ''Aprilis'' si tso Helatɔwo ƒe mawuawo ɖeka [[Afrodite]] ƒe ŋkɔme.
''[[Anglo-Saxontɔ]]wo'' tsɔ ŋkɔ na ɣleti sia be ''Oster-monath'' alo ''Eostur-monath'' si nye woƒe mawu ɖeka ''Eostre'' alo ''Ostara'' ƒe ŋkɔ. Ŋkɔ sia me ''Easter'' tso.
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Afɔfiɛ]]

revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/He! Günter Grass, schreib! 2|He! Günter Grass, schreib! 2]] ([[User talk:He! Günter Grass, schreib! 2|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:DerHexer|DerHexer]]
revision.text:
'''Taflatse, xlẽ nusiwo le afii hafi nadze nyawo biam:''' # Ne wòadi be yeaŋlɔ babia yeye la, yi "Tia afisia na nyawo babia le Wikipiɖia zazã ŋuti." Esia akɔ wò ayi afisi wòa ŋlɔe ɖo. Ɖo ŋku dzi na ŋlɔ Tanya ɖe afisi wofia le dzime la. # Hafi na bia nu aɖe la, [http://tools.wikimedia.de/~tangotango/nubio/ dii le afii gbã]. ''(Eŋlisigbe me)'' ::*Babia bɔbɔ ɖeka enye: [[Wikipedia:Wòƒe nuŋɔŋlɔ gbãtɔ|Aleke ma dze axa yeye gɔme]]? #. Ne èŋlɔ wòo babia vɔ la, ŋkuwo nanɔ axa sia ŋu na eŋuɖoɖoa(wo). '''Kpekpeɖeŋu tɔxe''' # Ne ehiã kpekpeɖeŋu tɔxe ɖe la, ekema da {{'''kpeɖeŋunye'''}} ɖe wò nyadaƒe, eye kpeɖeŋutɔa ɖe akpɔ gbɔwo.
''' [http://ee.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Wikipedia:Help_desk&action=edit§ion=new Tia afisia na nyawo babia le Wikipiɖia zazã ŋuti.]

revision.text:
'''Anyɔnyɔ''' (alo '''September''') enye ɣleti asiekelia le ƒea me le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 30 ye le ɣletia me.
Le Latingbe me la, ''septi'' gɔme enye adre eye ''septem'' gɔme enye adrelia. Le [[Roma ɣletigbalẽ]]a me la, Anyɔnyɔ alo September enye ɣleti adrelia vaseɖe ƒe 153 BC.
== Nu tɔxewo le Anyɔnyɔ me == [[File:Sapphire01.jpg|thumb|right|Safirwo]] * Sukuwo geɖe ƒe ƒewo dzea egɔme le ɣleti sia me. * Woɖoa ŋku [[Anyɔnyɔ 1]] dzi abe ŋkeke si dzi Eritreatɔwo dze woƒe ƒe 30 aʋa na ɖokuisinɔnɔ tso Ethiopia tɔwo gbɔ. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 11]] enye ''Patriots Day'' le ''United States'' dukɔa me eye emake enye ŋkeke si dzi wo ku ayameʋuwo de dziƒoxɔwo me le ƒe 2001 me. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 16]] eye [[Mexico]] dukɔa ƒe [[Ɖokuisinɔnɔ ŋkeke]]. * Le [[KwaZulu-Natal]] la, woɖoa ŋku fia [[Shaka]] dzi le Kɔsiɖagbe susueame le Anyɔnyɔ me. * [[Germany]] dukɔa ɖua ''Oktoberfest'' alo Kele zã eye [[China]] dukɔa hã ɖua Dasiamime Ɣleti zã le Anyɔnyɔ me. * Le [[Australia]] la, woɖua ''Father's Day'' alo Tɔwo ƒe ŋkeke le ɣleti sia ƒe Kɔsiɖagbe gbãtɔ dzi.
== Nu bubuwo == [[File:Morning Glory Flower.jpg|thumb|right|''Morning glory'' seƒoƒo]] * Ƒe sia ƒe me la, Anyɔnyɔ kple [[Dzome]] dzea egɔme le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi le kɔsiɖaa me. * Ɣleti sia ƒe [[seƒoƒo]] tɔxe enye ''Morning glory'' le Eŋlisigbe me. * Anyɔnyɔ ƒe kpe xɔasi enye [[safir]]. * [[Xexemeʋa evelia]] dze egɔme [[Anyɔnyɔ 1]], [[1939]] le esime [[Adolf Hitler]] wɔ avu kpli [[Poland]]. Ewu enu le [[Anyɔnyɔ 2]], [[1945]] le esime [[Japan]] dukɔa tsi asi.
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=September&oldid=145011859 September le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me]
== Nuxexlẽwo le teƒe bubuwo == * [[:en:Sapphire|Safir le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me]] * [[:en:Morning glory|''Morning glory'' le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me]]
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Anyɔnyɔ]]

{{AnyɔnyɔƔletigbalẽ{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}<noinclude> [[Category: Ɣeyiɣi kple Ɣletigbalẽ kpewo|{{PAGENAME}}]]

[[Category:Amewo]]

'''Hilla Limann''' ([[Dzome 12]], [[1934]] – [[Dzove 23]], [[1998]]) enye Ghana dukplɔla tso [[Anyɔnyɔ 24]], [[1979]] vaseɖe [[Dzome 31]], [[1981]]. Wodzii le [[Gwollu]], si nye kɔƒea ɖe le [[Sisalla West District]] le [[Upper West nutome]] le [[Ghana]] gbegãdzi. Le eƒe ɖevi me la, eƒe tɔgbuiŋkɔ enye Babini. Ede ŋgɔ le suku eye wòwɔ dɔ gãwo hafi vayi zu Ghana dukplɔla.
==Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe== *[[:en:Hilla Limann|Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia]]

[[File:Faure Gnassingbé 29112006.jpg|thumb|Faure Gnassingbé]] '''Faure Gnassingbé''' (si wodzi [[Masa 6]], [[1966]]), enye [[Togo]] dukɔkplɔla tso [[Damɛ 4]], [[2005]] le esime fofoa [[Gnassingbé Eyadéma]] trɔ megbe. Woga yɔnae be '''Faure Eyadéma'''.
== Kpɔ esiawo hã == * [[Togo dukplɔlawo]]Faure Gnassingbe nye Togotɔwo ʄe duklɔla tso

[[File:Gnassingbe Eyadema detail1 DF-SC-84-10025.jpg|thumbnail|right|Gnassingbé Eyadéma]] '''Gnassingbé Eyadéma''' ([[Dzome 26]], [[1937]] - [[Dzodze 5]], [[2005]]), enye [[Togo]] dukplɔla tso [[Afɔfiɛ 14]], [[1967]] vaseɖe [[Dzodze 5]], [[2005]]. Eƒe ŋkɔ tsã enye '''Étienne Eyadéma'''. Eyadema nɔ zia dzi ƒe 38 sɔŋ. Le eƒe ku ɣi la, eyae nye dukplɔla si ɖu dzi wòdidi wu le Afrika katã.

{{ŋkeke le ƒea me}}
'''Siamlɔm 5''' enye [[ŋkeke]] 186lia le ƒea me (187lia le ƒe ene sia ene me) le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 179 ye susɔ le na ƒea ƒe nuwuwu.
== Le ŋkeke sia dzi ==
== Dzigbewo ==
== Kugbewo ==
== Nusiwo yi edzi gbemagbe == * [[1687]] – [[Isaac Newton]] publishes ''[[Philosophiae Naturalis Principia Mathematica]]''. * [[1811]] - [[Venezuela]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ tso [[Spain]] gbɔ. * [[1830]] - [[France]] ho aʋa ɖe [[Algeria]] ŋu. * [[1865]] - The Salvation Army is founded in the East End of London, England. * [[1975]] - [[Arthur Ashe]] zu ameyibɔ gbãtɔ si ɖu dzi le [[Wimbledon]] le ŋutsuwo ƒe hame. * [[1978]] - [[Fred Akuffo]] zu [[Ghana dukplɔlawo|Ghana dukplɔla]]
== Azãgbewo == * [[Venezuela]]: [[Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke]] ([[1811]]). * [[Algeria]]: Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[1962]]). * [[Cape Verde]]: Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[1975]]). * [[Armenia]]: [[Constitution Day]] ([[1995]]) * [[Czechia]] and [[Slovakia]]: [[Saints Cyril and Methodius]] wovae ɖo [[Great Moravia]] ([[863]] lɔƒo). * [[Isle of Man]]: [[Tynwald Day]] ([[1266]]). * [[United States]]: [[Bloody Thursday]], [[Longshoremans Union Holiday]].
== Nuxexlẽwo tso teƒe bubuwo == {{Commons|July 5}} * {{BBC: On This Day}} * {{The New York Times: On This Day}}

[[File:The National Archives UK - CO 1069-50-1.jpg|thumb|Kwame Nkrumah]] '''Kwame Nkrumah''' ([[Anyɔnyɔ 21]], [[1909]] - [[Afɔfiɛ 27]], [[1972]]) enye [[Ghana]] vidzidzi gbãtɔ si vaye zu [[Ghana dukplɔlawo|Ghana dukplɔla]]. == Eƒe ɖevime kple sukudede == Wodzi Nkrumah le [[Nkroful]] le Ghana ƒe [[Ɣetoɖoƒe nutome]]. Ŋkɔ si wotsɔ ne le eƒe ɖevime enye '''Francis Nwia Kofi Ngonloma'''. Ede [[Achimota School]] le Gẽ hafi wòyi edzi le Roma Katolik suku me le [[Axim]]. Le ƒe 1935 me la, ezɔ mɔ heyi ɖe [[United States]]. Ede [[Lincoln yunivesiti]], afisi woxɔ BA ɖaseɖigbãle le. == Eƒe gbɔgbɔ va Ghana == Le 1945 me la, Nkrumah gbɔ va Ghana. Le eƒe gbɔgbɔ ko la, woɖoe nuŋlɔ̃la na [[United Gold Coast Convention]] (UGCC). Woƒe nunɔla ɣemaɣi enye [[J. B. Danquah]]. Le ƒe ʋea ɖewo megbe la, vovototo va ge ɖe wome eye Nkrumah do le UGCC la me eye wò va ɖo eya ŋutɔ ƒe dunyaheha si nye [[Convention People's Party]] (CPP). Wo nɔ [[United Kingdom]] dukɔa biam na Ghana ƒe ɖokuisinɔnɔ. == Ghana ƒe ɖokuisinɔnɔ == Le [[Tedoxe 6]], [[1957]] me la, Ghana dukɔa xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ eye Nkrumah zu dukɔa kplɔla. [[Fianyɔnu Elizabet II]] ganɔ zia dzi na Ghana ƒe etɔ̃ sɔ̃ŋ hafi eya hã trɔ tso [[Siamlɔm 1]], [[1960]] dzi. == Eƒe dziɖuɖu == Nkrumah tu nuwo geɖe abe tɔdziʋudzeƒe gãaɖe, ayameʋudzeƒe yeye kple [[Akosombo Dam]]. Nkrumah nye Ghana dukplɔla ƒe 9 sɔŋ hafi wo ge le zia dzi. Ghana asrafowo tso ɖe eŋu le esime Ghana nɔ sesem. == Nkrumah ƒe ƒometɔwo == Nkrumah nɔ ŋkɔ enye Aƒenɔ Nyaniba. Vi ene ye nɔ Nkrumah si. Via tsitsitɔ enye ''Francis'', si nye dɔyɔla kple amatsiwɔla de ŋgɔ le Ghana. Emegbe la, Nkrumah ɖe Fathia Rezhik, si tso Egyipté. Wodzi vi etɔ̃. Gbãtɔ enye ŋutsu, Gamel, evelia enye Samia, si nye nyɔnu eye mamlea enye Sekou si nye ŋutsu. == Kwame Nkrumah ƒe agbalẽwo == * ''Ghana: The Autobiography of Kwame Nkrumah'' (1957) ISBN 0-901787-60-4 * ''Africa Must Unite'' (1963) ISBN 0-901787-13-2 * ''African Personality'' (1963) * [http://www.marxists.org/subject/africa/nkrumah/neo-colonialism/index.htm ''Neo-Colonialism: the Last Stage of Imperialism''] (1965) ISBN 0-901787-23-X * ''Axioms of Kwame Nkrumah'' (1967) ISBN 0-901787-54-X * ''[http://www.marxists.org/subject/africa/nkrumah/1967/african-socialism-revisited.htm African Socialism Revisited]'' (1967) * ''Voice From Conakry'' (1967) ISBN 90-17-87027-3 * ''Handbook for Revolutionary Warfare'' (1968) * ''Consciencism: Philosophy and Ideology for De-Colonisation'' (1970) ISBN 0-901787-11-6 * ''Class Struggle in Africa'' (1970) ISBN 0-901787-12-4 * ''The Struggle Continues'' (1973) ISBN 0-901787-41-8 * ''I Speak of Freedom'' (1973) ISBN 0-901787-14-0 * ''Revolutionary Path'' (1973) ISBN 0-901787-22-1 == Kpɔ esiawo hã == * [[Ghana dukplɔlawo]] == Nyasiawo ƒe tsoƒe == {{Commons|Category:Kwame Nkrumah}} * [[:en:Kwame Nkrumah|Kwame Nkrumah le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia dzi]]

'''Kɔsiɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Memleɖagbe]] kple [[Dzoɖagbe]] dome. [[Kristotɔwo]] tsɔe abe ŋkeke gbãtɔ le kɔsiɖaa me. Yuropatɔwo bue abe ŋkeke mamlea le kɔsiɖaa me.
Le dukɔwo geɖe me la, Kɔsiɖagbe enye mɔkeke na dɔwɔlawo.
Le [[Gregoria ɣletigbãle]]a me la, ƒeawo dzea edzi ƒe alafa ene sia. Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒeyeye medzena Kɔsiɖagbe dzi gbeɖe o. Le ɣleti ɖesiaɖe si dzea egɔme le Kɔsiɖagbe me la, ŋkeke wuietɔ̃lia dzena Fiɖagbe dzi.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}
[[Category:Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me]]

revision.text:
'''Dzoɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Kɔsiɖagbe]] kple [[Brãɖagbe]] dome. Eƒe ŋkɔ le Yevugbewo me tso ɣleti ƒe ŋkɔ me.
Dzoɖagbe le [[Blugbe]] me enye ''Ɛdwoada'' si de sɔsɔ gbe kple Eʋegbe tɔ. Le [[Yuropa]] duwo geɖe me la, Dzoɖagbe enye ŋkeke gbãtɔ le kɔsiɖaa me.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}

revision.text:
[[File:Nicaea icon.jpg|thumb|right|Nutata si fia ''Nicea'' takpekpe gbãtɔ]] '''Xɔsemeʋuʋu''' ([[Latingbe]]: ''Symbolum Apostolorum''), enye nyawo si ɖe xɔse siwo nɔ Kristotɔwo si le blema ŋɔ̃li la fia. Kritso hame geɖe le xexeame egbe zãa xɔsemeʋuʋua abe nufafia na tsitadede kple subɔsubɔa ŋutɔ ƒe akpa vevie dometɔawo ɖeka. Hameawo aɖewo wonye Roma Katolico hame, Anglikan alo Eŋlisi hame, Presbyteria hame kple Metoɖist hame nyuiewo.
Woxɔese be woŋlɔ xɔsemeʋuʋua elabena ameaɖewo nɔ fafiam bena ɖe ko wodze abe [[Yesu]] nye amegbetɔ gake menye amegbetɔ wònye hafi o eye ahatso wò nye be wo hee ɖe ati ŋu eye wò ku. Xɔsemeʋuʋua ƒe nyawo fia nusiwo dzi Kristotɔwo xɔse fitaa na nusrɔ̃lawo kple amewo katã.
== Eme nyawo == == Xɔsemeʋuʋu le Eʋegbe me == :Mexɔ Mawu, etɔa ŋusẽ katã tɔ, :si wɔ dzi kple anyigba dzi se.
:Mexɔ Yesu Kristo, Mawu ƒe tenuvi ɖeka, si nye mía aƒetɔ dzi se, :Ame si ƒe fu wofɔ tso Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la me, :Eye Maria, dzetugbui la dzii, :Ame si kpe fu le Pontio Pilato te, :Eye wohee ɖe ati ŋu, eye wòku, eye woɖii; :Ame si yi tsiẽƒe, :Eye wòga fɔ tso amekukuwo dome le ŋkeke etɔ̃a gbe, :Eye wòyi dziƒo, :Eye wònɔ etɔa ŋusẽ katã tɔ ƒe nuɖusi me. :Afima wòa ɖa tso ava drɔ̃ ʋɔnu na amegbagbewo kple amekukuwo.
:Mexɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe dzi se, :Kple Kristo hame kɔkɔea ɖeka, :Si nye amekɔkɔewo ƒe ƒomedodo, :Nuvɔ̃wo ɖeɖe, :Ŋutilãa ƒe tsitretsitsi, :Kpakple agbemavɔ̃ dzi se. :Amen.
{{col-begin}} {{col-2}} === Nyawo le Latingbe me === ;Symbolum Apostolorum :Credo in Deum Patrem omnipotentem, :Creatorem caeli et terrae.
:Et in Iesum Christum, Filium Eius unicum, Dominum nostrum, :qui conceptus est de Spiritu Sancto, :natus ex Maria Virgine, :passus sub Pontio Pilato, :crucifixus, mortuus, et sepultus, :descendit ad ínferos, :tertia die resurrexit a mortuis, :ascendit ad caelos, :sedet ad dexteram Dei Patris omnipotentis, :inde venturus est iudicare vivos et mortuos.
:Credo in Spiritum Sanctum, :sanctam Ecclesiam catholicam, :sanctorum communionem, :remissionem peccatorum, :carnis resurrectionem, :vitam aeternam. :Amen. {{col-2}} === Nyawo le Helagbe me === <small>''Nuŋɔŋlɔwo le afia le blema Helagbe me, eye wome ŋlɔe ɖe egbeviwo ƒe gbegbɔgblɔ nu o.''</small>
:Πιστεύω εις θεòν πατέρα παντοκράτορα, :ποιητην ουρανου και γης.
:Και εις Ιησουν Χριστòν, υιον αυτου τòν μονογενη, τòν κύριον ημων, τòν συλληφθέντα εκ πνεύματος αγίου, :γεννηθέντα εκ Μαρίας της παρθένου, :παθόντα επι Ποντίου Πιλάτου, :σταυρωθέντα, θανόντα, και ταφέντα, :κατελθόντα εις τά κατώτατα, :τη τρίτη ημέρα αναστάντα απò των νεκρων, :ανελθόντα εις τους ουρανούς, :καθεζόμενον εν δεξια θεου πατρος παντοδυνάμου, :εκειθεν ερχόμενον κριναι ζωντας και νεκρούς.
:Πιστεύω εις τò Πνευμα τò Αγιον, :αγίαν καθολικην εκκλησίαν, :αγίων κοινωνίαν, :αφεσιν αμαρτιων, :σαρκος ανάστασιν, :ζωην αιώνιον. :Αμήν. :''("Triglot Concordia", St. Louis: Concordia Publishing House, 1921, p. 12)'' {{col-end}} == Nyawo le Eŋlisigbe me == {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} === Book of Common Prayer === :I believe in God the Father Almighty, Maker of heaven and earth;
:And in Jesus Christ his only Son our Lord, :Who was conceived by the Holy Ghost, :Born of the Virgin Mary, :Suffered under Pontius Pilate, :Was crucified, dead, and buried, :He descended into hell; :The third day he rose again from the dead, :He ascended into heaven, :And sitteth on the right hand of God the Father Almighty; :From thence he shall come to judge the quick and the dead.
:I believe in the Holy Ghost; :The holy Catholick <!-- This is the spelling used in the Book of Common Prayer. DO NOT CHANGE. -->Church; :The Communion of Saints; :The Forgiveness of sins; :The Resurrection of the body, :And the life everlasting. :Amen. {{col-2}} === Common Worship === :I believe in God, the Father almighty, :creator of heaven and earth.
:I believe in Jesus Christ, his only Son, our Lord, :who was conceived by the Holy Spirit, :born of the Virgin Mary, :suffered under Pontius Pilate, :was crucified, died, and was buried; :he descended into hell. :On the third day he rose again; :he ascended into heaven, :he is seated at the right hand of the Father, :and he will come to judge the living and the dead.
:I believe in the Holy Spirit, :the holy catholic Church, :the communion of saints, :the forgiveness of sins, :the resurrection of the body, :and the life everlasting. :Amen. {{col-end}}
== Kpɔ esiawo hãa == * [[Yesu]]
== Agbalẽ le xɔsemeʋuʋu ŋuti == * J.N.D. Kelly: Early Christian Creeds. 3rd edition. Longman, Harlow 1975, ISBN 0-582-49219-X (''Eŋlisigbe'')
== Nuxexlẽwo le teƒe bubuwo == * [http://www.reformed.org/documents/index.html?mainframe=http://www.reformed.org/documents/apostles_creed_orr.html International Standard Bible Encyclopedia Vol. 1](''Eŋlisigbe'') * [https://archive.is/20120801211005/www.elca.org/communication/creeds/apostles.html ELLC ƒe xɔsemeʋuʋu nyawo] Evangelical Lutheran Church le America (2004).(''Eŋlisigbe'') Wotsɔe nyawo tso afisia le 31 Siamlɔm, 2007. * [http://www.va/archive/catechism/p1s1c3a2.htm#credo Roma Katoliko hame ƒe xɔsemeʋuʋu nyawo] Catechism of the Catholic Church.(''Eŋlisigbe'') Wotsɔe nyawo tso afisia le 31 Siamlɔm, 2007. * [http://www.wlsessays.net/subjects/A/asubind.html#Apostles Nufafiawo tso xɔsemeʋuʋu ŋuti tso agbalẽnaylawo aɖewo gbɔ](''Eŋlisigbe'') Wotsɔe nyawo tso afisia le 31 Siamlɔm, 2007.
[[Category:Biblia]] [[Category:Kristo subɔsubɔ]]

*1822 - [[Ecuador]] zu dukɔ si le eɖokuisi. *1825 - [[Uruguay]] xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ tso [[Brazil]] dukɔa gbɔ. *1945 - [[United States|Amerika]] asrafowo da "''Atomic bomb''" le [[Japan]] nyigba dzi eye amewo ku geɖe. *1945 - [[Korea]] zu dukɔ si le eɖokuisi. *1965 - [[Singapore]] fe tso [[Malaysia]] dukɔa me. *1947 - [[India]] dukɔa xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ. *1947 - [[Pakistan]] dukɔa xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ. *1957 - [[Malaysia]] dukɔa xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ. *1974 - [[Ghana]] dukɔa dze ʋu kum to nuɖusi me.

{| style="margin: 0 auto; clear: both;" class="toccolours" ! style="background: #ccccff"| Ɣletiawo le ƒea me |- | [[Dzove]] · [[Dzodze]] · [[Tedoxe]] · [[Afɔfiɛ]] · [[Damɛ]] · [[Masa]] · [[Siamlɔm]] · [[Dasiamime]] · [[Anyɔnyɔ]] · [[Kele]] · [[Adeɛmekpɔxe]] · [[Dzome]] |}<noinclude>
</noinclude>

[[File:Gari processing.jpg|thumb|Gali ([[Nigeria]])]] '''Gali''' enye nuɖuɖu si bɔ le [[Afrika]] ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe lɔƒo. Wotɔna gali tso [[agbeli]] me.
==Gali tɔtɔ== [[Image:Manihot esculenta dsc07325.jpg|thumb|agbeli si wotsɔ wɔa gali]]<!--nutata le afia-------------------------------------------------------->
Hafi woa tɔ gali la, wohona agbeli tso agble me. Wokpana agbelia eye le eyome la, woklɔnae kple tsi bena ɖia katã na kɔ le eŋuti. Le esia megbe la, wolina agbelia vaseɖe esime wòa me. Le elili megbe la, wozia agbelia le kotokuwo me eye wodana kpewo ɖe kotokuawo dzi hena tsia fafia tso eme. Esia yina edzi abe ŋkeke eve lɔƒo eye le nuwuwua la, agbelia hã tsi.
Ne tsia vɔ le eme la, wo srana agbelia alebe wonɔna wuliwuli. Ne wowɔ esia vɔ la, wotɔna galia le gaze gã wo me le dzo dzi. Wometsɔna ami tɔnae o. Ne wòƒu nyuie la, ekema étɔ vɔ eye woateŋu adze ezãzã gɔme.
==Eɖuɖu== Nuɖuɖu siwo tso gali me sɔgbɔ. Wodena gali tsi me kple sukli kple notsi. Esia wɔwɔ mesẽ kroa o eye tsidede gali bɔ le sukuwo me ŋutɔ le [[Ghana]] kple [[Nigeria]]. Bubu enye gali bublu kple atadi alo dzetsi eye woateŋu aɖui enumake. Wotɔna gali hã le ami me tsɔ wɔna nuɖuɖu vovovowoe abe [[agbeli kaklo]]. Wodena tsi dzodzoe gali hã eye woblunae le dzodzi abe akple ene. Nigeriatɔwo yɔnae be [[eba]]. Woɖuna esia kple dzetsi alo tsiƒoƒo. [[Image:PeeledCassava.jpg|thumb|Agbeli kpakpa le tsi me.]]<!--nutata le afia---------------------------------------------------------------------->
==Aɖi si le agbeli me== Aɖi si Eŋlisiawo yɔna be ''cyanide'' le agbeli me. Dɔlele si woyɔna be "''tropical ataxic neuropathy''" bɔ le afisiwo agbeliɖuɖu bɔ le.<ref>[http://www.ingentaconnect.com/content/tandf/cijf/2002/00000053/00000004/art00008 Loss of residual cyanogens in a cassava food during short-term storage] Onabolu A.O.; Oluwole O.S.A.; Bokanga M.. ''International Journal of Food Sciences and Nutrition'', Volume 53, Number 4, 1 July 2002 , pp. 343-349(7)</ref> Dɔlele sia naa amewo ƒe lãme gbana eye zɔzɔ kple tsitretsitsi sena ŋutɔ. Wokpɔ be ne wowɔ galia ŋudɔ nyuie la, aɖia geɖe doa tso eme eye mega nana dɔlele o.<ref>[http://diss.kib.ki.se/2001/91-628-4894-1/ Cassava processing, consumption and dietary cyanide exposure] Onabolu, Adeyinka (7 september 2001) ''Doktorsavhandling vid Karolinska Institutet''</ref>

revision.text:
'''Presbyteria Nyanyui Hame le Ghana''' enye Kristo subɔsubɔ hame ɖeka le [[Ghana]]. Amegeɖe ga yɔnae be "'''''E.P. Church'''''" elabena eƒe ŋkɔ le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me enye ''Evangelical Presbyterian Church''.
==Hamea ɖoɖo== Hamea ƒe ɖoɖo dze egɔme kple Germania kristotɔwo si woyɔna be ''Norddeutsche Mission'' tso Bremen le [[Germany]] kple ''Basel Mission'' dɔwɔlawo. Ha eve siawo tso wode va Afrika va nɔ Mawunya dɔ wɔm le [[Eʋeawo]] dome tso ƒe 1847 me. Le [[Xexemeʋa gbãtɔ]] ŋɔli la, hame eve nɔ [[Eŋlisiawo]] te le ''[[Gold Coast]]'' eye hame adre nɔ Franseawo ƒe akpadzi le ''[[Togoland]]''. Ha gbãtɔ woɖo nɔ ''Mission Tɔve''.<ref>[http://www.reformiert-online.net/adressen/detail.php?lg=eng&id=13334 Eglise évangélique presbytérienne du Togo] ''Address data base of Reformed churches and institutions.'' Reformed Online</ref> Le aʋa sia ƒe nuwuwu la, woma dukɔ evee. Ɣetoɖloƒe nɔ Eŋlisiawo te eye ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo nɔ Franseawo te. Wowɔ hameawo ƒe sinɔɖ gbãtɔ le Damɛ 1922 me. Togbɔ be woma Togo nyigba le ɣemaɣi gɔ̃ɔ̃ɔ hã la, wowɔ sinɔɖ la le Eʋe hamea katã nu.
Le ƒe 1923 me la, mawudɔwɔlawo tso [[Skotland]] va nɔ dɔwɔm le Eŋlisi Togo kpa dzi. Afisia ye zu [[Vɔlta nutome]] le Ghana fifia. Fransedodo hame nɔ Paris hamea te. Mama sia va li ke, eye hameawo va zu hame eve blibowo. Hame eveawo ga wɔna sewo ɖeka ŋudɔ. Wo ame eveawo kpea ƒe ene sia ene le sinɔɖ ɖeka ko vaseɖe fifia.<ref>[http://www.reformiert-online.net/adressen/detail.php?lg=eng&id=12200 Presbyteria Nyanyui Hame le Ghana] ''Address data base of Reformed churches and institutions.'' Reformed Online</ref>
==Hamea ƒe dɔwɔƒe gãtɔ== Hamea ƒe dɔwɔƒe gãtɔ le [[Ho]], si nye Vɔlta nutome dugã la. Ame abe 600,000 ye le hamea me fifia eye ha 750 lɔƒo woɖo vadeɖe fifia. Nunɔla tsitsitɔ enye mɔɖeretɔ.<ref>[http://www.warc.ch/24gc/04.html Our hosts] World Alliance of Reformed Churches.</ref>
==Sukuwo== Hamea ɖo sukuwo le Vɔlta nutoame zã. Suku ɖeka si xɔ ŋkɔ ntɔ enye Mawuli Secondary suku le Ho. Amesiwo ɖo suku sia enye Aƒetɔ kple Aƒenɔ Trost, amesiwo nye mawudɔwɔlawo tso ''United Church of Christ''.<ref name=gm>[http://www.globalministries.org/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=348&Itemid=28 General Ministries] Global Ministries (7 October 2005).</ref>
==Dɔyɔƒewo== Dɔyɔƒewo hã le hamea si. Ɖeka enye Adidome Hospital.<ref name=gm/>
==Kristo hamewo si do ƒome kple E.P. Hamea== *Eglise évangélique presbytérienne du Togo *''[[:en:Lippische Landekirche]]'' *''[[:en:Church of Scotland|Church of Scotland]]'' *''[[:de:Bremische Evangelische Kirche|Bremische Evangelische Landeskirche|]]'' (''le Dzama Wikipiɖia la me'') *''[[:en:United Reformed Church|United Reformed Church]]'' - Osɔfo ɖeka tsoa E. P. Hamea alo ''Presbyterian Church of Ghana'' vayi wɔa dɔ kpli wo ƒe ene sia ene.<ref>[http://www.urc.org.uk/our_work/committees/ecumenical/news/autmn_2001.htm United Reformed Church gbeƒãɖeɖewo]</ref>
==Hadedewo== E. P. Hamea de ha kple Kristo habɔbɔwo le xexeame godoo. Wodemtɔao ɖewo wonye: *''[[:en:Christian Council of Ghana|Christian Council of Ghana]]'' *''[[:en:World Alliance of Reformed Churches|World Alliance of Reformed Churches]]'' *''[[:en:World Reformed Communion|World Reformed Communion]]''
==Nyawo ƒe tsoƒe== <references/>
==Nuxexlẽwo le teƒe bubuwo== *[http://www.reformiert-online.net/adressen/detail.php?lg=eng&id=12200 Presbyteria Nyanyui Hame le Ghana] (''Eŋlisigbe me'') *[http://www.reformiert-online.net/adressen/detail.php?lg=eng&id=13334 Eglise évangélique presbytérienne du Togo] (''Eŋlisigbe me'') *[http://warc.jalb.de/warcajsp/church.jsp?news_id=19&navi=9&church=12200 Presbyteria Nyanyui Hame le Ghana ƒe nyaɖewo] (''Eŋlisigbe me'') *[http://www.globalministries.org/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=348&Itemid=28 Global Ministries of the Christian Church (Disciples of Christ) and the United Church of Christ] (''Eŋlisigbe me'') *[http://www.urc.org.uk/our_work/committees/ecumenical/news/autmn_2001.htm News from the Ecumenical Committee (United Reformed Church)] (''Eŋlisigbe me'')
[[Category:Kristo subɔsubɔ]]

revision.text:
'''Brãɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Dzoɖagbe]] kple [[Kuɖagbe]] dome le kɔsiɖaa me. Eƒe ŋkɔ le Yevugbewo me tso woƒe mawuwo ƒe ŋkɔ me.
Brãɖagbe le [[Blugbe]] me enye ''Ɛbenada'' si de sɔsɔ gbe kple Eʋegbe tɔ. Le [[Yuropa]] duwo geɖe me la, Brãɖagbe enye ŋkeke evelia le kɔsiɖaa me.
Le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''Tuesday'', si tso ''Scandinavia'' mawu siwoyɔna be ''Tyr'' ƒe ŋkɔ me. Le [[Latingbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''Martis dies''.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}
[[Category:Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me]]

revision.comment: [[M:User:Addbot|Bot:]] Migrating 179 interwiki links, now provided by [[d:|Wikidata]] on [[d:q128]] [[M:User:Addbot/WDS|(translate me)]]
revision.text:
[[File:Georg von Rosen - Oden som vandringsman, 1886 (Odin, the Wanderer).jpg|thumb|Woden. "Odin, the Wanderer" 1886 by Georg von Rosen (1843-1923)]] '''Kuɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Brãɖagbe]] kple [[Yawoɖagbe]] dome le kɔsiɖaa me.
Kuɖagbe le [[Blugbe]] me enye ''Wukuada'' si de sɔsɔ gbe kple Eʋegbe tɔ. Le [[Yuropa]] duwo geɖe me la, Kuɖagbe enye ŋkeke etɔ̃lia le kɔsiɖaa me.
Le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''Wednesday'', si tso Dzamatɔwo ƒe mawu siwoyɔna be ''Woden'' ƒe ŋkɔ me. Le [[Latingbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''dies Mercurii''.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}
[[Category:Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me]]

[[File:Thor's Fight with the Giants (Mårten Winge) - Nationalmuseum - 18253.tiff|thumb|''Thor'', si nye ''Scandinavia'' mawu ɖeka. Etala enye Mårten Eskil Winge, 1872]] '''Yawoɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Kuɖagbe]] kple [[Fiɖagbe]] dome le kɔsiɖaa me.
Yawoɖagbe le [[Blugbe]] me enye ''Yawoada'' si de sɔsɔ gbe kple Eʋegbe tɔ. Le [[Yuropa]] duwo geɖe me la, Yawoɖagbe enye ŋkeke enelia le kɔsiɖaa me.
Le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''Thursday'', si tso mawu siwoyɔna be ''Thor'' ƒe ŋkɔ me. Ŋkɔa tso Romatɔwo ƒe ŋkɔ ''Jupiter'' ƒe ŋkɔ me.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}
[[Category:Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me]]

'''Fiɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Yawoɖagbe]] kple [[Memleɖagbe]] dome le kɔsiɖaa me.
Fiɖagbe le [[Blugbe]] me enye ''Efiada'' si de sɔsɔ gbe kple Eʋegbe tɔ. Le [[Yuropa]] duwo geɖe me la, Fiɖagbe enye ŋkeke enelia le kɔsiɖaa me.
Le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''Friday'', si tso mawu siwoyɔna be ''Freyja'' ƒe ŋkɔ me.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}
[[Category:Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me]]

revision.text:
'''Memleɖagbe''' enye ŋkeke si le [[Fiɖagbe]] kple [[Kɔsiɖagbe]] dome le kɔsiɖaa me.
Memleɖagbe le [[Blugbe]] me enye ''Memeneda'' si de sɔsɔ gbe kple Eʋegbe tɔ. Le [[Yuropa]] duwo geɖe me la, Memleɖagbe enye ŋkeke adelia le kɔsiɖaa me.
Le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me la, woyɔnae be ''Saturday'', si tso mawu siwoyɔna be ''Saturn'' ƒe ŋkɔ me.
{{Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me}}
[[Category:Ŋkekewo le kɔsiɖaa me]]

revision.text: '''Axa ɖeke melii si ŋkɔe nye "$1" o.''' Wòateŋu [[:$1|adze axa sia gɔme]].

[[File:Janus-Vatican.jpg|thumb|right|''Ianus'' ƒe nɔnɔme si wome daɖi le ''Vatican Museum'']] '''Dzove''' (alo '''Yanuar''') enye ɣleti gbãtɔ le ƒea me le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke blaetɔ-vɔ-ɖeka ye le ɣletia me. Le ɣleti siame la, pepi dona eye gbewo hã bina dzo.
Le blema ŋɔli la, Romatɔwo xɔese be ''Ianus'' nye mawu na agbowo, ʋɔtruwo, gɔmedzedzewo kple nuwuwuwo. Le esiata la, wotsɔ ŋkɔ na ɣleti gbãtɔ le ƒea me be ''Ianuarius'' si tso ''ianua'' si nye ʋɔtru le [[Latingbe]] me.
Tedoxe enye ɣleti gbãtɔ le blema ŋɔli gake tso ƒe 153 BC la, Romatɔwo trɔe, eye Dzove va zu ɣleti gbãtɔ.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Dzove me == [[File:GarnetCrystalUSGOV.jpg|thumb|right|Kpe si woyɔna be ''garnet'' le Eŋlisigbe me]] * [[1789]] - Wotia Amerika dukplɔla gbãtɔ. * [[1946]] - ''[[United Nations]]'' wɔ woƒe takpekpe gbãtɔ le [[London]].
=== Mɔkekewo === * Ƒe yeye Ŋkeke - Dzove ƒe ŋkeke gbãtɔ * Martin Luther King Ŋkeke le [[United States]] - Dzoɖagbe etɔ̃lia * Australia Ŋkeke le [[Australia]] - Dzove 26 * Republic Ŋkeke le [[India]] - Dzove 26
== Nu bubuwo == [[File:Gartennelke 1.jpg|thumb|right|''Carnation'' seƒoƒo]] * Ɣleti sia ƒe [[seƒoƒo]] tɔxewo wonye "''carnation''" kple "''snowdrop''" le Eŋlisigbe me. * Dzove ƒe kpe xɔasi enye kpe si woyɔna le Eŋlisigbe me be ''garnet''.
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/January Dzove le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me]
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Dzove]]
Axa siwo ŋu ŋku mele o.

revision.comment: Undid edits by [[Special:Contribs/2601:647:4D80:3190:D0B1:1BF1:C7B:C5C2|2601:647:4D80:3190:D0B1:1BF1:C7B:C5C2]] ([[User talk:2601:647:4D80:3190:D0B1:1BF1:C7B:C5C2|talk]]) to last version by YiFeiBot: reverting vandalism
revision.text:
<center> {| width="60%" style="border:1px solid black" | <inputbox> type=search bgcolor=#eeeeff# buttonlabel=Yi (Di tanya sia) searchbuttonlabel=Dii </inputbox> |} </center> "Yi (Di tanya sia)" tatia akɔ wò ayi axa yeye dzi kple tanya si sɔ kple esi wòŋlɔ ɖe goa me, negbe axaa ɖe li kpakple tanya mawo xoxo ko. Teƒe le axa yeye sia dzi si wòateŋu atia na kpekpeɖeŋu kple nuwoŋlɔŋlɔ ne anɔ hahiãm na wò. Mehiã be na gbugbɔ ava afii na axa yeye gɔmedzedze o. Woateŋu adze wo gɔme kple nuŋɔŋlɔ dzẽwo tatia. Megavɔ̃ na nuyeyewo gɔmedzedze kroa o.
Ne wòle nuyeye gɔmedzem la, ɖo ŋku edzi be: * Tanya si wòtia le vevie ŋutɔ, elabena eya ye le tanya zu gbe na axaa kat. * Enyo wu be wòdzra ɖo nyuie hafi gɔmedzedzea, elabena ebɔbɔ wu vodadawo ɖɔɖɔɖo le emegbe. * Ɖo ŋku nusiwo woɖe mɔ na le Wikipiɖia la dzi. * Kpɔe ɖa gbã be woŋlɔ nusi wòadi be yeaŋlɔ xoxo kple tanya bubua ɖe mahã. * Ne nye ɖe ko wòadi be yea doe akpɔ gbã la, ekema yi [[Wikipedia:Sandbox|''Keme'']] gbã.
[[m:Help:User rights|Mɔnana]] ɖeka si woateŋu ana [[Template:Status|ŋdɔwɔlawo]] enye be woaɖe mɔ nawo be "''createpage''", si ana wòateŋu adze nuŋɔŋlɔ yeye gɔme. Wikia ateŋu ana mɔ sia si wo me xe mɔ na xoxo o (esia enye [[m:Help:User_rights#Defaults|default]]), alo ana amewo si ŋlɔ ŋkɔ.
''Kpekpeɖeŋu na nuwotrɔtrɔ'' le afisiafi si wòa nɔ dɔ wɔm lw eyata mele bubu ge o. <!-- For general editing matters and details on the [[w:markup language|markup language]] of the [[Help:Filling the page|wikitext]], see [[Help:Editing]]. ''If you want to experiment, use the [[{{ns:4}}:Sandbox|sandbox]] first.'' Note: Sandbox page is currently blank. The purpose of this blank page is to use as a whiteboard to experiment. --><!-- Anyone, including you, can write these help documents at [[m:Help:Contents]], and you are most likely allowed to edit the site, {{SITENAME}} that you are looking at now! Just type a title in the box at the bottom of the page, click "Create article", and start writing. You should probably create a link to the article in a related page; linking to a page is enough to "create" the page! New pages can also be started by following a link to a non-existent page, which likewise launches the edit page. See [[#Starting a page through the URL|Starting a page through the URL]] below. --> == Nya veviwo == * '''[[Help:Didim|Dii]]''' nàkpɔe ɖa be ame aɖe ŋlɔ nu ma xoxoa hafi nàdze tɔwò gɔme. Gbɔ dzi ɖi nàtia tanya nyuie. *Gbugbɔ to esiwo ku ɖe nu si nèdi be yeaŋlɔ la me e.g.: **ale si wona ŋkɔ wo; kpɔ [[Help:Page name]]. **axa yeye gahiã, alo manyo be nàŋlɔ nua atsɔ atɔ ɖe bubu si le xoxo nu oa? Enyo wu be nu kpuiwo na tɔ ɖe bubuwo nu wu be nàdze axa bubu gɔme. Ne eva didi akpa la, woate ŋu ama eme eve. **Le esime nèle nua ŋlɔm la, kpɔ <u>Ƒomedodowo</u> ɖa le axaa dzi. Kpɔ egbɔ be axaa sɔ kple esiwo do ƒome kplii. **Ne naneke mele afi ma o la, ekema axa sia nye tsɔ̃evi eye ehiã be nàna axa bubuwo nado ƒome kplii.
==Axa yeye gɔme dzedze tso ƒomedodo dzi alo le edidi vɔ megbe== Àte ŋu adze axa yeye gɔme kple ƒomedodo dzĩ tiatia. Esia atsɔ wò ayi axa yeye dzi kple tanya si sɔ kpakple esi nètia la, eye ate ŋu adze nuŋɔŋlɔ gɔme enumake.
yesuÁÁ kristo yenye mɔla nyateƒe la kple agbe la
==Nyaŋuɖoɖo go == Tia nuŋɔŋlɔa ɖe. Ne eƒe ŋkɔ biã la, ekema womedze egɔme haɖe o.
<center> {| width="60%" style="border:1px solid black" | <inputbox> type=search width=42 buttonlabel=Yi searchbuttonlabel=Dii break=no </inputbox> |} </center>
Kpɔ [[#Nya veviewo|Nya veviewo]] le axa sia tame kple [[Help:Inputbox]].

Mɔɖeɖewo

Taflatse, mítsɔe be nusiwo katã netsɔ kpe ɖe {{SITENAME}} ŋu lii fãa le $2 la nu (kpɔ $1 me nyawo). Ne madze ŋuwò be amebubuwo natrɔ asi le nusiwo newɔ ŋuti o, eye woagbugbɔ dɔsiwo newɔ ama na amebubuwo fãa o la, mega dae ɖe afisia o.
Wòle ŋugbe dom na mí bena wò ŋutɔe ŋlɔ nusiawo, alo etsɔe tso afisi mɔɖeɖe li fãa be amesiame na tsɔ nuwo tso afima fãa. MEGA DA NUSIWO ŊU MƆƉEƉE MELI NA O ƉE AFISIA O!
Ŋku nenɔ afii ŋu
Ŋku nenɔ afii ŋu

[[File:Améthystre sceptre2.jpg|thumb|right|Kpe xɔasi si woyɔna le Eŋlisigbe me be ''amethyst'']] [[File:5p pwy pansies.jpg|thumb|right|''Violet'' (Eŋlisigbe)]] [[File:Primula-vulgaris-flowers.jpg|thumb|right|''Primrose'' (Eŋlisigbe)]] '''Dzodze''' (alo '''Februar''') enye ɣleti evelia le ƒea me le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Eyae nye kpuitɔ wu le ɣletiawo katã me. Ŋkeke 28 ye le ɣletia me, gake le ƒe ene sia ene megbe la, ŋkeke 29 ye le eme.
Februar ŋkɔa tso ''februum'' le [[Latingbe]] me si gɔme enye kɔkɔ. Februar ŋkeke 15 enye gbe si wo kɔa nuwo ŋuti le [[Romatɔwo]] ƒe blema ŋɔli wo.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Dzodze me == * [[Groundhog Day]] / [[Candlemas]] ([[Dzodze 2]]) * ''Constitution Ŋkeke'' ([[Mexico]]) ([[Dzodze 5]]) * ''Waitangi'' Ŋkeke, [[New Zealand]] ([[Dzodze 6]]) * ''[[Abraham Lincoln]]'' ƒe dzigbe ([[Dzodze 12]]) * ''[[St. Valentine Ŋkeke]]'' ([[Dzodze 14]]) * [[Aflaga Ŋkeke (Canada)|Aflaga Ŋkeke]] - [[Canada]] ([[Dzodze 15]]) * [[Kim Jong-Il]] ƒe dzigbe, ([[Dzodze 16]]) * Fia Harald ƒe dzigbe ([[Norway]]) ([[Dzodze 21]]) * ''[[International Mother Language Day]]'' ([[Dzodze 21]]) * ''Thinking Day'' (Girl Guides) ([[Dzodze 22]]) * ''B.P. Ŋkeke'' (Skout Habɔbɔ [[Canada]]) ([[Dzodze 22]]) * ''Founder's Day'' (Skout Habɔbɔ (UK)) ([[Dzodze 22]]) * Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke ([[Dominican Republic]]) ([[Dzodze 27]]) * ''Massacre Day'', (Taiwan) (Dzodze 28) * [[George Washington|Washington Ŋkeke]] (Dzoɖa etɔ̃lia)
== Nya bubuwo == * Ŋkeke gbãtɔ le Dzodze, [[Tedoxe]] kple [[Adeɛmekpɔxe]] me dzea ŋkeke ɖeka dzi le kɔsiɖaa me. * Ɣleti sia ƒe kpe xɔasi enye esi woyɔna be ''amethyst'' le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me. * Dzodze seƒoƒo tɔxewo nye ''violet'' (Eŋlisigbe) kple ''primrose'' (Eŋlisigbe).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=February&oldid=150895589 Dzodze le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me] - Dasiamime 13, 2007
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}

revision.text:
[[File:EleanorRooseveltHumanRights.png|thumb|250px|right|[[Eleanor Roosevelt]] kple Amegbetɔ ƒe Ablɔɖevinyenye ŋu Kpeɖoɖodzinyawo le Spaingbe me.]] '''Amegbetɔ ƒe Ablɔɖevinyenye ŋu Kpeɖoɖodzinya''' enye kpeɖoɖodzinyawo si [[Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo ƒe Takpekpegã]] la ŋlɔ daɖi le [[10 Dzome]] [[1948]] le [[Palais de Chaillot]], [[Paris]]. Ɖoɖo 30 le eme si dzi [[Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo]] da asi ɖo na amegbetɔwo katã le xexeame godoo.
"Wodzi amegbetɔwo katã ablɔɖeviwoe eye wodzena bubu kple gomekpɔkpɔ sɔsɔe. Susu kple dzitsinya le wo dometɔ ɖesiaɖe si eyata wodze be woanɔ anyi le ɖekawɔwɔ blibo me." — ''Kpeɖodzinya ɖoɖo I''
== Eŋɔŋlɔ == Le nuvɔ̃ɖi siwo [[Adolf Hitler]] kple eƒe asrafowo wɔ le [[Xexemeʋa evelia]] me ta la, amewo geɖe va bui be ehiã be woaŋlɔ sewo le amegbetɔwo ƒe ablɔɖevinyenye ŋuti. Esia na be [[Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo ƒe Nuŋlɔlagã]] tia [[John Peters Humphrey]] si tso [[Canada]] be wòakpɔ eŋɔŋlɔ dzi. Amesiwo kpe ɖe eŋu wodome tɔa ɖewo enye [[Eleanor Roosevelt]] tso [[United States]], [[Jacques Maritain]] kple [[René Cassin]] tso [[France]], [[Charles Malik]] tso [[Lebanon]], kple [[P. C. Chang]] tso [[China]]. Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo ƒe Takpekpegã si kpe le 10 Dzome 1948 wɔ akametatia le nya sia ŋuti, eye dukɔ 48 lɔ ɖe dzi, 0 gbe, eye 8 mede dzesia ɖeke o.[http://www.americanrhetoric.com/speeches/eleanorrooseveltdeclarationhumanrights.htm Eleanor Roosevelt Address to the United Nations General Assembly] 9 Dzome 1948, le Paris, France. == Emenyawo == Woŋlɔe abe dukɔ me sewo ene eye wodze egɔme kple Kpɔkplɔyiɖeme. Wokplɔ esia ɖo kpli ɖoɖo 30 sɔ̃. == Gbewo == Woŋlɔ ɖe ''[[Guinness Book of Records]]'' la me be nyasiawo nye agbalẽ si gɔme woɖe ɖe gbe bubuwo me wòsɔgbɔ wu le xexeame.[http://portal.unesco.org/education/fr/file_download.php/6bbab6974c53987ab4fb801fb8b8abfaUN_decade_HR.pdf United Nations Decade for Human Rights Education (1995-2004)]7 Anyɔnyɔ 2000. [[Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo ƒe Takpekpegã]]. [[Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo]] ŋutɔ ɖe nya siawo gɔme ɖe gbe 366 me.[http://www.unhchr.ch/udhr/navigate/alpha.htm Alphabetical Listing of All Translations (366)] OHCHR. == Nyasiawo ƒe tsoƒe == == Nuxexlẽwo le teƒe bubuwo == * [http://www.unhchr.ch/udhr/lang/ewe.htm Amegbetɔ ƒe Ablɔɖevinyenye ŋu Kpeɖoɖodzinya menyawo] == Kpeɖeŋu nyawo == * Metsɔ nya siawo ƒe akpa gãtɔ tso [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Universal_Declaration_of_Human_Rights&oldid=150925593 Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la dzi] le 13 Dasiamime 2007. [[Category:Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo]]

[[File:Emerald specimen with matrix.jpg|thumb|right|Kpe xɔasi si woyɔna be ''emerald''.]] '''Damɛ''' (alo '''Mai''') enye ɣleti atɔ̃lia le ƒea me le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 31 ye le ɣletia me.
Helatɔwo tsɔ woƒe mawu ''Maia'' ƒe ŋkɔ na ɣleti sia. Romatɔwo bui abe vidzidzi mawu ene eye woyɔnae be Bona Dea. Wonɔ eƒe zã ɖum le ɣletia me.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Damɛ me == === Mɔkekewo === * [[Damɛ 1]]: - [[May Day]] alo [[Damɛ Ŋkeke]] alo [[Dɔwɔlawo ƒe ŋkeke]] * Le dukɔ geɖe me la, [[May Day]] alo [[Damɛ Ŋkeke]] le [[Damɛ 1]] dzi. Woɖunae abe [[Labor Day]] alo [[Dɔwɔlawo Ŋkeke]]le dukɔ geɖe me. * Le [[United Kingdom]] la, [[May Day]] nye [[Damɛ 1]], gake woɖuna mɔkekea le Dzoɖagbe gbãtɔ dzi le Damɛ me. * "Finland's Day" le [[Finland]] dze Damɛ 12lia dzi.
=== Nusiwo menɔna ŋkeke ɖeka dzi o === [[File:Convallaria majalis l.jpg|thumb|left|Seƒoƒo si Eŋlisiawo yɔna be ''Lily of the Valley'']] * [[Ɣedzeƒe Kristotɔwo]] ɖua [[Easter]] le kɔsiɖa ɖeka le [[Afɔfiɛ 4]] kple [[Damɛ 8]] lia dzi. * Ne ɣleti le ɖiɖim le Damɛ me la, woɖua ''[[Vesak]]'' si ɖoa ŋku [[Siddhartha Gautama]] ƒe dzidzi, agbenɔnɔ kple ku dzi. * Le [[Canada]] la, woɖua [[Victoria Ŋkeke]] le [[Dzoɖagbe]] si do ŋgɔ alo dze [[Damɛ 24]] dzi. Le [[Quebec]] la, woyɔe be ''[[National Patriotes Day]]''.
Memleɖagbe gbãtɔ * [[Kentucky Derby]] le [[Kentucky]], [[United States]].
Kɔsiɖagbe evelia * enye [[Vinɔwo Ŋkeke]] le [[Anguilla]], [[Aruba]], [[Australia]], [[Austria]], [[Bahamas]], [[Barbados]], [[Bangladesh]], [[Belgium]], [[Belize]], [[Bermuda]], [[Bonaire]], [[Brazil]], [[Brunei]], [[Canada]], [[Chile]], [[Colombia]], [[Cuba]], [[Croatia]], [[Curaçao]], [[Czechia]], [[Denmark]], [[Ecuador]], [[Estonia]], [[Finland]], [[Germany]], [[Greece]], [[Grenada]], [[Honduras]], [[Hong Kong]], [[Iceland]], [[India]], [[Italy]], [[Jamaica]], [[Japan]], [[Latvia]], [[Malta]], [[Malaysia]], [[Netherlands|The Netherlands]], [[New Zealand]], [[Peru]], [[Philippines]], [[Puerto Rico]], [[Singapore]], [[Slovakia]], [[South Africa]], [[Suriname]], [[Switzerland]], [[Taiwan]], [[Trinidad and Tobago]], [[Turkey]], [[United States]], [[Uruguay]], [[Venezuela]], [[Zimbabwe]].
Fiɖagbe gbãtɔ * [[No Pants Day]]
Memleɖagbe evelia * Woɖua [[World Fair Trade Day]]
Dzoɖagbe mamlea * [[United States]] - Woƒe [[Memorial Day]] le [[Damɛ 30]], gake woɖunae le Dzoɖagbe mamlea dzi le Damɛ me.
== Nu bubuwo == [[File:Luscinia megarhynchos Istria 01.jpg|thumb|right|Xe si woyɔna be ''nightingale'' le Eŋlisigbe me.]] Ɣletia ƒe [[xe]] tɔxe enye esi Eŋlisiawo yɔna be ''nightingale''. [[Seƒoƒo]] tɔxewo enye ''Lily of the Valley'' kple ''Common Hawthorn'' le Elisigbe me. Kpe xɔasi na ɣletia enye ''emerald'' le Eŋlisigbe me.
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=May&oldid=150814504 Damɛ le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me]
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Damɛ]]
tɔtrɔ mamlea
Du yeyewo le asiwò le $1
Axa siwo le afisia do ƒome kple '''[[:$1]]''':

revision.text:
'''Wotutu {{#switch:{{NAMESPACE}} |Talk|Category talk|Help talk|Portal talk|Template talk|Wikipedia talk=talk page |User talk=user's talk page |axa sia }} eye wole eŋu dzɔm bena ameaɖeke maga gbugbɔ adze egɔme o.''' *Ne ele nu tɔxea ɖe dim la, wòakpɔe le '''[{{fullurl:Special:Log|page={{FULLPAGENAME}}}} activity logs for this page]''', alo wòateŋu abia [[Wikipedia:Administrators|dɔdzikpɔla]] si le axaa ŋu dzɔm. *Ne eɖo afisia tso axa bubu dzi la, wòateŋu aɖe [[Special:Whatlinkshere/{{FULLPAGENAME}}|ƒomedodo]] siwo le axa ma dzi ɖa tsɔ kpe ɖe Wikipiɖia la ŋuti. *Ne wòadi be yea gbugbɔ adze egɔme la, wòateŋu bia le {{#switch:{{NAMESPACE}} |Category|Help|Portal|Template|Image|User|Wikipedia|=axa sia ƒe [[{{TALKPAGENAME}}|nyamedzroƒe]] }}. *Dɔdzikpɔlawo woakpɔ axa sia ƒe emenuwo kpakple tata xoxoawo le [[Special:Undelete/{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]. *'''Dɔdzikpɔlawo: Taflatse, mizã [[Wikipedia:Axatutu siwo ŋu wole dzɔmdzɔm]] boŋ.'''
[[Category:Protected deleted pages]] {{#ifeq:{{NAMESPACE}}|Category|[[Category:Protected deleted categories]]}} ---- '''Nya veviaɖewo''' *Template sia '''li na axa siwo amewo woadi be yewo anɔ ŋɔŋlɔm basabasa ko.''' Mega dae ɖe axa ɖesiaɖe si wòtutu dzi o! *Mega [[WP:SUBST|"''substitute''"]] template sia o. *Dɔdzikpɔlawo ko woazã template sia elabena ahiã be woa dzɔ axaa ŋu. '''Eŋudɔwɔwɔ'''
Axa si dzi woda template sia ɖo la yia [[:Category:Axatutu siwo ŋu wole dzɔmdzɔm]] me enumake. Kpɔ [[Wikipedia:Axatutu siwo wole dzɔmdzɔm]] kple [[:en:User:DumbBOT/TimeSortedPD]] hã. #Dae ɖe axaa dzi kple '''{{axasiwotutu}}'''. #Ne wòadi be yeaɖo axatutuwo ɖe ɣleti nu la, ŋlɔ '''{{axasiwotutu|Ɣleti Ƒe}}'''. Le kpɔɖeŋu me, '''{{axasiwotutu|Dzove 2007}}'''. #Dzɔ axa sia ŋu eye ŋlɔ nya nusi newɔ ɖe ''Summary'' goa me. ==Kpɔ esiawo hã== *[[Wikipedia:Axatutu siwo ŋu wole dzɔmdzɔm]] *[[Wikipedia:Axa siwo ŋu wole dzɔmdzɔm]] [[Category:Templatewo]]

revision.comment: Bot: Migrating 201 interwiki links, now provided by [[d:|Wikidata]] on [[d:q120]] [[M:User:Addbot/WDS|(translate me)]]
revision.text:
[[File:Alexandrite 26.75cts.jpg|thumb|right|Alexandrite kpewo]] '''Masa''' (alo '''Yuni''') enye ɣleti adelia le ƒea me le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 30 ye le ɣletia me.
Le blema ŋɔli la, [[Romatɔwo]] tsɔ [[Yuno]] si nye woƒe mawu ɖeka ƒe ŋkɔ na ɣleti sia. [[Helatɔwo]] yɔna mawu sia be [[Hera]] (Ήρα) {{IPA|[ˈhiːrə]}} le [[Helagbe]] me.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Masa me == * [[Aflaga Ŋkeke]]wo le [[Sweden]] ([[Masa 6]]), [[United States]] ([[Masa 14]]), [[Denmark]] ([[Masa 15]]), [[Argentina]] ([[Masa 20]]), and [[Romania]] ([[Masa 26]]). * [[Masa 16]] enye ''Youth Day'' alo "Ɖekakpuiwo ƒe ŋkeke" le [[South Africa]]. * ''Wimbledon Tennis'' hoʋiʋlia nɔa ɣleti sia me. * [[Philippines]] dukɔa ƒe ɖokuisinɔnɔ ŋkeke dze [[Masa 12]] dzi. * [[Eritrea]] [[Masa 20]] nye "''Martyrs Day''" .
=== Nusiwo menɔna ŋkeke ɖeka dzi o === * [[Vitɔwo ƒe Ŋkeke]] :* Kɔsiɖagbe evelia le Masa me le [[Belgium]]. Le [[United States]], [[United Kingdom]], Mexico, [[Netherlands]], [[Ireland]] kple [[Canada]] la, woɖuie le Kɔsiɖagbe etɔ̃lia dzi le Masa me.
== Nu bubuwo == * Ɣleti aɖeke meli si ƒe ŋkeke gbãtɔ dzea esi dzi Masa tɔ dzea le kɔsiɖaa me.
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=June Masa le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la me] * Ɣletia ƒe seƒoƒo enye ''rose'' alo ''honeysuckle'' le [[Eŋlisigbe]] me. * Masa ƒe kpe xɔasi enye ''[[:en:pearl|pearl]]'', ''[[:en:Alexandrite|Alexandrite]]'', or [[:en:Orthoclase|''moonstone'']].
{{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}
[[Category:Ɣletiwo]] [[Category:Masa]]

[[Image:Heckert GNU white.svg|right|150px]] '''{{BASEPAGENAME}}, woezɔ ɖe Eʋe Wikipiɖia loo!'''! Akpe na nusiwo newɔ va yi le Eʋe Wikipiɖia la dzi! Mexɔese be ekpɔe be Eʋegbe ŋlɔlawo wo me sɔgbɔ ɖe afisia o. Míele mɔ kpɔm be ateŋu akpe ɖe mía ŋu. Ne mese Eʋegbe nyuie haɖe o hã la, megblẽ kura o. Megavɔ̃ o, mɔxexea ɖeke meli o. Ateŋu adze nuwo ŋɔŋlɔ gɔme fifia gɔ̃ hã. Ne ele xaxaa ɖe me la, ateŋu abiam fãa le nye nyamedzroƒe. Ɣesiaɣi neŋlɔ nane ɖe nyamedzroƒe la, ɖo ŋku dzi na da dzesi sia (~~~~) ɖe nuwuwu. Esia ada ŋkɔ wò (alo dzesi wò), ŋkeke kple gaƒoƒoa si neŋlɔe la ɖe nuŋɔŋlɔa ƒe nuwuwu. Mí me kpɔ ŋlɔ kpekpeɖeŋu nyawo haɖeke o. Ne ele kpekpeɖeŋu dim la, biam le nye nyamedzroƒe alo ne ese gbe siawo la, kpɔ Wikipiɖia siawo ƒe kpekpeɖeŋu nyawo ɖa: *[[Template:Woezɔ/Inglisigbe|English]] | [[Template:Woezɔ/Fransegbe|Français]] | [[Template:Woezɔ/Dzamagbe|Deutsch]]. '''Ayekoo na wò! Netsɔ!'''!
[[Category:Templatewo]]

[[File:Anglospeak.png|300px|right|thumb|Eŋlisigbe]] [[File:EN English Language Symbol ISO 639-1 IETF Language Tag Icon.svg|thumb|left|upright|EN ([[ISO 639]]-1)]] '''Eŋlisigbe''' (''English'') enye gbe si tso [[England]] eye wogblɔnae le dukɔwo me zã. Dukɔawo dometɔa ɖewo enye [[Australia]], [[Canada]], [[Ireland]], [[New Zealand]] kple [[United States]]. Wodona Eŋlisigbe le dɔwɔƒewo le dukɔwo siwo dzi Eŋlisiawo ɖu vayi le [[Afrika]] kple [[Asia]] katã.
[[Afrika]] dukɔ aɖe siwo doa Eŋlisigbe lawoe nye [[Eritrea]], [[Eswatini]], [[Gambia]], [[Ghana]], [[Kenya ]], [[Lezoto]], [[Liberia]], [[Malawi]], [[Namibia]], [[Nigeria]], [[Rwanda]], [[South Africa]], [[South Sudan]], [[Sudan]], [[Tanzania]], [[Uganda]], [[Zambia]], [[Zimbabwe]].
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [[:en:English language|Eŋlisigbe le Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia la dzi]]
[[Category:Gbewo]]

==[[User:Natsubee|Natsubee]]== I hereby nominate User:Natsubee to be sysop. Ewe is his native language. Here are Natsubee's [http://ee.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Contributions/Natsubee Contributions].
=== (+) Support === # --[[User:Jose77|Jose77]] 00:31, 14 June 2007 (UTC) # Support, is a native speaker. There are too few admins here right now. I'm currently in Ghana so my connectivity is extremely limited. Warmly support the help of Natsubee in admin duties. — [[User:Mark Dingemanse|mark]] [[User Talk:Mark Dingemanse|✎]] 11:31, 22 June 2007 (UTC)

=== ( ) Neutral ===

[[File:LocationSierraLeone.svg|right|180px]] [[File:Coat of arms of Sierra Leone.svg|right|150px]] [[File:Flag of Sierra Leone.svg|right|200px|border]] '''Sira Liɔ̃''' enye dukɔ si le [[Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe]] kpadzi lɔƒo. Edo liƒo kple [[Liberia]] le eƒe ɣedzeƒe kpadzi, eye [[Gini]] ƒo xlãae tso eƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo vayi eƒe dzigbe. Aƒu si woyɔna be [[{{SIL|Atlantic Ocean}}]] la le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe lɔƒo. Sierra Leone ƒe dugã enye [[Freetown]], si gɔme enye "ablɔɖe du". Gbe si wogblɔna le dɔwɔƒewo le dua me enye [[Eŋlisigbe]], elabena Eŋlisiawo ɖu wodzi vayi.
{{Afrika dukɔwo}} <!--Gbe bubuwo-->
[[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]] [[Category:Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe dukɔwo]]

{{Dzinu-sia}} {{ɣleti le ƒea me}} '''[[Anyɔnyɔ]] [[2007]]''' enye ɣleti asiekelia le ƒea me. Ŋkeke gbãtɔ dze [[Memleɖagbe]] dzi eye awu enu le ŋkeke 30 megbe le [[Kɔsiɖagbe]] dzi. ==Nusiwo woɖo daɖi== * [[Anyɔnyɔ 2]] - [[Guatemala]]tɔwo le woƒe [[President of Guatemala|president]], vice-president, kple dukplɔla bubuwo tiam egbe. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 7]] - 2007 Rugby Xexeame hoʋiʋli adze egɔme le [[Paris]], [[France]]. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 10]] - 2007 FIFA nyɔnu xexeame katã bɔl hoʋiʋli la adze egɔme le [[Shanghai]]. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 11]] - Partial [[solar eclipse]]. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 11]] - [[9/11]] de ƒe ade le ɣleti sia me. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 15]] - [[Mexico]] tɔwo ƒe Ɖokuisinɔnɔ ŋkeke * [[Anyɔnyɔ 16]] - [[Helatɔwo]] le akametatia wɔm egbe. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 22]] - [[Kele 7]] - Woaɖu [[Oktoberfest]] le [[Munich]], [[Germany]]. == Mɔkekewo le ɣleti sia me == * [[Anyɔnyɔ 3]] - [[Dɔwɔlawo ƒe ŋkeke]] le [[Canada]] kple [[United States]]. * [[Anyɔnyɔ 13]] - [[Rosh Hashanah]] ([[Yudatɔwo]]) * [[Anyɔnyɔ 13]] - [[Ramadan]] adze egɔme ([[Islamic]]) * [[Anyɔnyɔ 22]] - [[Yom Kippur]] ([[Yudatɔwo]]) * [[Anyɔnyɔ 23]] - [[Autumnal equinox]] * [[Anyɔnyɔ 24]] - [[Heritage Day]] ([[South Africa]]) * [[Anyɔnyɔ 27]] - [[Sukkot]] ŋkeke gbãtɔ ([[Yudatɔwo]]) * [[Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 1]] - [[Uzbekistan]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 2]] - [[Transnistria]] kple [[Vietnam]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 3]] - [[Qatar]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 6]] - [[Swaziland]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 7]] - [[Brazil]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 8]] - [[Macedonia]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 9]] - [[North Korea]] kple [[Tajikistan]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 15]] - [[Costa Rica]], [[Honduras]], kple [[Nicaragua]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 16]] - [[Mexico]] kple [[Papua New Guinea]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 18]] - [[Chile]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 21]] - [[Armenia]], [[Belize]], kple [[Malta]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 22]] - [[Bulgaria]] kple [[Mali]] ** [[Anyɔnyɔ 30]] - [[Botswana]] ==Nusiwo le edzi yim le ɣletisia me== {{Nyadzɔdzɔwo}}
