revision.comment: /* Traduition de l'interface de la Wikipedia en éwé */
revision.text:
==Eʋegbe Wikipiɖia la ƒe ''Interface'' gɔmeɖeɖe== Ehiã be míaɖe nuŋɔŋlɔwo (alo ''System messages)'' siwo le Eʋe Wikipiɖia la me ɖe Eʋegbe me. Medze wo gɔmeɖeɖe xoxo. Zi alesi vovototowo sɔgbɔ le Eʋegbe dodo me ta la, ɖewomahĩ anɔ eme bena menye wo katã yea de bliboe o. Mɔ li fãa be na ɖɔ esiwo le afisia ɖo eye ne ele Wikipiɖia la zam eye ne kpɔ bubuwo hã la, de dzesi wo le afima alo afia ne mía trɔ asi le woŋu. Míave mianu bena miakpe ɖe míaŋu na Eʋegbe Wikipiɖia la na de to. Akpe na mi katã.--[[User:Natsubee|Natsubee]] 10:35, 4 Anyɔnyɔ 2007 (UTC)
===Translation of the Ewe Wikipedia Interface=== The system messages of the Ewe Wikipedia Interface need to be translated into the Ewe language. I have started with some of them already. As you are well aware however, there are many variations to the Ewe language and my translations may not always be the best ones. Please fill free to add to or change the suggestions below. If you come across some of the system messages already done and feel there is a better translation, please note it on the talk page of the particular translation in the Mediawiki talk namespace or on here. Thanks for your cooperation.--[[User:Natsubee|Natsubee]] 10:35, 4 Anyɔnyɔ 2007 (UTC)
===Traduction de l'interface de la Wikipedia en éwé=== Les messages système de l'interface de la Wikipedia en éwé doivent être traduits en langue d'éwé. J'ai déjà commencé par certains d'entre eux. Comme vous en êtes bien averti cependant, il y a beaucoup de variations à la langue d'éwé et mes traductions peuvent ne pas être toujours les meilleures. Vous pouvez ajouter ou bien changer les suggestions ci-dessous. Si vous trouvez certaines traductions des messages système déjà faits et vous croyez qu'il y a une meilleure traduction, notez-la sur la page d'entretien de la traduction particulière dans le namespace d'entretien de Mediawiki ou dessus ici. Merci pour votre coopération. (Pouvez vous m'excuser - Je ne parle pas le français très bien. Merci.--[[User:Natsubee|Natsubee]] 10:35, 4 Anyɔnyɔ 2007 (UTC)
==Nusiwo hiã gɔmeɖeɖe== *Main Page = ? *Community portal = '''Takpekpewɔƒe''' *Current events = '''Nusiwo le dzɔdzɔm'''; '''Nusiwo le edzi yim''' *Recent changes = '''Tɔtrɔ yeyewo''' *Random page = '''Axaa ɖe ko''' *Help = '''Kpekpeɖeŋu''' *Donations = '''Wɔ nunana'''; '''Nunanawo''' *Navigation = '''Kuɖɔɖoɖo'''; '''Mɔtabiala''' *Search = '''Dii'''; '''Nuwodidi''' *Go = '''Yi''' *Toolbox = '''Dɔwɔnuɖaka''' *What links here = '''Nusiwo kaa afii ŋu''' *Related changes = '''Tɔtrɔ siwo kaa afii''' *Upload file = '''Ɖo agbalẽ ɖa''' *Special pages = '''Axa tɔxewo''' *Printable version = ? *Permanent link = ? *Cite this article = ? *In other languages = '''Le gbe bubuwo me''' *Article = '''Nuŋɔŋlɔ''' *Discussion = '''Nyamedzroƒe''' (place for discussion); '''Nyawodaƒe''' *Edit = '''Trɔ asi le eŋu'''; '''Ɖɔeɖo''' *History = '''Xoxoawo''' *Delete = '''Tutui''' *Protect = ? *Log in = '''Ge ɖe eme''' *Create Account = '''Ŋlɔ ŋkɔ daɖi'''; *Create article = '''Dze nuŋɔŋlɔ yeye gɔme.''' *Log out = '''Do le eme''' *Not logged in = ? *Move = '''Ɖɔli eƒe nɔƒe''' *Move page = '''Ɖɔli eƒe nɔƒe''' *Move this page = '''Ɖɔli axa sia ƒe nɔƒe''' *moved to = '''Wo hee yi''' *[[$1]] moved to [[$2]] = '''[[$1]] wohee yi [[$2]]'''; '''wohe [[$1]] yi [[$2]]''' *Reason = ? *Watch = '''Le ŋku ɖe eŋu''' *My Watchlist = ? *My talk = ? *My preferences = '''Nyeƒe didiwo''' *My contributions = '''Nyeƒe nuŋɔŋlɔwo''' *Summary = ? *This is a minor edit = '''Esia nye tɔtrɔ sue aɖe ko''' *Watch this page = '''Le ŋku ɖe axa sia ŋu''' *Save page = '''Dzra axa sia ɖo''' *Show preview = '''Fiae do ŋgɔ''' *Show changes = '''Fia tɔtrɔwo''' *Cancel = '''Dzudzɔ etɔtrɔ ''' *Editing Help = '''Kpekpeɖeŋu na etɔtrɔ''' *User page = ? *Username = ? *Password = ? *Re-type password = ? *E-mail = ? *System messages = ? *Remember my login on this computer = ? *User:Contributions = '''Ezãla ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔwo'''; '''Ezãla ƒe dɔwo''' *Login required to edit = ? *View source = '''Kpɔ alesi wowɔe''' *new messages = '''Du yeyewo''' *You have new messages on $1 = '''Du yeyewo le asiwò le $1''' *== Welcome, $1! == Your account has been created. Don't forget to change your Wikipedia preferences. = ? *Copyright = ? *Neutral point of view = ? *''The free encyclopedia'' = ? * *January = '''Dzove'''; '''Yanuar''' *February = '''Dzodze'''; '''Februar''' *March = '''Tedoxe'''; '''Mars''' *April = '''Afɔfiɛ'''; '''April''' *May = '''Damɛ'''; '''Mai''' *June = '''Masa'''; '''Yuni''' *July = '''Siamlɔm'''; '''Yuli''' *August = '''Dasiamime'''; '''August''' *September '''Anyɔnyɔ'''; '''September''' *October = '''Kele'''; '''Ɔktober''' *November = '''Adeɛmekpɔxe'''; '''Nɔvember''' *December = '''Dzome'''; '''Dezember''' *Sunday = ? *Monday = ? *Tuesday = ? *Wednesday = ? *Thursday = ? *Friday = ? *Saturday = ? *Disclaimers = ? *Privacy policy = ?

revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/2405:205:24AC:A2A5:C998:C487:CC82:50A3|2405:205:24AC:A2A5:C998:C487:CC82:50A3]] ([[User talk:2405:205:24AC:A2A5:C998:C487:CC82:50A3|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:93.34.228.189|93.34.228.189]]
revision.text:
Wotsɔ nyasiawo tso Iŋlisi [[Wikipiɖia]] la me. Ne nyaa ɖe me mekɔ o alo vovototoa ɖe le wo me la, tsɔ [[:en:Wikipedia:General disclaimer|Iŋlisi tɔ]] gbɔ. Míegale asi trɔm le afisia ŋuti.
Ne wòmese Eʋegbe nyuie o la, wòa kpɔ gbe bubuwo ƒe nuxlɔame nyawo le miame le afisi woŋlɔ ɖa be "le gbe bubuwo me" la te.
---- __NOTOC__
WIKIPIƉIA MEDO ŊUGBEA ƉEKE BENA NUSIANU LE EME VAVÃ O
'''Wikipiɖia''' enye nunyagbãle si li fãa na amewo katã ƒe zazã, eye wònye ame vovowo kple habɔbɔ vovowo siwo na kpekpeɖeŋu le dɔsia ŋɔŋlɔm le xexeme nunyaŋu godoo. Eƒe nɔnɔme naamɔ amesiame si ateŋu azã ''internet'' kple ''browserwo'' ŋudɔ be wòatrɔ nusiwo le eme. Ne nɔ nyanyame nawò be menye nusianu si le afisia me nunyaladeŋgɔwo kple agbalẽnyalagãwo to be wole eme vavã o. Esia melegbɔgblɔm be wòmakpɔ nuveviewo kple nunya vavã le ''Wikipiɖia'' la dzi o; zigeɖe la, wòakpɔe. Gake '''''Wikipiɖia''''' ma ateŋu ado ŋugbe nawò be nusianu si le afisia le eme vavã o. Ɣeaɖewoɣi la, nuŋɔŋlɔa ɖewo ƒe tatawo woatrɔ medidi o, elabena ameaɖe alo nubaɖawɔla ɖe wɔ tɔtrɔa ɖe si mesɔ kple nunyalawo kple agbãlenyalawo le xexeame katã ƒe susuwo o. === Nuwo me toto === Míele asitrɔm le alesi míatia alo míade dzesi nuŋɔŋlɔwo ƒe tata siwo ŋu ŋugbe le. Míaƒe nuŋlɔlawo zãna dɔwɔnu tɔxea ɖewo abe [[Special:Recentchanges|Tɔtrɔ yeyewo]] kple [[Special:Newpages|Axa yeyewo]] tsɔ nɔ ŋkulem ɖe nuyeyewo kple tɔtrɔ yeyeawo ŋu. Habɔbɔa ɖeke meli si toa ''Wikipiɖia'' la me o; togbɔ be nuxlẽla geɖewo wɔna ɖɔɖɔɖowo alo wotoa nuaɖewo me hã abe [[Wikipedia:Peer review|''peer review'']], sea ɖeke meli si na dɔ sia wɔwɔ o. Nuŋɔŋlɔ siwo wotia kpɔ le wome toto megbe hã abe [[Wikipedia:Featured articles|''featured article'']] woteŋu trɔna emegbe elabena ameaɖe vayi wɔ tɔtrɔ vɔ̃ɖia ɖe hafi nevale exlem. ::'''Wòmateŋu abu fɔ nuŋlɔla, kpeɖeŋutɔ, amesi na nu, dɔdzikpɔla, sysɔp kple amesiwo katã do ƒome kple ''Wikipiɖia'' wodometɔa ɖeke ɖe numanomeea ɖe si le afisia ŋu lo alo le wòŋutɔ ƒe emenuwo zãza ŋuti o.''' === Gɔmesesea ɖeke meli o; mɔɖeɖe tɔxe === Taflatse, eme nekɔ na amesiame bena nusiwo katã woŋlɔ ɖe afisia li fãa na amewokatã, eye ŋugbedodoa ɖeke mele wò kpakple afisia ƒe aƒetɔwo kple ezãlawo, amesiwo ƒe mɔwo dzi nuŋɔŋlawo le, ''Wikipiɖia'' la me nuŋlŋlawo ɖesiaɖe, dɔdzikpɔlawo, sysɔpwo alo amebuba ɖeke si do ƒome kple dɔ sia alo eƒe ƒomedodowo o. Mɔɖeɖea ɖe li be na tsɔ nusianu fãa tso afisia; Esia me fia be gɔmesesea ɖeke li le ''Wikipiɖia'' kple eƒe dɔwɔlawo kple ezãlawo kpakple wò dome o. '''Mɔɖeɖe alo gɔmesesea ɖeke mele wò kple ''Wikipiɖia'' dome''' na nyasiawo zãza alo wotɔtrɔ si mele [[GNU Free Documentation License]] (GFDL) mɔɖeɖewo nu o; Ne ameaɖe wɔ tɔtrɔa ɖe le nusiwo neŋlɔ ŋu le ''Wikipiɖia'' dzi alo woɖe eƒe akpa ɖe la, wòmekpɔ mɔ abu fɔ ''Wikipiɖia'' alo eƒe ƒomedodoa ɖeke o. === Trademarks /(Dzesi tɔxewo) === Dzesi tɔxe (abe ''trademarks, service marks, collective marks, design rights, personality rights'') siwo dze le Wikipiɖia la me la nye nutɔwo ŋutɔ tɔ. Woƒe zãzã le afisia mefia be mɔ li na wo ŋudɔ wɔwɔ le goa ɖeke me si to vovo na esiwo woɖe mɔ na le GFDL mɔɖeɖewo te o. Ne wome gblɔe fitaa o la, ekema ƒomedodoa ɖeke mele Wikipiɖia kple Wikimedia kpakple dzesitɔa ɖeke o eyata Wikipiɖia mateŋu aɖe mɔ na ameaɖeke be wòazã nusiwo nutɔwo meɖe mɔ na o la. ''Ne ezã nusiawo la, ele ɖokuiwò si, eye ne nyaɖe tso ezãzã me la, wò ɖeka ƒe agba ye.'' === Sesiwo te Wikipiɖia le === Ɖewomahĩ ''Wikipiɖia'' menuwo ɖeɖefia alo woŋɔŋlɔ ada se dzi le dukɔ alo afisi wòle la me. ''Wikipiɖia'' dɔwo katã le mɔwo dzi le [[Florida]] le [[United States of America]] eye wozãa wo le afima ƒe sewo nu. Se siwo le wòƒe dukɔme ƒe mɔɖeɖewo na nusiwo wòateŋu agblɔ alo nusiwo wòateŋu ama na amewo ateŋu ato vovo tso esiawo gbɔ. ''Wikipiɖia'' me doa ŋuse ameaɖeke be wòa da wo de sewo dzi o eyata ne eda se siawo dzi la, wò ɖeka woa bu fɔe. === Afisia meye aɖaŋuɖoƒe o === Ne ehiã aɖaŋu na nutɔxea ɖe (le kpɔɖeŋu me, dɔyɔyɔ, sewo, ganyawo) me la, di amesi wɔa dɔ le numa ŋuti. Kpɔ [[Wikipedia:Risk disclaimer]], [[Wikipedia:Medical disclaimer]], and [[Wikipedia:Legal disclaimer]] hã. Mieda akpe nawo bena ne gbɔdzi ɖi xlẽ nusiwo le afisia eye míe xɔese be ''Wikipiɖia'' la zãzã adze ŋuwo. ==Kpɔɖeŋu le nunyagbãle bubuwo ƒe ''"disclaimer-wo"'' ŋu== Togbɔ be wona agbãlenyalawo kple nusrɔ̃ladeŋgɔwo to nunyagbãle bubwo me hã, yawo hã medo ŋugbe be nusianu le eme vavã o. * [http://corporate.britannica.com/termsofuse.html britannica.com disclaimer] la (tso afisi ''[[Encyclopædia Britannica]]'' la le): *:"YOUR USE OF BRITANNICA.COM IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK." (''Iŋlisigbe'') *[http://privacy.msn.com/tou/ MSN.com disclaimer] la (tso afisi Microsoft ƒe [[Encarta|Encarta Encyclopedia]] la le) *: "...AND THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO SATISFACTORY QUALITY, PERFORMANCE, ACCURACY, AND EFFORT IS WITH YOU." (''Iŋlisigbe'') *[http://www.Bartleby.com/sv/terms.html bartleby.com disclaimer] la (tso afisi ''[[Columbia Encyclopedia]]'' la le) *: "YOU EXPRESSLY AGREE THAT USE OF THE SERVICE IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK." (''Iŋlisigbe'') [[de:Wikipedia:Impressum#Haftungsausschluss]]

'''Dzigbe ŋkɔ''' enye [[ŋkɔ]] si wotsɔna na amewo si fiaa ŋkeke si dzi woƒe dzigbe dze. Ŋkɔ siawo tsɔtsɔ bɔ ɖe [[Bluɔwo]] kple [[Eʋeawo]] dome le [[Ghana]]. Ekaka yi [[Jamaica]] hãa le [[Amerika]] nutowome. Ŋkɔawo to vovo na [[ŋutsu]]wo kple [[nyɔnu]]wo.
[[Robert Sutherland Rattray]] ("Captain R.S.Rattray") srɔ̃nu geɖe le [[Asanteawo]] ŋu vayi eye wògblɔ be "Dzigbe ŋkɔ le Asante vidzidzi ɖesiaɖe si". Wofia ŋkɔ siawo le Eʋegbe kple Blugbe me le afii.
{| border="0" align="center" style="border: 1px solid #999; background-color:#FFFFFF" width="100%" |! colspan=5 align="center"|'''Dzigbe ŋkɔwo''' |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | |! colspan=2 align="center"|'''Ŋutsuwo''' |! colspan=2 align="center"|'''Nyɔnuwo''' |-align="center" bgcolor="#CCCCCC" !Dzigbe ŋkeke ![[Eʋegbe]] ![[Blugbe]] ![[Eʋegbe]] ![[Blugbe]] |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Kɔsiɖagbe]] || Kɔsi || Kwesi / Kwasi || Esi / Kɔsiwa / Kɔsiwɔ / Awusi ||Akosua / Akos |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Dzoɖagbe]] || Kɔdzo / Kwadzo / Kudzo || Kwadwo || Adzo / Adzoa || Adwoa |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Brãɖagbe]] || Kɔmla / Kɔbla / Kwabla || Kwabena || Abrã || Abena |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Kuɖagbe]] || Kɔku / Awuku / Akumɛ || Kwaku || Aku / Akua / || Aku / Akua |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Yawoɖagbe]] || Yao / Kɔwu / || Yaw || Yawa / Awo / Awotɔ / Awoyo || Yaa |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Fiɖagbe]] || Kofi || Kofi || Afi / Afua / Afiyo / Afitɔ / Afiwɔ|| Afua / Afia / Effe |-bgcolor="#eeeeff" | [[Memleɖagbe]] || Kɔmi / Kwami || Kwame || Ama / Ami /Ameyo / Ame || Ama |- |}
[[Eʋeawo]] tsɔ na '''''vi''''' alo '''''ga''''' kpe na ɖe dzigbe ŋkɔ siawo nu he tsɔ na doa dzesi amea ƒe nɔnɔme. Le kpɔɖeŋu me, '''''Kɔku''''' kple '''''vi''''' zu na '''''Kɔkuvi''''' eye '''''Yao''''' kple '''''ga''''' zu na '''''Yaoga''''' ==Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe== *[[:en:Day name|Dzigbeŋkɔ le Iŋlisi Wikipiɖia dzi]]

[[File:Les Très Riches Heures du duc de Berry octobre.jpg|thumb|right|Kele tso ''Très Riches Heures du Duc de Berry'' la me.]] '''Kele''' (alo '''Ɔktober''') enye ɣleti ewolia le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 31 ye le ɣletia me.
Le Latingbe me la, ''octo'' gɔme enye "enyi" si fia be Ɔktober nye ɣleti enyilia le Romatɔwo ƒe ɣletigbalẽ me.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Kele me == * [[Akpedada (Canada)|Thanksgiving]] ([[Canada]]) - Dzoɖa evelia le Kele me. * [[Dukɔ zã]] ([[China, People's Republic of]]) - Kele 1 * [[Ɖeviwo ƒe agbãlewo|Ɖeviwo ƒe agbãle kɔsiɖa]] le ([[England]]) - Kɔsiɖa gbãtɔ le Kele me. * Portugal Republik la ɖoɖo - Kele 5 * Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke le [[Croatia]]-Kele 8 * [[Columbus Day]] (Most of [[United States]]) - Dzoɖa evelia le Kele me. * [[Apple Day]] - Kele 21 * [[United Nations Day]] - Kele 24 * Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke le St. Vincent & the Grenadines - Kele 27 * Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke le Nigeria- Kele 1 * Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke le the Republic Of Cyprus Kele 1 * Ɖokuisinɔnɔ Ŋkeke le Turkmenistan - Kele 27
== Nu bubuwo == * Kele ƒe kpe xɔasi enye'' opal'' or ''tourmaline''. * Kele ƒe seƒoƒo enye ''calendula'' or ''cosmos''. * Woyɔna Kele (alo Ɔktober) be Ɔktober dzẽ elabena ɣleti sia me zitɔtɔ dze egɔme le [[Russia]]. Le Gregoria ɣletigbãlea nu la, Adeɛmekpɔxe enye ɣleti si me nuawo katã dzɔ. * Kele kple Siamlɔm enye ɣleti siwo me vidzidziwo sɔgbɔ wu.
{{Commons|October}} {{Ɣletiawo le ƒea me}}

<!-- THIS PAGE IS COPIED FROM :JA. SOME ADJUSTMENTS ARE STILL NECESSARY.--> {| style="float: right; margin-left: 1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em; width: 242px; border: #99B3FF solid 1px;" |- | {{User ee-0}} |}
<!-- == Deutsch == *Wenn Sie nach Personen suchen, die Deutsch sprechen, sehen Sie in [[:Category:User de]] nach. Andere Sprachen sehen Sie in [[:Category:Wikipiɖia zãlawo ƒe gbe]]. *Wenn Sie in der indonesischen Wikipedia als Benutzer angemeldet sind, aber kein Indonesisch sprechen, fügen Sie bitte die Vorlage '''<nowiki>{{user id-0}}</nowiki>''' in Ihre Benutzerseite ein. Diese Nachricht besagt auf Indonesisch, dass Sie kein Indonesisch verstehen, damit die anderen Benutzer Bescheid wissen. -->
== English == * If you want to find people who can speak English, browse [[:Category:User en|User en]]. For other languages, check out [[:Category:Wikipiɖia zãlawo ƒe gbe]] (users by language). * If you are a registered user in the [[w:en:Ewe language|Ewe]] Wikipedia but do not understand Ewe, please add '''<nowiki>{{User ee-0}}</nowiki>''' (or put a <nowiki>{{Babel-n}}</nowiki> with '''ee-0''' as a parameter) to your user page. This message says - in Ewe - that you do not understand Ewe, so the other users will be informed.
== Español == * Si buscas personas que hablen español, consulta [[:Category:User es]]. Para otros idiomas consulta [[:Category:Wikipiɖia zãlawo ƒe gbe]] (Usuarios por idioma). * Si eres un usuario registrado de la Wikipedia en [[w:es:Idioma ewe|idioma ewe]], pero no comprendes dicho idioma, por favor añade la plantilla '''<nowiki>{{User ee-0}}</nowiki>''' a tu página de usuario. Este mensaje dice – en idioma ewe – que no comprendes el idioma, para que los otros usuarios lo sepan.
== Français == <!--//version ante 2005年5月27日 (金) * Si vous voulez trouver des personnes qui connaissent le français, passez en revue [[:Category:User fr|User fr]]. Pour les autres langues vérifiez [[:Category:Benutzer nach Sprache]]. * Si vous êtes un utilisateur enregistré dans la Wikipédia allemande mais que vous ne comprenez pas l'allemand, ajoutez svp '''<nowiki>{{User de-0}}</nowiki>''' à votre page d'utilisateur. Ce message indique - en allemand - que vous ne comprenez pas l'allemand, ainsi les autres utilisateurs en seront-ils avisés. //new version ([[利用者:Alvaro|Alvaro]] 2005年5月27日 (金) 14:23 (UTC))--> *Si tu cherches des wikipédiens parlant français, jette un oeil sur la [[:Category:User fr]]. Pour d'autres langues, c'est [[:Category:Wikipiɖia zãlawo ƒe gbe]]. *Si tu es enregistré(e) dans la wikipedia éwé, mais que tu ne parles pas l' [[w:fr:Ewe (langue)|éwé]], ajoute le modèle '''<nowiki>{{User ee-0}}</nowiki>''' sur ta page utilisateur. Cela informe les autres utilisateurs, en indonésien, que tu ne comprends pas cette langue.
== Svenska == * Om du vill hitta användare som kan svenska, se [[:Category:User sv|User sv]]. För andra språk, se [[:Category:Wikipiɖia zãlawo ƒe gbe]]. * Om du är registrerad användare på ewe Wikipedia men inte förstår [[:sv:ewe|ewe]] kan du lägga till '''<nowiki>{{User ee-0}}</nowiki>''' på din användarsida. Det meddelande som då visas på ewe betyder att du inte förstår ewe, så andra användare förstår det.
<!-- ==Kpɔ esiawo hã== *[[Wikipedia:Kedutaan|Ewe Wikipedia Embassy]] -->

'''Dzome''' (alo '''Desember''') enye ɣleti wuievelia le ƒea me le [[Gregoria ɣletigbalẽ]]a me. Ŋkeke 31 ye le ɣletia me. Le ɣleti siame la, pepi dona. Woɖua ƒe alo [[Blunya]] hã le eme. Enye yevuwo ƒe ɣleti alo dzinu mamlɛtɔ le ƒea me.
== Ŋkeke tɔxewo le Dzome me ==

revision.comment: Bot: Migrating 2 interwiki links, now provided by [[d:|Wikidata]] on [[d:q1338320]] [[M:User:Addbot/WDS|(translate me)]]
revision.text:
'''Emmanuel Kɔsi Kotoka''' ([[Kele 26]] [[1926]] - [[Afɔfiɛ 17]] [[1967]]) nye asrafo si nɔ [[National Liberation Council]] dziɖuɖu si nɔ zia dzi tso [[Dzodze 24]] [[1966]]. Dziɖuɖu siae ɖe dukplɔla [[Kwame Nkrumah]] le [[Ghana]] dukɔ zia dzi.
==Kotoka ƒe ɖevime== Wodzi Kotoka le Alakple<ref name="ghanaweb">[http://www.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/people/pop-up.php?ID=120 GhanaWeb.com]</ref> si nye Keta dukɔ ɖeka le [[Vɔlta nutome]] le Ghana. Ede suku le Alakple Roman Catholic Suku. Emegbe la, eyi eƒe suku dede dzi le Anloga Senior School tso ƒe 1941 me.<ref name="ghanaweb"/> Esi wòde suku vɔ la, eɖo be yea srɔ̃ dɔ gake emegbe la, evaye ŋlɔ ŋkɔ kple asrafowo.
==Asrafo dɔwɔwɔ== Le Siamlɔm 1947 me la, Kotoka dze asrafodɔ sɔsrɔ̃ gɔme le Gold Coast Regiment ƒe asrafo suku le [[Teshie]] le [[Gẽ]]. Dɔa sɔsrɔ̃ tsɔ afɔ ne. Le ƒe 1952 me la, enɔ Afrika asrafow dɔmetɔwo siwo woɖo ɖe Eaton Hall, si nye asrafo suku de ŋgɔ ɖeka le [[United Kingdom]] (Britannia) dukɔa me. Le ƒe 1954 me la, woɖoe leftenant le Ghana asrafowo me, eye wòdze dɔwɔwɔ gɔme kple Britannia asrafowo le [[Rhine]] si le Dzama dukɔa me.<ref name="Kraus">[http://home.comcast.net/~amaah/writings/ghana-without-nkrumah-men-in-charge.html Africa Report - John Kraus]</ref>
Esi wògbɔ va Gold Coast la, woɖoe ''Platoon Commander'' le ''Second Gold Coast Regiment of Infantry'' la me. Le ƒe [[1959]] me la, ezu asrafo mega si woyɔna be Captain. Le ƒe ma me ke la, woɖoe Major. Le ƒe 1960 me la, evaye de Asrafo megawo suku de ŋgɔ ɖeka le [[Westminster]] le [[Inglis]] nyigbaa dzi.
Le ƒe 1960 me la, Kotoka nye asrafo mega wodometɔ ɖeka le Ghana asrafowo si woɖo ɖe Congo. Woyi vaye le vu le Leopoldville (si nye [[Kinshasa]] egbe la) kple [[Xexeme Dukɔ Ƒoƒuawo]] asrafowo le afima.<ref>[http://www.black-history-month.co.uk/articles/nkrumah.html Wellplaced Consultancy]</ref> Kotoka do kalẽ ŋutɔ le dɔ sia gbe eye Ghana dukɔa na dzesi tɔxee si nye ''Ghana Service Order for Exceptional Bravery for Distinguished Service in the Congo'' le ƒe 1963 me.<ref name="ghanaweb"/>
Emegbe la, Kotoka va zu kplɔla na Ghana asrafowo katã le Ghana ƒe dzigbe kpa dzi si nye ''Second Infantry Brigade'' (si woyɔna be Northern Command egbe) le Kumasi.<ref name="Kraus"/>
==Ghana dukɔ kplɔkplɔ== Kotoka nɔ ŋgɔ na asrafowo si ɣlẽ Ghana dziɖuɖua tso Nkrumah ƒe [[Convention People's Party]] dziɖuɖua dzi.
<!-- ****************Need to translate this section********************* ==Politics== In 1965, the then [[Lieutenant-Colonel]] Kotoka was transferred to Kumasi where he met and became friends with then [[Akwasi Afrifa|Major Akwasi Amankwa Afrifa]], an officer in the Second Brigade of the Ghana army.<ref name="ghanaweb"/> The two are generally credited with being among the key conspirators behind the first bloody coup d'état in Ghana on [[February 24]], [[1966]] which brought an end to the first republic. They codenamed it "Operation Cold Chop".<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ghana.gov.gh/NRC/Vol%204%20Chpt%201%20com.sec.rep.pdf |title=The Security Services |accessdate=2007-06-11 |work=National Reconciliation Commission Report Volume 4 Chapter 1|format=pdf |pages=page24 |date=October 2004 |publisher=Ghana government}}</ref> It was Kotoka who announced the coup to the nation early that morning from the Broadcasting House of the Ghana Broadcasting Corporation, the official radio station in Ghana. The [[Central Intelligence Agency]] appears to have been aware about the plotting of the coup at least a year ahead.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.state.gov/www/about_state/history/vol_xxiv/y.html |title=253. Memorandum From Robert W. Komer of the National Security Council Staff to the President's Special Assistant for National Security Affairs (Bundy)/1/ |accessdate=2007-03-19 |year=1999 |work=FOREIGN RELATIONS OF THE UNITED STATES 1964-1968, Volume XXIV Africa |publisher=Department of State, USA |quote="The plotters are keeping us briefed," .... "and the State Department thinks we're more on the inside than the British. While we're not directly involved (I'm told), we and other Western countries (including France) have been helping to set up the situation by ignoring Nkrumah's pleas for economic aid. All in all, it looks good."}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.seeingblack.com/x060702/nkrumah.shtml |title=Documents Expose U.S. Role in Nkrumah Overthrow |accessdate=2007-03-19 |author=Paul Lee |date=June 7, 2002 |publisher=SeeingBlack.com}}</ref> Kotoka was promoted [[Major General]] and became a member of the ruling National Liberation Council and also the Commissioner for [[Health|Ministry of Health]] as well as [[General Officer Commanding]] the Ghana Armed Forces. --> ==Eƒe ku== Le [[Afɔfiɛ 17]] dzi le ƒe [[1967]] me la, asrafo aɖewo tso ɖe NLC dziɖuɖua ŋu. Woɖo be yewoa xɔ dziɖuɖua kple sesɛ̃. Wonɔ dɔwɔm kple Ghana asrafowo si nɔ ''Mortar Regiment'' le [[Ho]], si nye Vɔlta nutome dugã. Le hoʋiʋli si dzɔ me la, asrafoawo wodometɔ ɖeka, si nye Moses Yeboah la, wu Kotoka. Kotoka ƒe asrafowo ƒe alɔ fɔ dzi le hoʋiʋlia ƒe nuwuwu, eye wo drɔ ʋɔnu na Yeboah kple eƒe ahatiwo. Wobu fɔ Yeboah kple xɔ̃awɔ̃o eye wo wu wo.<ref>[http://lcweb2.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/r?frd/cstdy:@field(DOCID+gh0147) Library of Congress Country Studies - Ghana: The Military and the Government]</ref>
Wome Kotoka ƒe tata heda ɖe afisi wofɔ Kotoka ƒe kukua le. Ghana dukɔa ƒe ayameʋu dzeƒe gã tɔwu le afisia, eye wotrɔ ŋkɔaɔ zu [[Kotoka International Airport]] hetsɔ ɖo ŋku Kotoka dzi.
==Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe== <References/>
==Nuxexlẽ bubuwo== *[http://www.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/people/pop-up.php?ID=120 Profile on Ghana Home Page] * [http://www.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/NewsArchive/photo.day.php?ID=52409 Ghana Home Page - Photo Report-Nkrumah's Overthrow!]
==Agbalẽ bubuwo== *Barker, Peter (1969). Operation Cold Chop: the Coup That Toppled Nkrumah. Ghana: Ghana Publishing Corporation. ISBN 0876760655. *Hansen, Emmanuel. 1968. Ghana: Background to Revolution. Transition, No. 35. (Feb. - Mar., 1968), pp. 24-28.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi}} [[Category:1926 vidzidziwo|Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi]] [[Category:1967 kuwo|Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi]] [[Category:Ghana asrafowo|Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi]] [[Category:Ghana dukplɔlawo|Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi]] [[Category:Ghanatɔwo|Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi]] [[Category:Eʋeawo|Kotoka, Emmanuel Kwasi]]

'''Debaya Kɔsiɖa''' enye ŋkeke si [[kristotɔwo]] le xexeame godoo ɖuna le Kɔsiɖa si doa ŋgɔ na ''Easter'' Kɔsiɖa dzi. Wotsɔna ŋkeke sia ɖoa ŋku nusiwo ŋu woŋlɔnu daɖi le [[Biblia]] alo Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe Nubabla yeye la me. Agbalẽ siwo ƒonu le ŋkeke sia ŋuti wonye [[Mateo]] [http://php.ug.cs.usyd.edu.au/~jnot4610/bibref.php?book=%20Matthew&verse=21:1-11&src=! 21:1-11], [[Marko]] [http://php.ug.cs.usyd.edu.au/~jnot4610/bibref.php?book=%20Mark&verse=11:1-11&src=! 11:1-11], [[Luka]] [http://php.ug.cs.usyd.edu.au/~jnot4610/bibref.php?book=%20Luke&verse=19:28-44&src=! 19:28-44] kpakple [[Yohanes]] [http://php.ug.cs.usyd.edu.au/~jnot4610/bibref.php?book=%20John&verse=12:12-19&src=! 12:12-19].
[[Category:Biblia]]

revision.comment: /* Ðasefo siwo ade 8,340,847 le dukɔ 240 kple edzivɔ me */
revision.text:
Enye Yehowa Ðasefowo ƒe didi be nàdze si yewo nyuie wu. Ðewohĩ wonye wò aƒelikawo kple dɔwɔhatiwo alo èdoa go wo le gbesiagbedɔwɔna bubuwo me. Ðewohĩ èkpɔa wo le ablɔwo dzi wonɔa woƒe magazinewo nam amesiwo va yina. Alo ɖewohĩ èƒo nu kpli wo kpuie le wò ʋɔtru nu kpɔ.
Le nyateƒe me la, Yehowa Ðasefowo tsɔ ɖe le wò kple wò nyonyo me. Wodi be yewoadze xɔ̃ wò ahagblɔ nya geɖe na wò tso wo ɖokui, woƒe dzixɔsewo, woƒe habɔbɔa, kple nusi nye woƒe susu le amewo kple xexe si me mí katã míele ŋu. Esia tae wota agbalẽ gbadza sia na wò ɖo.
Yehowa Ðasefowo le abe ame bubu ɖesiaɖe ene le go geɖe me. Kuxiwo nɔa woawo hã ŋu—le ganya, ŋutilã me, kple seselelãme gome. Wowɔa vodada ɣeaɖewoɣi, elabena womede blibo o, wometso gbɔgbɔ me, alo nye vovodadamanɔŋutɔwo o. Gake wodzea agbagba be yewoasrɔ̃ nu tso yewoƒe nuteƒekpɔkpɔwo me eye wosrɔ̃a Biblia vevie tsɔ wɔa ɖɔɖɔɖo siwo hiã. Woɖe adzɔgbe na Mawu be yewoawɔ eƒe lɔlɔ̃nu, eye wotsɔa wo ɖokui nana be yewoawɔ adzɔgbeɖeɖe sia dzi. Wodia Mawu ƒe Nya kple eƒe gbɔgbɔ kɔkɔe ƒe mɔfiafia le woƒe dɔwɔnawo katã me.
== Woɖe adzɔgbe na Mawu be yewoawɔ eƒe lɔlɔ̃nu == Wobunɛ nu vevii be yewoatu yewoƒe dzixɔsewo ɖe Biblia dzi ke menye ɖe amegbetɔ ƒe nukpɔsusu alo hakplɔɖoɖo dzrowo ko dzi o. Wosena le wo ɖokui me abe apostolo Paulo ene esime gbɔgbɔ ʋãe wògblɔ be: “Mawu nye nyateƒetɔ, ke amesiame aʋatsokalae.” (Romatɔwo 3:4, Eʋegbe Biblia*) Le nufiafia siwo wogblɔ be enye Biblia me nyateƒe gome la, Ðasefowo léa nusi Beroiatɔwo wɔ esime apostolo Paulo ɖe gbeƒã na wo la me ɖe asi sesĩe: “Woxɔ nya la kple dzi faa, eye wole ŋɔŋlɔawo me dzrom gbesiagbe be, nusiawo le eme hã.” (Dɔwɔwɔwo 17:11) Yehowa Ðasefowo xɔe se be ele be woatsɔ Ŋɔŋlɔ siwo tso gbɔgbɔ me la ado mawusubɔsubɔ me nufiafiawo katã kpɔ alea, eɖanye woa ŋutɔwo ƒe nufiafia loo alo ame bubu tɔ o. Wokpe wò—wole dzi dem ƒo na wò—be nàwɔ esia le dzeɖoɖo kpli wo me.
== Woxɔe se be Biblia nye Mawu ƒe Nya == Míate ŋu akpɔe le esia me be Yehowa Ðasefowo xɔ Biblia dzi se be enye Mawu ƒe Nya. Wobua eƒe agbalẽ 66-awo be wotso gbɔgbɔ me eye wo me nudzɔdzɔwo nye blemaŋutinya ŋutɔŋutɔwo. Woyɔa Nubabla Yeye si ame geɖe nya la be Kristotɔwo ƒe Hela Ŋɔŋlɔawo, eye woyɔa Nubabla Xoxoa be Hebri Ŋɔŋlɔawo. Wozãa evea, Hela kple Hebri Ŋɔŋlɔawo siaa, eye wobua wo me nyaawo ɖe alesi wogblɔ woe nu pɛpɛpɛ negbe teƒe siwo nyagbɔgblɔa alo nɔnɔme si me wogblɔe le na wòdze ƒã be wonye kpɔɖeŋunyagbɔgblɔ alo tsi tre ɖi na nu bubu aɖe ko. Wose egɔme be Biblia me nyagblɔɖi geɖe va eme, bubuwo le eme vam, eye bubuwo agava eme le etsɔme.
== Woɖe ŋkɔ == Yehowa Ðasefowoa? Ẽ, nenemae woyɔa wo ɖokuii. Enye nɔnɔmefiaŋkɔ si fia be woɖia ɖase le Yehowa, eƒe Mawunyenye, kple eƒe tameɖoɖowo ŋu. “Mawu,” “Aƒetɔ,” kple “Wɔla”—siwo le abe “Dukplɔla,” “Fia,” kple “Aʋafia” ene—nye dzesideŋkɔwo eye woate ŋu azã wo na ame vovovo geɖe. Gake “Yehowa” ya nye ŋkɔ tɔxɛ eye Mawu ŋusẽkatãtɔ kple xexeme Wɔla lae wozãnɛ na. Woɖe esia fia le Psalmo 83:19 be: “Ne woadze sii be, ŋkɔwòe nye YEHOWA, eye wò ɖeɖe koe ɖo kpo ɖe anyigba blibo la dzi!”
== Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe ŋkɔ le blema Hebrigbe me == Ŋkɔ Yehowa (alo Yahweh, abe alesi Roma Katoliko ƒe Jerusalem Bible kple agbalẽnyala aɖewo yɔnɛ ene la) dze zi gbɔ zi 7,000 le Hebri Ŋɔŋlɔawo me. Womedee Biblia akpa gãtɔ me alea o, ke boŋ wotsɔ “Mawu” alo “Aƒetɔ” ɖo eteƒe. Gake le Biblia siawo me gɔ̃ hã la, woate ŋu akpɔ afisi wozã Yehowa le le Hebrigbe me kpukpuiawo me elabena ŋɔŋlɔdzesigãwo ƒe lolotɔwo kple suetɔwoe wotsɔ ŋlɔa nya siwo wotsɔ ɖo ŋkɔa teƒee, si nye: MAWU kple AƑETƆ. Egbegbe gɔmeɖeɖe geɖe zã ŋkɔ Yehowa alo Yahweh. Eyata Yesaya 42:8 xlẽ le Eʋegbe Biblia me be, “Nyee nye Yehowa, ŋkɔnyee.”
== Ŋkɔa do ƒome kple ʋɔnudrɔ̃ƒe nudzɔdzɔ == Ŋɔŋlɔawo me nya si me Yehowa Ðasefowo ɖe woƒe ŋkɔ tsoe la le Yesaya ta 43 lia. Le afima la, woɖɔ xexeame ƒe nɔnɔme abe nusi le edzi yim le ʋɔnudrɔ̃ƒe ene: Wogblɔ na dukɔwo ƒe mawuwo be woakplɔ woƒe ɖasefowo vɛ ne woava ɖo kpe edzi ne woƒe nya dzɔ alo be woase ɖasefo siwo le Yehowa ƒe akpa dzi ƒe nya ale be woalɔ̃ ɖe nyateƒea dzi. Afimae Yehowa gblɔ na eƒe amewo le be: “Miawoe nye nye ɖasefowo kple nye dɔla, si metia, ne mianyae, miaxɔ dzinye ase, eye miadze sii be, nyee. Womewɔ mawu aɖeke do ŋgɔ nam o, eye ɖeke mado megbe nam o. Nyee nye Yehowa, eye xɔnametɔ aɖeke meli kpe ɖe ŋunye o.”—Yesaya 43:10, 11.
Ðasefowo nɔ Yehowa Mawu si le anyigba dzi ƒe akpe geɖe hafi wova dzi Yesu. Esi Hebritɔwo ta 11 yɔ xɔsetɔ siawo dometɔ aɖewo ƒe ŋkɔ vɔ la, Hebritɔwo 12:1 gblɔ be: “Eyata míawo hã, esi ɖaseɖilawo ƒe alilikpo gã ŋutɔ ƒo xlã mí la, mina míaɖe nu kpekpe sia nu kpekpe kple nuvɔ̃, si ɖea to ɖe mí la ɖa, eye mina míatsɔ dzidodo anɔ dudimekeke, si woɖo na mí la dzi.” Yesu gblɔ le Pontio Pilato ŋkume be: “Esia ta wodzim ɖo, eye esia ta meva xexeame ɖo, bena maɖi ɖase na nyateƒe la.” Woyɔe be “ɖaseɖila nuteƒewɔla kple nyateƒetɔ.” (Yohanes 18:37; Nyaɖeɖefia 3:14) Yesu gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ̃lawo be: “Miaxɔ [gbɔgbɔ] kɔkɔe, si le mia dzi va ge la, ƒe ŋusẽ, eye mianye nye ɖaseɖilawo le Yerusalem kple Yudea katã kple Samaria, eye vaseɖe anyigba ƒe seƒe ke.”—Dɔwɔwɔwo 1:8.
== Ðasefo siwo ade 8,683,117 le dukɔ 240 kple edzivɔ me == Eyata amesiwo ade 8,683,117 siwo le Yehowa ƒe Fiaɖuƒe si le Kristo Yesu si me ŋuti nyanyuia gblɔm le dukɔ siwo ade 240 me la kpɔe be esɔ be yewoayɔ yewo ɖokui be Yehowa Ðasefowo (2019).
* [http://www.jw.org/ee/ Yehowa Ɖasefowo]
[[Category:Europa dukɔwo]]

revision.text:
[[File:LocationSouthAfrica.svg|right|180px]]
[[File:Flag of South Africa.svg|right|200px]] '''Anyiehe Afrika''' enye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Dukɔ sia do liƒo kpakple [[Namibia]], [[Botswana]], [[Zimbabwe]], [[Mozambiki]] kple [[Swaziland]]a. Anyiehe Afrika dukɔa ƒoxlã kple [[Lezoto]].
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]]
[[File:Flag of Australia.svg|right|thumbnail]] '''Australia''' nye [[Oceania]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. {{stub}} [[Category:Dukɔwo]]

[[File:Flag of India.svg|right|thumb]] [[File:India (orthographic projection).svg|thumb|]]
'''India''' nye [[Asia]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka.
{{stub}} [[Category:Asia dukɔwo]]

Emenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme enye 1,788,559 lɔƒo. == Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * http://www.curitiba.pr.gov.br * http://www.curitiba-brazil.com [[Category:Brazil]]

[[File:POL gmina Końskowola COA.svg|thumb|80px|right|''Coat of'' Kɔnyskɔvɔla]] [[File:KurówPoland.png|thumb|250px|right]]
'''Kɔnyskɔvɔla''' ([[Pɔlisigbe]] : ''Końskowola'', [[:en:International Phonetic Alphabet|IPA]] : [kɔɲskɔ'vɔla]) enye dua ɖe, si ele [[Puwavi]] kple [[Kuruf]] dome. Ele [[Kurufka]] tɔ to. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 2,188 lɔƒo.
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * '''[http://www.konskowola.info.pl/ Kɔnyskɔvɔla]'''
[[Category:Duawo]] [[Category:Europa duawo]] [[Category:Poland duawo]]

revision.comment: Bot: Migrating 2 interwiki links, now provided by [[Wikidata]] on [[:d:Q4960490]]
revision.text: Gbewo. {{Commons|Category:Languages}}

[[File:Francophone Africa.svg|thumb|Afrika dukɔwo siwo dona Fransegbe]] '''Fransegbe''' (alo ''français, la langue française'') nye [[France|Fransetɔwo]] ƒe gbe. Wogblɔna gbe sia le dukɔ geɖewo me le [[Yuropa]] kpakple [[Afrika]] katã. Wobu bena amesiwo dona fransegbe le xexeame godo ƒe xexleme ɖo 70 milion yi 130 milion lɔƒo.
[[Category:Gbewo]] [[Category:France]]

[[File:Coat of arms of Senegal.svg|right|120px]] [[File:Flag of Senegal.svg|right|200px]] [[File:LocationSenegal.svg|right|200px]] [[File:Senegal Regions.png|thumbnail|left|250px|Regions of Senegal]] '''Senegal''' nye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele [[Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe]] lɔƒo. Senegal do liƒo kple [[Mauritania]] le eƒe dzigbe kpa dzi, [[Mali]] le eƒe ɣedzeƒe kpa dzi, eye [[Guinea]] kple [[Guinea-Bissau]] le eƒe anyigbe lɔƒo. Aƒu si woyɔna be [[{{SIL|Atlantic Ocean}}]] la le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe lɔƒo. Senegal ƒoxlã [[Gambia]] dukɔa le eƒe axa etɔ̃ dzi. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 11,658,000 lɔƒo.
Senegal dukɔa xɔ ɖokuisinɔnɔ tso [[France]] dukɔ ƒe dziɖuɖu la te le [[Dasiamime]] ƒe ŋkeke 20 lia dzi le ƒe 1960 me. Senega ƒe dugã enye [[Dakar]]. Senegal ƒe dukplɔla enye [[Macky Sall]]. Ele dziɖum tso [[Afɔfiɛ]] ƒe ŋkeke gbãtɔ dzi, le ƒe 2012 me.
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Senegal| ]] [[Category:Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe dukɔwo]]

'''Wò geɖe {{SITENAME}} me fifia abe "$1" ene'''

[[File:LocationMali.svg|right|180px]] [[File:Flag of Mali.svg|right|180px]]
'''Mali''' nye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Dukɔ ade ko ye lolo wui le Afrika godoo. Mali do liƒo kple [[Algeria]] le dzigbe lɔƒo, [[Niger]] le eƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo, [[Burkina Faso]] kple [[Côte d'Ivoire]] le eƒe anyigbe, [[Guinea]], [[Senegal]] kple [[Mauritania]] le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe kpa dzi. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 19,553,397 lɔƒo.
Le blema ŋɔli la, dukɔ etɔ̃ siwo xɔ ŋkɔ ŋtɔ nɔ afisi Mali le egbe la. Woawo wonye [[Ghana dukɔ]], [[Mali dukɔ]] kple [[Sɔngai dukɔ]]. Ghana dukɔ kple Sɔngai dukɔ womegalee fifia o.
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Mali]] [[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]]

[[File:Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn 035.jpg|thumbnail|Abraham kple Isak]] '''Abraham''' nye amesi ŋu woŋlɔ nu le le [[Mose I|Mose ƒe agbalẽ gbãtɔ]] me le [[Biblia]]a me. Wo ga ŋlɔ nu le eya ke ŋuti le [[Koran]] la hã me. [[Kristotɔ]]wo kple [[Mɔslemtɔ]]wo katã bu nae abe Israel viwo, Ishamel viwo kple Edom viwo katã wo fofo. Eya dzi Yuda subɔsubɔ kple Kristo subɔsubɔ to.
Abraham nye [[Tarax]] vi, eye wònye [[Naxor]] ƒe tɔgbeyɔvi. Abraham nɔviwo wonye [[Naxor]] kple [[Haran]]. Bibla gblɔ bena Mawu kplɔ Abraham tso [[Mesopotamia]] vayi [[Kanaan]] nyigba dzi. Afima Mawu bla nu kple Abraham le. Tso ema dzi la, Abraham subɔ Mawu (YHWH) dzaa ko abe Mawu ene. Mawu ga do ŋugbe na Abraham hã bena eƒe dzidzimeviwo woadzi xexlẽmanɔmee. Abraham nɔ agbe tso AM 1948–2123 (1812 DMȠ vaseɖe 1637 DMȠ).
[[Yudatɔ]]wo yɔna Abraham be Avraham, Avinu, alo "Abraham, mía Fofo". Mawu do ŋugbe na Abraham bena woayra amegbetɔwo katã to eƒe dzidziemviwo dzi. (Mose I 12:3). [[Kristotɔ]]wo kpɔ [[Yesu Kristo]] abe ŋugbe si Mawu na Abraham. [[Mɔslemtɔ]]wo xɔ edzi se bena Mohammed nye [[Ismael]], ŋutsuvi si [[Hagar]] dzi na Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwo dometɔ ɖeka.
{{Adam vayi Dawid}}
[[Category:Biblia]]
Tɔtrɔ yeyewo ƒe tatiawo
wo katã
wo katã

{{PLURAL:$1|[[Special:ListUsers|Ŋkɔŋlɔla]] '''1''' |[[Special:ListUsers|Ŋkɔŋlɔlawo]] '''$1''' }} ye le afii, eye wodometɔ '''$2''' (alo '''$4%''') {{PLURAL:$2|nye|nye}} $5 alo dɔdzikpɔlawo. {{PLURAL:$6|Ŋkɔŋlɔla|Ŋkɔŋlɔlawo}} '''$6''' lɔƒo ye ganɔ woƒe {{PLURAL:$6|ŋkɔ|ŋkɔwo}} zam ɣesiaɣi.
Ŋkuwo le axa $1 {{PLURAL:$1| |wo}} ŋu.

[[Image:Heckert GNU white.svg|right|150px]] '''{{BASEPAGENAME}}, welcome to the Eʋe Wikipedia!''' Thanks for your contributions on the Ewe Wikipedia. I believe you would have noticed that there are not many Ewe contributors here. We look forward to your contributions. Feel free to edit or start an article even if your command of Ewe is not excellent. If you have any queries or difficulties, you can ask on my talk page. Every time you make an edit, remember to sign your name with the following (~~~~). This places your username, date and time under your edit. The help section is incomplete, so if you need some help, feel free to ask on my talk page. You can also get some help from the [[:en:Wikipedia:Welcoming committee/Welcome to Wikipedia|English Wikipedia]]. '''Ayekoo na wò! Netsɔ!'''!
[[Category:Templatewo]]

[[Image:Heckert GNU white.svg|right|150px]] '''{{BASEPAGENAME}}, bienvenue sur le Wikipédia en éwé!''' Merci pour vos contributions sur Wikipedia en éwé. Je crois que vous auriez remarqué qu'il n'y a pas beaucoup de contributeurs en éwé ici. Nous attendons avec intérêt vos contributions. Sentez-vous libre de les modifier ou de commencer un article, même si votre commande de éwé n'est pas excellent. Si vous avez des questions ou des difficultés, vous pouvez demander [[User talk:Natsubee|'''ici''']]. Chaque fois que vous effectuez une modification, n'oubliez pas de signer votre nom à la suite (~~~~). Cela place votre nom d'utilisateur, la date et l'heure de votre montage. La section d'aide est incomplète, donc si vous avez besoin d'aide, n'hésitez pas à demander [[User talk:Natsubee|'''ici''']]. Vous pouvez également obtenir l'aide de [[:fr:Wikipédia:Accueil des nouveaux arrivants|Wikipédia Français]]. '''Ayekoo na wò! Netsɔ!'''!
[[Category:Templatewo]]

[[Image:Heckert GNU white.svg|right|150px]] '''{{BASEPAGENAME}}, willkommen bei Wikipedia!''' Vielen Dank für Ihre Beiträge in der Ewe-Wikipedia. Ich glaube, Sie hätten festgestellt, dass es nicht viele Beiträge in Ewe hier gibt. Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Beiträge. Fühlen Sie sich frei Artikel zu bearbeiten oder neue Artikel zu beginnen, selbst wenn Ihre Sprachkenntnisse in Ewe nicht sehr gut sind. Wenn Sie irgendwelche Fragen oder Schwierigkeiten haben, können Sie [[User talk:Natsubee|'''hier''']] fragen. Jedes Mal, wenn Sie eine Diskussion bearbeiten, denken Sie daran, mit den folgenden Zeichen (~~~~) zu unterschreiben. Damit stellen Sie Ihren Benutzernamen, Datum und Uhrzeit unter Ihren Diskussionsbeitrag. Die Hilfe-Abschnitt ist unvollständig, so dass, wenn Sie Hilfe benötigen, Sie bitte nicht zögern sollten [[User talk:Natsubee|'''hier''']] zu fragen oder in der [[:de:Wikipedia:Hilfe|deutschen Wikipedia]] nachzulesen. '''Ayekoo na wò! Netsɔ!'''!
[[Category:Templatewo]] danke --[[User:Visitator|Visitator]] 14:45, 25 Adeɛmekpɔxe 2008 (UTC)

'''Silesiagbe ''' enye gbe si wogblɔna le Silesia nutome le [[Poland]] dukɔa me. Wogblɔna Silesiagbe le [[Czech]] dukɔ kple [[Germany|Dzama]] dukɔwo me. Le ƒe 2011 me la, ame 509 000<ref>[http://web.archive.org/web/20121221235509/http://www.stat.gov.pl/cps/rde/xbcr/gus/LUD_raport_z_wynikow_NSP2011.pdf Narodowy Spis Powszechny Ludności i Mieszkań 2011. Raport z wyników] - Central Statistical Office of Poland</ref> ɖe fia be Silesiagbe nye yewoƒe degbe gake ameaɖewo xɔe se bena Silesiagbe dolawo de 1,250,000.
Silesiagbe te ɖe Polandgbe ŋu eyata amesiwo srɔ̃na nu le gbewo ŋu buna bena Silesiagbe enye Polandgbe fafia wodometɔwo ɖeka.
== Ŋɔŋlɔdzesi == Silesia ŋɔŋlɔdzesi aɖeke meli o. Woŋlɔnae kple Polandgbe ŋɔŋlɔdzesiwo. Le ƒe 2006 me la, wo ŋlɔ Silesia ŋɔŋlɔdzesi yeye. Wotsɔe tso Silesiagbe ŋɔŋlɔdzesi me. Wozana ŋɔŋlɔdzesi yeyeawo le 'Internet' dzi kpakple Silesia Wikipedia la dzi.
Aa Bb Cc Ćć Čč Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj Kk Ll Mm Nn Ńń Oo Pp Rr Řř Ss Śś Šš Tt Uu Ůů Ww Yy Zz Źź Žž
Gbeɖiɖi aɖewo: Ch Dz Dź Dž.
=== Nuxexlẽwo le teƒe bubuwo === * [[:szl:Přodńo zajta|The Silesian Wikipedia]] * [http://www.nowiny.pyrsk.com/ News in Silesian] * [http://punasymu.com/_indexs.php Pů našymu – djalykt ślůnski kodyfikowůny] [[Category:Gbewo]] {{Reflist}}

revision.comment: [[M:User:Addbot|Bot:]] Migrating 28 interwiki links, now provided by [[d:|Wikidata]] on [[d:q586541]] [[M:User:Addbot/WDS|(translate me)]]
revision.text:
'''Tarax''', si gɔme enye tsatsala la, enye [[Abraham]] fofo le [[Biblia]] me.
== Amea == === Biblia === Le [[Mose I|Mose ƒe agbalẽ gbãtɔ]] me la, Tarax nye [[Naxor]] viŋutsu, eye eya hã nye [[Serug]] viŋutsu. Serug fofo nye [[Regu]], si fofo enye [[Peleg]], si fofo nye [[Eber]], si fofo nye [[Selax]], si fofo nye [[Arpaxsad]], si fofo nye [[Sem]], si nye [[Noa]] viŋutsu tsitsi tɔ.<ref>Mose I 11:10-26</ref>
Biblia gblɔ be Tarax dzi viŋutsu etɔ̃. Yawo enye [[Abram]], [[Naxor]] kple [[Xaran]]. Le Mose I ta 20:12 me la, [[Sara]], si nye Abraham srɔ̃ nye nɔvia hã, elabena woameve nye [[Terax]] viwo gake wo nɔwo to vovo. Wo de enye [[Ur]] le [[Kaldea]] nyigba dzi. Tarax vi Xaran tre kuku na tɔa le Ur. Xaran dzi [[Lot]] hafi wò ku. Naxor tso aƒe ɖe Xaran, si le Ur mɔ dzi. Tarax ʋu tso Ur kple via Abraham kple eƒe tɔgbeyɔviŋutsu Lot. Woƒe ɖoɖo enye be yewoayi [[Kanaan]] gake wodze Xaran eye Terax ku le afima.<ref>Mose I 11:24-32</ref> Le eƒe ku megbe la, Abram kple eƒe ƒometɔwo ʋu tso Xaran. <ref>Dɔwɔwɔwo 7:4</ref> Biblia gblɔ bena Tarax nye trɔ̃subɔɔla.<ref>Yosua 24:2</ref>
== Teƒe == Tarax enye teƒe si Israeltɔwo tɔ ɖa le ɣeyiɣi sime wonɔ sisim tso [[Egyipte]].
== Nyasiawo ƒe tsoƒe == <references/>
{{Adam vayi Dawid}}

revision.text: Nusi mίenye

[[File:Grand aulacode male.jpg|thumb|Nukpui tsu si wo le nyinyim le Gabon]] '''Nukpui''' alo ( Latin ŋkɔ: ''Thryonomys swinderianus'') enye gbeme lã si bɔ le [[Afrika]]. Nukpuiwo lɔ̃na tsi gbɔ nɔnɔ. Wotsana le agblewo me hã. Tsitsiawo ƒe didime gbɔa "feet" eve dzi le goɖewo me.
Eƒe towo kple ŋɔtiwo le takpo eye eƒe fũwo sẽ. Woƒe megbe fɔwo melolo abe ŋgɔgbe tɔwo o. Nukpuiwo tsana le ha alo ƒome suewo me eye atsu ɖeka nɔa ha ɖesiaɖe nu. Nukpuiwo lɔ̃a zãme nɔnɔ. Ɣeaɖewo ɣii hã, wonɔna tome. Woteŋu nɔa agbe ƒe ene sɔ̃. Ne nu aɖe dovɔ̃vɔ wo la, wosina yea tsi me. Gbe enye woƒe nuɖuɖu gãtɔ gake wo lɔ̃na agble me nukuwo hã ɖuɖu eyata wogblena nukuwo ŋutɔ na agbledelawo.
Le [[Ghana]] kple Afrika ƒe ɣetoɖoƒe lɔƒo la, woyɔnae be ''grasscutter''. Le Afrika ƒe akpa geɖewo me la, nukpuiwo nye lã si amewo ɖua ŋutɔ. Le esia ta la, wodze nukpuiwo nyim na dzadzra le teƒewo geɖe.
== Kpɔɖeŋuwo == * Matthews, Jaman. "The Value of Grasscutters," ''World Ark'', (Dzove-Dzodze, 2008), pp. 23-24.(''Nukpuiwo ƒe asixɔxɔ'' le Iŋglisigbe)
== Nuxexlẽ bubuwo == * [http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/business/4864714.stm BBC nuŋɔŋlɔ le nukpuiwo ŋu le Ghana] (Iŋglisigbe)
[[Category:Lãwo]] [[Category:Gbemelãwo]]

[[File:Rembrandt - Jacob Wrestling with the Angel - Google Art Project.jpg|thumb|250px|Yakob]] '''Yakob''' ('''יַעֲקֹב''') nye [[Isak]] ƒe vi wodometɔwo ɖeka. Eƒe ŋkɔ evelia enye [[Israel]]. Yakob kple [[Isau]] wo nye venɔviwo eye wo nɔ enye [[Rebeka]]. {{Adam vayi Dawid}}

[[File:Sylvanus Olympio.jpg|250px|right|thumb|Sylvanus Olympio]] '''Sylvanus Epiphanio Olympio''' (1902 - 1963). enye [[Togo dukplɔlawo]] ƒe gbātɔ.
== Dudɔ wɔwɔ == Aƒetɔ Olympio nye Togo ƒe dudɔnunɔla gbātɔ tso ƒe 1958 vaseɖe ƒe 1961 me. Le ɣeyiɣi siawo me la, wo da akɔ̃ nɛ wozu Togo dukplɔla tso ƒe 1961 vaseɖe 1963 me. Le Olympio ƒe dziɖuɖu ɣeɣiɣi wo me la, Togo dze dumedɔ geɖewo wɔwɔ gɔme.
== Nuwuwu == Le Dzove 13, 1963 ɖzi la, aƒeto Olympio ku le asrafowo ƒe dziɖudua trɔtrɔ me. Eƒe kukua ƒe wɔnawo me me kɔ nyuie o vaseɖe fifia. Le nyagbɔgblɔ͂ aɖewo mè nua, ɣemaɣi asrafo gɔmenɔtɔ [[Gnassingbé Eyadéma]] ye nɔ ŋgɔ na tsitretsiɖeŋulawo. Le gbɔgblɔ bubuwo nu, asrafo Emmanuel Bodjole Ye nɔ ngɔ na wo.
{{Togo dukplɔlawo}}
[[Category:1902 vidzidziwo|Olympio, Sylvanus]] [[Category:1963 kuwo|Olympio, Sylvanus]] [[Category:Togotɔwo|Olympio, Sylvanus]] [[Category:Togo dukplɔlawo|Olympio, Sylvanus]]

[[File:Nicolas Grunitzky 1964.jpg|thumbnail|Nicolas Grunitzky, 1964]] Wo dzi '''Nicolas Grunitzky''' le Afɔfiɛ 5, le ƒe 1913 me le [[Atapkamè]] le [[Togo]]. Etrɔ megbe le Anyɔnyɔ 27, 1969 me. Aƒetɔ Grunitzky nye [[Togo dukplɔlawo]] étɔ̃liá si nɔ zia dzi tso Dzove 15, 1963 vaseɖe Dzove 14, 1967.
== Dume dɔwɔwɔ == Aƒetɔ Grunitzky nye Agbalẽ ŋlɔ̃la gã na [[Togovio ƒé n'go ɣiɣi habɔbɔ]]( PTP ). Tso eƒe 1956 me vaseɖe 1958 me la, Grunitzky nye [[Togo dudɔnunɔla gbã]].
{{Togo dukplɔlawo}}

Wò le ŋugbe dom na mí bena wò ŋutɔ ye ŋlɔ nusiawo, alo wòtsɔe tso afisi mɔɖeɖe le bena amebubuwo na zã yewo ƒe dɔ fãa la (kpɔ $1 na nyasiawo meɖeɖe). '''Megada nusiwo wòmexɔ mɔɖeɖe na o la ɖe afisia o!'''

[[File:FrancisAmenu.jpg|thumb|Osɔfo Francis Amenu]]
Osɔfo '''Francis Amenu''' enye Mɔɖeretɔ na [[Presbyteria Nyanyui Hame le Ghana]] la ƒe General Assembly.
==Sukudede== Osɔfo Amenu de Osɔfo suku le [[:en:Trinity Theological Seminary|Trinity College]] le [[Legon]] le [[Ghana]].<ref>[http://ttsem.net/index.php?option=com_content&task=category&sectionid=4&id=16&Itemid=44 Trinity Theological Seminary]</ref> Emegbe la, evayi de [[:en:Christian Theological Seminary|Christian Theological Seminary]], si le [[Indianapolis]] le [[United States]].<ref>[http://db.ghanaian-chronicle.com/thestory.asp?id=8112&title=EP%20Church%20ends%2067th%20Synod EP Church ends 67th Synod …with election of new Moderator and Clerk of General Assembly]</ref>
==Mawunya dɔwɔwɔ== Le Osɔfo Amenu ƒe ɖoɖo megbe la, ewɔ dɔ le nutome vovovowo. Enye osɔfo na Accra New Town hamea eye enɔ [[Ho]] hã. Hamea ɖoe ɖe ablotsi eye wò vayi nɔ [[London]] le [[United Kingdom]] alo Iŋglisiawo de abe Ghanatɔwo ƒe osɔfo ene.<ref>[http://www.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/NewsArchive/artikel.php?ID=38441 Ghana Home Page]</ref><ref>[http://www.bmcdirectory.org/agency_detail.php?uid=98 Black Majority Churches UK]</ref> Ewɔ dɔ kple [[United Reformed Church]] le afima<ref>[http://www.geocities.com/ccom_africa_forum/doc_files/030427Africa_Forum_Hamburg_FrancisAmenuDevotion.htm Churches Commission on Mission]</ref> tso ƒe 1999 me vaseɖe ƒe 2003 me. Egbɔ va Ghana le 2003 me eye wovayi ɖu osɔfo na Madina hamea.<ref>[http://www.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/religion/artikel.php?ID=149050 Highest E.P Church decision-making body now General Assembly]</ref> Osɔfo Amenu nɔ nufiam le Trinity Theological Seminary le Legon<ref>[http://ttsem.net/index.php?option=com_content&task=category&sectionid=4&id=16&Itemid=44 Adjunct Lecturers, Trinity Theological Seminary]</ref> kpakple [[EP University]] yeyea si le [[Ho, Ghana|Ho]].<ref>[http://db.ghanaian-chronicle.com/thestory.asp?id=8112&title=EP%20Church%20ends%2067th%20Synod EP Church ends 67th Synod …with election of new Moderator and Clerk of General Assembly]</ref>
Woɖo Osɔfo Amenu Mɔɖeretɔ le hamea ƒe synod 67lia le Ho le Dasiamime le ƒe 2008 me.<ref>[http://news.myjoyonline.com/news/200808/19799.asp My Joy Online]</ref>
==Nuŋɔŋlɔ bubuwo== *[[Presbyteria Nyanyui Hame le Ghana]]
==Nyasiawo ƒe tsoƒe== <references/>

[[File:Huang Xianfan Graduation Photo.jpg|thumb|right|Huang Xianfan]] '''Huang Xianfan''' ([[Adeɛmekpɔxe]] 13, 1899 – [[Dzove]] 18, 1982) enye China xoxoawo ta tɔ ɖeka kpakple professor le University. <ref>[http://z.cctv.com/20100118/101326.shtml Xoxoawo ta tɔ ɖeka Huang Xianfan（Chinaweb-cctv.com）]</ref>
== Ɖevime kple sukudede == Wodzi Huang le Fusui le [[China]] le Adeɛmekpɔxe 13 le ƒe 1899 me.Eƒe dzilawo ƒe ŋkɔwo nye Huang Kechang kple Gan Lan. Ede suku le Fusui Suku. Emegbe la, eyi eƒe suku dede dzi le Nanning Normal School tso ƒe 1922 me.Huang de Beijing Normal University(1926-35) kple Tokyo Imperial University le [[Japan]](1935-37).<ref>[http://www.china.com.cn/aboutchina/zhuanti/zzfq08/2008-12/08/content_16914964.htm Professor Huang Xianfan （Chinaweb-china.com.cn）]</ref>
== Eƒe dɔwɔwɔ == Egbɔ va China le 1937 me. Tso Yanuar gbatɔ 1937 la, Huang dze dɔ gɔme abe nufiala le Nanning Senior School me. Tso Yanuar gbatɔ 1938 la, Huang nɔ nufiam le Guangxi University le Guilin(1938-41). Tso eƒe 1941 me vaseɖe 1942 me la, Huang nye professor le Sun Yatsen University le Guangdong kpakple tso ƒe 1943 me vaseɖe ƒe 1953 me nɔ professor le Guangxi University yeyea si le Guilin. Tso eƒe 1954 me vaseɖe 1982 me la, Huang nye professor le Guangxi Normal College le Guilin.<ref>[http://mz.china.com.cn/?action-viewnews-itemid-2300 Zhuang professor Huang Xianfan （Chinaweb-mz.china.com.cn）]</ref>
== Huang Xianfan ƒe agbalẽwo == * Outline of Chinese History（1932-1934） * Brief Introduction on Tang Dynasty（1936，1937，2009）ISBN 978-7-80762-492-9 * Save Nation Movement of Tai-Xue students in Song Dynasty（1936，1956，1965，1996，2009）ISBN 978-7-80762-492-9 * Brief History of the Guangxi Zhuang（1957） * No Slave Society in Chinese History（1981） * Nong Zhi Gao（1983） * General History of the Zhuang（1988）ISBN 7-5363-0422-6/K·13 * The Introduction on Chinese Ancient Books（2004）ISBN 7-5633-4743-7 * Wei Baqun Critical Biography（2008）ISBN 978-7-5633-7656-8<ref>[http://www.3hresearch.com/ShowArticle.asp?ArticleID=1864 Huang Xianfan ƒe agbalẽwo （Chinaweb.com）]</ref>
== Nuŋɔŋlɔ bubuwo == * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huang_group Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia - Huang Group] * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zhuang_studies Eŋlisi Wikipiɖia - Zhuang suku] * [http://knol.google.com/k/bagui-school# Eŋlisi Bagui School]
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == <References/>
== Nuxexlẽwo le teƒe bubuwo == * [http://gov.people.com.cn/GB/46728/84059/84063/7228493.html Huang Xianfan on Chinaweb] * [http://www.youdaxue.com/info/masterList.php?nationid=3&subjectid=40&page=2 Huang Xianfan on Chinaweb]

== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
* [http://www.kk.dk/english/ www.kk.dk]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:Reykjavikurborg map.png|thumb|300px]] [[File:Islande - Rekjavik du haut de la cathédrale.JPG|thumb|300px|Reykjavík]] '''Reykjavík''' nye [[Iceland]] dugã enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 119.845 lɔƒo (2009).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
* [http://www.rvk.is/ www.rvk.is]
[[Category:Europa]]

revision.comment: [[M:User:Addbot|Bot:]] Migrating 1 interwiki links, now provided by [[d:|Wikidata]] on [[d:q4628]] [[M:User:Addbot/WDS|(translate me)]]
revision.text:
[[File:LocationFaroeIslands.png|right|450px|thumb]] [[File:Flag of the Faroe Islands.svg|right|thumb]] '''Faroe Islands''' nye [[Europa]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Faroe Islands ƒe dugã enye [[Tórshavn]].
[[Category:Europa dukɔwo]]

[[File:Riga in Latvia and EU.png|thumb|300px|Riga]] [[File:Riian vanhakaupunki.jpg |thumb|300px|Riga]] [[File:Riga dom.jpg |thumb|300px|Riga Hame]] '''Riga''' nye toxɔdu kple dugã lolotɔwu le [[Latvia]]. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 643,615 lɔƒo (2015).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [[:en:Riga|Riga]] le Eŋlisi Wikipeɖia dzi * [http://www.riga.lv/LV/Channels/ www.riga.lv]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:Tallinn location.png|thumb|300px|Tallinn]] [[File:Tallinn old and new, Dec 2006.jpg|thumb|300px|Tallinn]] '''Tallinn''' nye [[Estonia]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 445,054 lɔƒo (2017).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
* [http://www.tallinn.ee/eng www.tallinn.ee/eng]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:Faroe islands map with island names.png|thumb|250px|Tórshavn]] [[File:Vestaravag torshavn, faroe islands, feb 2005.jpg|thumb|300px|Tórshavn]] '''Tórshavn''' nye [[Faroe islands]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 12,648 lɔƒo (2015).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
* [http://www.torshavn.fo www.torshavn.fo ]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:Miensk - Plac Niezaležnaści.jpg|thumb|200px|Minsk]] '''Minsk''' (''Мінск'') nye [[Belarus]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 1,921,807 lɔƒo (2014).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
* [http://www.minsk.gov.by/index_a.shtml www.minsk.gov.by/index_a.shtml]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:BudapestMap23.png|thumb|300px|Budapest]] [[File:Budapest Night Parlament 2.jpg|thumb|200px|Budapest]] '''Budapest''' nye [[Hungary]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 1,759,407 lɔƒo (2015).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
*https://www.budapestinfo.hu/en/
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:FB Warszawa panorama.jpg|thumb|Warsaw]] [[File:POL Warszawa map.svg|thumb|Warsaw]]
'''Warsaw''' enye dugã le [[Poland]] dukɔa me. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 1,753,977 (2016) lɔƒo.
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == {{Commons|Warszawa}} * [http://www.um.warszawa.pl www.um.warszawa.pl]
[[Category:Poland]]

[[File:President-abdelaziz-bouteflika.JPG|left|200px|Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Algeria dukplɔla]] [[File:LocationAlgeria.svg|right|240px]] [[File:Flag of Algeria.svg|right|180px]]
Ɔldzeria nye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele [[Afrika ƒe dzigbe]] lɔƒo. Ɔldzeria do liƒo kple [[Tunisia]] le eƒe dzigbe. [[Libia]] le Ɔldzeria ƒe ɣedzeƒe. [[Marɔko]] le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe. [[Yetoɖoƒe Sahara]], [[Moritania]] kpakle [[Mali]] le Afrika ƒe anyigbe. Aƒu si woyɔna be ''[[Mediterranean]]'' la le eƒe dzigbe lɔƒo. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 35,700,000 lɔƒo le Dzove 2010 me. Woƒe dugã enye [[Algiers]].
Woƒe dukplɔla enye [[Abdelaziz Bouteflika]].
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]]

[[File:LocationAngola.svg|right|240px]] [[File:Flag of Angola.svg|right|180px]]
'''Aŋgola''' nye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele [[Afrika ƒe anyigbe]] lɔƒo. Aŋgola do liƒo kple [[Namibia]] le anyigbe lɔƒo. Democratic Republic of the Congo le woƒe dzigbe eye [[Zambia]] le woƒe ɣedzeƒe. Aƒu si woyɔna be ''[[Atlantic Ocean]]'' la le eƒe ɣetoɖoƒe lɔƒo. Gbe si wogblɔna le woƒe dɔwɔƒewo le dua me enye [[Pɔtugisgbe]].
Woƒe dugã enye [[Luanɖa]]. Woƒe dukplɔ enye [[João Lourenço]].
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]]
Ta nya

[[File:Prague from Powder Tower 01.jpg|thumb|300px|Prague]] [[File:Hradschin Prag.jpg|thumb|200px|Prague]] '''Prague''' (''Praha'') nye [[Czechia]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 1,280,508 lɔƒo (2016).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://www.praha-mesto.cz www.praha-mesto.cz]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:Map slovakia bratislava.png|thumb|300px|Bratislava]] [[File:Bratislava Panorama R01.jpg|thumb|200px|Bratislava]] '''Bratislava''' nye [[Slovakia]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 432,801 lɔƒo (2012).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe ==
* [http://visit.bratislava.sk/en visit.bratislava.sk/en]
[[Category:Europa]]

'''Bucharest''' nye [[Romania]] enye. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 2,106,144 (2016)<ref>http://www.insse.ro/cms/sites/default/files/field/publicatii/populatia_romaniei_pe_localitati_la_1ianuarie2016_0.pdf </ref> lɔƒo.

* [http://www.pmb.ro www.pmb.ro]
[[Category:Europa]]

[[File:Flag of Vietnam.svg|right|thumb]] [[File:Ha Long Bay.jpg|200px|thumb|right|Ha Long Bay, Vietnam]] '''Vietnam''' nye [[Asia]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Eƒe toxɔdu enye [[Hanoi]], dugã lolotɔwu enye [[Ho Chi Minh City]]. Amewo ƒe agbɔsɔsɔme enye 85,789,573 ([[2009]]), anyigbã ƒe lolome enye 331,690 km2.
[[Category:Asia dukɔwo]]

revision.text: #REDIRECT [[Axa do Ŋgɔ]]
#REDIRECT [[Aƒlao]]

'''Aƒlao''' alo '''Aflao''' enye du si le [[Ghana]] kpakple [[Togo]] woƒe liƒo dzi. Eŋlisiawo yɔna du sia be '[[:en:Aflao|Aflao]]'.
== Aƒlao ƒe nɔƒe == Aƒlao le Ketu South Distrikt me le [[Volta Region]] le Ghana. Distrikt la ƒe toxɔ du ye enye [[Denu]]. Togo nye dukɔ si le Ghana ƒe ɣedzeƒe kpa dzi eye [[Lome]] enye du si le Togo dukɔ me. [[Eʋegbe|Eʋeawo]] ƒe duwo demetɔ ɖekae nye Aƒlao. Aƒlao nye du mamlɛ tɔ sime na to hafi a geɖe [[Togo]] me.
== Kluvi si == Le blemaŋɔli la, Aƒlao nye kluvi si gãtɔ ɖeka. <ref>Dickson, K. B. "Trade Patterns in Ghana at the Beginning of the Eighteenth Century." Geographical Review 56.3 (1966): 417-431</ref> Asi gã aɖe gale Aƒlao fifia eye wodzrana nuvovowo le afima.<ref>[http://www.ghana-pedia.org/org/index.php?option=com_directory&listing=Aflao&page=viewListing&lid=228&Itemid=36 Aflao on Ghana-Pedia]</ref>
== Nyasiawo ƒe tsoƒe == {{Reflist}}
[[Category:Ghana duwo]]
[[Category:Ghana]]

revision.text: <includeonly><!-- -->{{ƔletiƔletigbalẽ|date={{{ƒe}}}-{{{ɣleti}}}-1|float=right}}<!-- -->{{ɣleti le ƒea me/Categories|ƒe={{{ƒe}}}|ɣleti={{{ɣleti}}}}}<!-- --></includeonly><!-- --><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>

<includeonly><!-- -->{{Top icon|text={{Second of two words}}}}<!-- -->{{ɣleti le ƒea me! |ƒe = {{Second of two words}} |ɣleti = {{#switch: {{lc: {{First word}}}} | dzove = 01 | dzodze = 02 | tedoxe = 03 | afɔfiɛ = 04 | damɛ = 05 | masa = 06 | siamlɔm = 07 | dasiamime = 08 | anyɔnyɔ = 09 | kele = 10 | adeɛmekpɔxe = 11 | dzome = 12}}}}</includeonly><!-- --><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>

<includeonly>{{#if: {{NAMESPACE}} | | [[Category:{{#switch: {{{ɣleti}}} | 01 = Dzove | 02 = Dzodze | 03 = Tedoxe | 04 = Afɔfiɛ | 05 = Damɛ | 06 = Masa | 07 = Siamlɔm | 08 = Dasiamime | 09 = Anyɔnyɔ | 10 = Kele | 11 = Adeɛmekpɔxe | 12 = Dzome}}|{{padleft: {{{ƒe}}}|4|0}}]] [[Category:{{{ƒe}}}|*{{{ɣleti}}}]]}}</includeonly><!-- --><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>

YHWH gɔmeɖeɖe enye [[yehowa]] (manye nusi manye) amesi nye [[Yesu]] ƒe tɔ si dɔe wova anyigbã la dzi. Eye amesi ƒo nu esime wonyrɔ͂e. Eya ma gbɔ ye [[gbɔgbɔ kɔkɔe]]a tso abe xe ene va edzi. Eya kee na gbɔgbɔa Yesu wotsɔ wɔa [[nukunu]]woe. Le dɔwɔwɔwo ta 2 kpupui 32 kple 33 la Yehowa gbɔe yesu xɔ gbɔgbɔ kɔkɔea si wo tsɔ nyrɔ apostoloawo le pentecote dzi la le.

[[File:Ghana location map.svg|thumb|Ghana dukɔ]] '''Ʋegbe Kpalime''' enye dukɔ aɖe si le [[Ghana]] ƒe [[Vɔlta nutome]]. == Eƒe nɔƒe == Ʋegbe dukɔa teɖe [[Bame]] ŋu. Ele Ʋegbe ƒe dzigbe lɔƒo. [[Akrɔfu]] kple [[Aveŋui]] le eƒe anyigbe lɔƒo. [[Ho]], si nye Vɔlta nutome dugã did tso egbɔ abe kilometre 15 ene. == Dzɔdzɔme == Wo xɔese bena Kpaliawo ʋu va afisi wole fifia tso [[Ŋɔtsie]] le afisi [[Togo]] dukɔa le fifia. Wonɔ sisim na Tɔgbe Agɔkɔli, amesi nye Fiaga le Ŋɔtsie.[http://news.myjoyonline.com/news/200712/11168.asp MyJoyOnline] Wo ma ɖe akpa eve me. Akpa ɖeka zɔ yi anyigbe lɔƒɔ. Akpa evelia, sinye Ʋegbeawo, Kpevetɔwo kpakple Kleƒetɔwo vayi dze Vɔlta nutoame le afisi wo le fifia.[http://kledetf.over-blog.com/article-24602450.html ''Welcome to Klefe Dome''] == Kpaliawo == Kpaliawo dzɔ tso [[Eʋeawo]] me eye Ʋegbe Kpalime enye Kpaleawo ƒe dukɔ ɖeka. Wodo ƒome kpakple Kpali du susueawo. Woaow enye Kpale, Todome, Tsatee, Hiama, Kaira, Toh kple Duga. Kpalime Duga enye woƒe du gã tɔ. Ʋegbe dukɔa ƒe azã vevietɔ enye [[Kpalikpakpaza]] siwo ɖuna ƒesiaa ƒe le ƒea ƒe nuwuwu lɔƒo. Woɖu azã sia zi gbãtɔ le 1997 me. Wotsɔna azã sia tsana Kpali dukɔawo dzi, eyata Kpali dukɔawo katã ɖunae le du ɖeka me.[http://www.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/NewsArchive/artikel.php?ID=2839 GhanaWeb.com] == Dziɖuɖu == [[File:Togbe Wiah Kwasi II.jpg|thumb|right|Tɔgbe Wiah Kwasi II
Ʋegbe Kpalime Fiaga
(Tso 2010)]] Ʋegbe dukɔa ƒe dziɖula enye woƒe Fiaga. Amesi eny Fiaga fifia enye Aƒetɔ Silas Wiah. Eƒe kpukpo ŋukɔ enye Tɔgbe Wiah Kwasi II. Woɖoe Fiaga le Masa 2010 me.[http://southdayi.ghanadistricts.gov.gh/?arrow=nws&read=34721 GhanaDistricts.Gov.Gh] Ʋegbe Kpalime le South Dayi Distrikt me si ƒe dugã enye [[Kpeve]]. Ghana dukɔa ƒe zimenɔla na distrikt la enye [[Kafui Bekui]]. == Xlẽ esiawo hã == * [[Kpalime dukɔawo]] * [[Kafui Bekui]] == Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == == Nuxexlẽwo kple nutatawo tso teƒe bubuwo == * [http://southdayi.ghanadistricts.gov.gh/ South Dayi District Official website] * [http://maps.msn.com/%28tyjzxszmjpjceivjextxxkrf%29/map.aspx?L=WLD&C=6.65048%2c0.33266&A=215.00000&P=|A0EFC7|&TI=Wegbe%2c+Ghana MSN Map] * [http://maps.google.co.uk/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=6.65000,+0.34112&sll=6.649944,0.341606&sspn=0.009804,0.021136&ie=UTF8&ll=6.649603,0.326843&spn=0.156866,0.468979&t=h&z=12 Google maps] {{Kpalime dukɔwo}} [[Category:Ghana duwo]]

{| border="0" align="center" style="border: 1px solid #999; background-color:#FFFFFF" |! colspan=10 align="center" bgcolor="#ccccff" |   '''Kpalime dukɔwo''' |- |! colspan=1 align="center" bgcolor="#ccccff" |   '''Duwo ''' |[[Kpalime Duga|Duga]]  [[Hiama Kpalime|Hiama]]  [[Kaira Kpalime|Kaira]]  [[Kpale Kpalime|Kpale]]  [[Todome Kpalime|Todome]]  [[To Kpalime|To]]  [[Tsatee Kpalime|Tsatee]]  [[Ʋegbe Kpalime|Ʋegbe]] |- |! colspan=1 align="center" bgcolor="#ccccff" |   '''Azãwo''' |[[Kpalikpakpaza]]  [[Teɖuɖu]] |- |! colspan=1 align="center" bgcolor="#ccccff" |   '''Nububuwo''' |[[Eʋeawo]]  [[Eʋegbe]]  [[Vɔlta nutome]] |} <noinclude> [[Category:Templatewo]] </noinclude>

[[File:African Star Apple.jpg|thumb|Alasã]] '''Alasã''' enye atikutsetse si bɔ le [[Afrika]] nutowome. Atikutsetse ŋu nusrɔ̃lawo tsɔ ŋkɔ nae be Chrysophyllum albidum.<ref>[https://npgsweb.ars-grin.gov/gringlobal/taxonomydetail.aspx?id=400210 Taxon: Chrysophyllum albidum G. Don], U.S. National Plant Germplasm System</ref> Eƒe agbalẽme ŋkɔ enye ''Chrysophyllum albidum''. Woyɔna atikutsetse sia le Englishgbe me be ''white star apple''. Ebiã abe akutu ene gake eme nuwo tovovo tso eyaa egbɔ kroa. Ebluawo hã yɔne be Alasã abe Eʋeawo ene. [[Yoruba]] tɔwo le [[Nigeria]] nutome yɔ nae be Agbalumo. Wo ga yɔnae be Udala le Nigeria ƒe akpa bubuwo hã. Ame aɖewo zana alasã mi na adzãle ɖaɖa.<ref>[https://www.nap.edu/read/11879/chapter/25#320 LOST CROPS OF AFRICA Volume III - Fruits], Axa 320. Washington, DC: The National Academies Press. 2008., ISBN 978-0-309-10596-5.</ref>
[[Category:Atikutsetsewo]]

revision.text:
[[File:Ananas comosus Victoria P1190421.jpg|right|300px]]
'''Abable''' alo '''Atɔtɔ''' enye atikutsetse si woyɔna le Englishgbe me be ''pineapple''. Eƒe ŋkɔ ŋutɔ enye [[:species:Ananas comosus|Ananas comosus]]. Wotsɔna abable wɔna nuɖuɖu vovovowo le xexeame katã.
==Nuŋɔŋlɔwo le teƒe bubuwo== {{commons|Ananas comosus}} *[[:species:Ananas comosus|Wikispecies]] *[http://www.crfg.org/pubs/ff/pineapple.html Pineapple Fruit Facts] – Nuŋɔŋlɔwo le abable ŋu tso California Rare Fruit Growers, Inc. *[http://www.saudiaramcoworld.com/issue/199203/new.world.foods.old.world.diet.htm Paul Lunde ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔwo le abable ŋuti tso ''New World Foods, Old World Diet'', 1992, Saudi Aramco World]
[[Category:Atikutsetsewo]]

[[File:Lion, Masai Mara, Kenya.jpg|thumb|Dzatatsu]] [[File:Lioness.jpg|thumb|Dzatanɔ]] Dzata nyé gbemelã sesẽtɔwo dometɔ ɖeka. Enye lã ɖuʋulɛ̃ . Tso keke gbaɖegbe ke la, woda ŋkɔ ɖe edzi be enye lãwo ƒe fia. Ŋkɔ sia dzee vavã elabena enye lã dziŋɔ wɔdã aɖe si ɖu gbemelãwo katã kloe dzi.
==Dzedzeme alo Nɔnɔme== Dzata ɖi [[Dadi|dadi]] le go geɖe me. Enye lã triakɔ̃ aɖe si afɔ kako ene li na. Afɔdidɛ atɔ̃ siwo nu fe ɖaɖɛwo le la le eƒe afɔawo nu. Eƒe fuwo biã eye asike legbee aɖe si ŋu fu kpoyoo aɖe le la li nɛ. Eƒe ta lolo ŋku eve siwo kpɔkpɔ doa vɔvɔ̃ na ame la le ta ŋu nɛ. Dzatatsu to fu ɖe kɔ me fũ. Woyɔa fu sia be '''kɔdza'''. Dzatanɔ ya metoa '''kɔdza''' o.
{{stub}} [[Category:Lãwo]] [[Category:Gbemelãwo]]
Gbemelãwo

[[File:Tigersnake.JPG|thumb| Dã ]] [[File:Natrix natrix (Marek Szczepanek).jpg|thumb| Dã]] ''' Dã''' nye gbemelãwo dometɔ ɖeka. Me to afɔ aɖeke o. E zɔ na le eƒe ƒodo dzi.
{{stub}} [[Category:Lãwo]] [[Category:Gbemelãwo]]

'''Lododo''' alo '''Lododowo''' (Eŋlisigbeme [[:en:Proverb|Proverbs]] ) nye nya siwo miegblɔna kuɖe agbe aɖe si ame ɖe nɔ la ŋu. Enu enu la, nya siawo nyea nuxɔxlɔ̃ na amewo eye wodea sesẽ lãme na nunyuiwɔlawo.
==Lododo ƒe kpɔɖeŋu aɖewo== Lododo ƒe kpɔɖeŋu aɖewoe nye: *Vi gbã abɔbɔgo me gbã klo go o. *Ɖevi ka aplẽ gã mekaa nya gã o. *Nunya adidoe asi me tu ne o. *Kokloxɔ vuvu mekpe na ŋu na koklo o. *Ne edidi ʋu hã etsɔ ko woyɔne. *Ha be ŋdi tsie nye nyia. *Agbenɔxevi megbea fu megbea fuma to o. *Gbɔ̃ tokpo ye xlɔŋu via. *Ahlɔ̃e medoa nyi fɔkpa o. *Ha be mele lolo me o, tsivivi mee wole. <!--*Koklo be ɣlidola wo xɔna na.--> *Koklo metsɔa ƒu dome vea avu o. *Koklo be kɔ gbɔe agbe le. *Mɔdidi megbea du nu yi na o. *Gbɔ̃sikɛ menɔa gbɔ̃ ŋgɔ o. *Haho metsɔa tɔ o. *Ta menɔanyi klo dɔa kuku o. *Gli matsɔ amegbɔ wome dea mee o. *Wome da kalami ɖe dadi gbɔ o. *Dzigbɔdi wo tsɔ xɔa nu le fia si. *Avu ɖu ƒu me dua ga o. *Sabala le nogo gake mɔ le eme. *Alegeli be ekpo ɖe megbetɔwo dzi. *Vivi mevɔ na le agɔ kuŋu hafi wotsɔne ƒua gbe o. *Dadi be nusi avu kpɔ hafi do ɣli, ye yekpɔna mia ŋku ɖedzi. *Melege melegea ɖewo tsia ɖi ame. *Dzea ʋa ɖia, aʋa mesi nɛ o. *Makpɔƒle metsia asime o. *Ta ɖeka meɖea aɖaŋu o. *Dumenyo mesɔa aƒe o. *Avulélae xɔa kɔ. *Ame eve metsia bome o. *Nunyui wɔla ƒe ta me tsia bame o. *Klo be wó be ye neva kpɔ yegbe, ye na be ye ƒe ta tsi gome. {{stub}}

'''Lododowo''' afia nyasiawo:
*[[Lododo]] ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ *[[Salomo ƒe Lododowo|Lododowo]] - Salomo ƒe Lododowo le [[Biblia]] me

[[File:African Bush Elephant Mikumi.jpg|thumb|Atiglinyi]] [[File:African Elephant in Kenya.jpg|thumb|Atiglinyi]] '''Atiglinyi''' nye lã lolotɔ wu le anyigba dzi. Geɖewo nɔna avetsuwo me.
{{stub}} [[Category:Lãwo]] [[Category:Gbemelãwo]]
#REDIRECT [[John Mahama]]

[[File:Wickiana5.jpg|thumb|200px|Dzotɔtɔ adzetɔ etɔ le [[Baden, Switzerland|Baden]] (1585).]] '''Wickiana''' nye nyadzɔdzɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒo kuɖe nusiwo le dzɔdzɔm fifia si sɔ kple nusiwo dzɔ le senturi wuiade lia me siwo nɔ amaŋgba deka dzi kple agbale gawo, mɔme nutatawo, azi nu ŋɔŋlɔwo kple nutatawo. Fifiame gbale drodo nuwo nye nu vevitɔwo kuɖe nane siwo wɔ la nu, si wo yɔ le Switzerland be Reformation. [[Johann Jakob Wick]] (1522-1588), si megbe wotsɔna nusiawo ƒe ƒuƒoƒo, nye Mawununɔla le Predigerkirche eye wonɔ kadodome kple [[Zürich]] dɔyɔƒe tso 1552 eye woga nye [[Archdeacon]] evelia le eyiyi ma me, kpe ɖe nunɔle [[Grossmünster]] le [[Zürich]] tso 1557. E ƒoƒu eye woɖo nyadzɔdzɔ gbale siawo ɖe nɔnɔme nyuitɔ me le ƒe 1559 kple 1588 dome, etsɔ nububuwo ha de wo nɔƒewo le ƒe 1505 lɔƒo vaseɖe 1559 le ye ƒe nuƒoƒuawo me.
<!-- Wick’s collection is bound in 24 [[Folio (printing)|folio volumes]], which were housed in the Grossmünster Stiftsbibliothek after Wick’s death in 1588 and subsequently transferred to the Zürich Stadtbibliothek in 1836. In addition to a vast number of prints from the German-speaking countries, the collection also contains 52 items in other languages. Many of the sheets emanate from the most important centres for printing and book production at that period – [[Augsburg]], [[Nürnberg]] and [[Strassburg]].
In pictures and texts, the documents bear witness to contemporary life, reporting on such phenomena as natural occurrences – comets, earthquakes and floods - , physical deformities in animals and humans, sensational crimes and political events of the time. For example, the comet of 1577 is described as “terrible and wondrous” (“schrecklich und wunderbarlich”). The collection can be regarded as manifesting the climate of crisis at a time of religious and political turmoil: [[Huldrych Zwingli]] (died 1531) had recently predicted the end of the world. Wick’s collection of documents may have been regarded by him and his contemporaries as harbingers of the Last Judgement.
==Access== 439 illustrated broadsheets (woodcuts), 429 of which belong to the original collection. 10 were added later. In 1925, these illustrated broadsheets were removed from Johann Jakob Wick’s manuscript volumes and archived separately in the Department of Prints and Drawings of the Zentralbibliothek Zürich (Graphische Sammlung). All the rest of the documents, Wick’s entire collection, are housed in the Department of Manuscripts in the [[Zentralbibliothek Zürich]] (Handschriftenabteilung). -->
== Kpɔ esiawo hã == Tso Eŋlisi Wikipeɖia * [[:en:Swiss illustrated chronicles|Swiss illustrated chronicles]] * [[:en:History of Zürich|History of Zürich]] * [[:en:Historiography of Switzerland|Historiography of Switzerland]] * [[:en:Reformation in Switzerland|Reformation in Switzerland]]
== Kpɔɖeŋuwo == <gallery> File:Wickiana Heuschrecke.jpg|Abɔtre/Abɔtri File:Wickiana Treppensturz.jpg|Monk Bastian Hegner dze anyi eye woku le Rapperswil le [[Ademakpɔxe]] 12, 1561 me. File:Wickiana Kind Maschwanden.jpg|Eha le ɖevi aɖe eye wowui le [[Maschwanden]]. File:Wickiana Mönche.jpg|Wo ƒo monk eve vevie le Geneva ɖe amebaba ta. File:Zentralbibliothek Zürich - Von einem schrecklichen und wunderbarlichen Cometen so sich den Dienstag nach Martini dieses lauffenden M D LXXViJ Jahrs am Himmel erzeiget hat - 000003593.jpg| <!--[[Great Comet of 1577]], Prag, November 12, 1577--> </gallery>
== Nugɔmekuku tsoƒewo == * M. Senn, '' Die Wickiana. Johann Jakob Wicks Nachrichtensammlung aus dem 16. Jahrhundert'', Zürich 1975. * Franz Matthias Mauelshagen, ''Wunderkammer auf Papier. Die Wickiana zwischen Reformation und Volksglaube'', Diss. Univ. Zürich, Zürich 2008. * Wolfgang Harms, Michael Schilling (eds.), ''Die Wickiana. Die Sammlung der Zentralbibliothek Zürich'', Tübingen 1997–2005.

{| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="2" width="240" style="margin: 0 0 1em 1em; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" align="right" |align=center colspan=3 bgcolor=#d3d3d3 |''' Volta Region''' |- !align="center" colspan="3"|[[File:Ghana Volta.png|125px]] |- !align="center" colspan="3"|[[File:Volta districts.png|250px]] |- |align="left" valign="top"|'''Dukɔ''' |colspan=2 valign=top| [[Ghana]] |- |align="left" valign="top"|'''Toxɔdu''' |colspan=2 valign=top| [[Ho, Ghana|Ho]] |- |align="left" valign="top"|'''Distriktwo''' |colspan=2 valign=top| 25 |- !align="left" valign="top"|'''Kekeme''' |colspan=2 valign=top| 20,570 km² |- |align="left" valign="top"|'''Xexleme (2000 Census)''' |align=left valign=top| 1,635,421 |- !align="left" valign="top"|ISO 3166 code |colspan=2 valign=top| GH-TV |} '''Volta Region''' si woyɔna tsa be [[Togoland]] kple [[British Togoland]] eye wonye [[Ghana]] ƒe nuto ewoa wo dometɔ ɖeka. Ele ɣetoɖoƒe kpadzi ne [[Togo]] eye le ɣedzeƒe kpadzi ne Amuda tɔsisi la. Efe toxɔdue nye [[Ho, Ghana|Ho]]. ==Distriktwo== Distriktwo 25 le Volta nutoame. {| class="wikitable" ! Distrikt !! Toxɔdu !! [[File:Tagbo Falls Ghana.jpg|thumb|Tagbo Tsidzaƒe le Liate Wote]] '''Tagbo Falls''' nye tsidzaƒe si teɖe [[Afadzto]] gbɔ le [[Ghana]], ele Liati Wote, si anɔ abe kilometa 27 le [[Hohoe]] ƒe ɣedzeƒe . Tsidzaƒe sia dudu na le doƒe vovowo me, doƒe mamletɔ anɔ abe meta 60 ƒe kɔkɔme ene . Ave ƒo xla teƒe sia.
Nuɖuɖuwo ƒe hatsotso.

[[File:Ghanaian Wache (Waakye) cuisine food.jpg|thumb|right|Waakye le agbame]]
'''Waakye''' nye nuɖuɖu bɔbɔ aɖe le [[Ghana]] si ame sia ame kloe ɖuna. Wo ɖaa waakye le aƒeme gake zi geɖe la, edzralawo ɖo na asi ɖe lɔri mɔtɔwo alo xɔsɔe aɖe me kpli. Waakye ɖaɖa do na go tso mɔlu kple ayi si woɖo dzodzi zi ɖekae me.
'''Waakye''' si woateŋu aɖu le ɖe ŋdi alo ŋdɔ nuɖuɖu teƒe. Wo ɖua waakye kple nudonui siawo dometɔ ɖeka alo wo ƒe agbɔsɔsɔme, kelewele, akpa tɔtɔ, abladzo tɔtɔ, koklozi ɖaɖa, koklola tɔtɔ.
[[Category:Nuɖuɖuwo]]

{|class="toccolours" cellpadding="10" rules="cols" width=59% ! Mia Denyigba Lɔ̃lɔ̃ la |- ! colspan="2" bgcolor="red" |First stanza |- |width=2%|
Mia denyigba lɔ̃lɔ̃ la
Enu wonye woa ƒoa sia?
Mia tɔgbuiwo tsɔ woƒe
agbe gble ɖe eta xɔe nami
Eɖo nye kpli woha dzi
be mia wɔ miatɔ sinu
Nuvevi nyenye, diɖoɖo,
kple ame ɖokui tɔdzidzi,
Bu miaƒe azɔli hegble mia denyigba alegbegbe.
|- !colspan="2" bgcolor="yellow"|Second stanza |- |width=2%|
Agbalemenunya ƒuƒlu
Loo hotsui kpɔkpɔ guduu
Kple agbe yaka nɔnɔ
Meyina kple anyigba lɔ̃lɔ̃ o
Ta bɔbɔ kple amelɔame
Nyui didi na amesiame
Kple lã dodo ame ɖokui
Na xɔ̃lɔ̃ viviwo ƒe nyonyo ko
Woawo mee tomefafa
Kple ŋgɔyiyi nyui wodzɔ tso.
|- !colspan="2" bgcolor="green"|Chorus |- |width=2%|
Denyigba wo nyonyo
Denyigba wo gbegble
Alesi newɔe la
Sigbe ke woa nɔ daa
|}

Nuxlɔ̃ame: Mège ɖe eme haɖe o.
Míalé wò IP adrɛs ɖi ne èŋlɔ nu ɖe afi sia.

[[File:Nelson Mandela-2008 (edit).jpg|thumbnail| Mandela le [[Johannesburg]], le Damɛ 13, 2008]] '''Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela''' ([[Siamlɔm 18]], [[1918]] – [[Dzove 5]], [[2013]]) nye [[South Afrika]] dunya he la si va zu South Afrika dukplɔla tso ƒe 1994 va se de 1998.

'''Komla Aƒeke Dumor''' (3 [[Kele]] 1972 – 18 [[Dzove]] 2014) nye [[Ghana]]vi si nye nyadzɔdzɔ gblɔla le BBC nyadzɔdzɔ gblɔƒea.
== Ku == Komla ku kpata le [[London]] le 18 [[Dzove]] 2014, etso eƒe dzi nu.
[[Category:Ghana]]

[[File:Official Portrait of President Reagan 1981.jpg|thumbnail| Ronald Reagan (1981)]] '''Ronald Wilson Reagan''' ([[Dzodze 6]], [[1911]] – [[Masa 5]], [[2004]]) nye [[United States|Amerikan]] dunya he la si va zu United States dukplɔla tso ƒe 1980 va se de 1989.

[[File:TE-Collage London.png|thumb|300px]]
'''London''' nye [[England]], [[United Kingdom]] ƒe toxɔdu alo duga.
[[Category:Europa dukɔwo]]
#REDIRECT[[Serbia]]

[[File:Trojany województwo mazowieckie.JPG|thumb|250px|right|Trojany]]
'''Trojany''' enye dua ɖe [[Poland]], si ele [[Warsaw]] kple [[Wołomin]] dome. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 490 lɔƒo ([[2014]]).
[[Category:Duawo]] [[Category:Europa duawo]] [[Category:Poland duawo]]
'''Ŋkɔ''' nya siwo wo tsɔ na dea dze nuwoe. Ŋkɔ ha evee li. Woawoe nye '''Ŋkɔbɔbɔ''' kple '''Ŋkɔtɔxɛ'''.

'''Ebola dɔlele''' nye dɔlele vɔɖi aɖe si le na amegbetɔ kple laãwo sia. Dɔlele sia le na ame to ebola dɔlekui me. Dzesiwo dze na egɔme le ŋkeke evelia se ɖe kɔsiɖa etɔlia me, ne nye be dɔlekui sia le wo. Dzesi aɖewoe nye feva, veto me ƒe ƒɔƒlɔ, lameka vea me kple taduame. Nuɖeɖe, asraɖɔ kple aƒɔdzi dede trololo kplɔ na esia wo ɖo. Kpeɖe esia wo ŋue nye ame ƒe ayikuwo kple dzitodzito ƒe dɔwɔna didina. Le gaƒoƒo sia me la ʋu ateŋu adze dza le ame ƒe lame alo ŋuti.
Wo ate ŋu axɔ dɔlele sia to ame ŋutsi kakã alo ŋutsi tsi tso lãa si dɔlelea le. Wo mekpɔ ŋlɔ naneke kuɖee dɔlele sia ƒe kaka to yaa me o. Wo xɔese be agutɔ siwo ɖuna atikutsetse tsɔ na eye mana dɔlele sia ƒe dɔlekui gake me le na woŋutɔ o. Ne nye be amegbetɔ aɖe le dɔ si la, ateŋu ale ame bubuwo hã. Ŋutsu siwo yɔ dɔ sia na la, ateŋu amae na amebubuwo to gbɔdɔdɔ me abe dziŋu eve ene.
[[Category:Dɔlele]]

'''Mauritius''' nye [[Afrika]] dukɔwo dometɔ ɖeka.
{{Afrika dukɔwo}}
[[Category:Mauritius| ]] [[Category:Afrika dukɔwo]]

[[File:Stary Dwór.JPG|thumb|250px|right|Stary Dwór]]
'''Stary Dwór''' enye dua ɖe [[Poland]], si ele [[Trzciel]] kple [[Międzyrzecz]] dome. Eƒe dukɔmenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 360 lɔƒo ([[2006]]).
[[Category:Duawo]] [[Category:Europa duawo]] [[Category:Poland duawo]]

[[Category:Stubs]]

[[File:Kostel_svatého_Bartoloměje_ve_Vrahovicích%2C_Prostějov.jpg|thumb|Vrahovice]] '''Vrahovice''' nye kɔƒe sue aɖe le [[Czechia]] dukɔa me. Emenɔlawo ƒe xexlẽme ɖo 3,402 lɔƒo (2001).
== Nya siawo ƒe tsoƒe == * [http://www.vrahovice.eu/ www.vrahovice.eu]
[[Category:Europa]]

Wikipedia: Nu siwo le dzɔdzɔm na etɔtrɔ
Èva ɖo axa si gɔme womedze haɖe o. Ne èdi be yeadze egɔme la, dze nuŋɔŋlɔ ɖe go sia me le afi sia ɖome (kpɔ kpekpeɖeŋunyawo hena kpekpeɖeŋu bubuwo). Ne mèɖoe be yeava afi sia hafi o la, ekema tia megbe eye nàgbugbɔ ayi afi si nètso va.
